  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Share new training on the Community</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to share a new training course in the Community?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Once your training has been created, and when you publish it, you will be invited to share it in the Community, if desired.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Sharing the training in the Community </b>allows you to notify your learners that a new training is available and thus to promote it.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To share a training in the Community, you must first create your training, then once finalized, click on the <b>Publish </b>button.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263236426/30b04e9731cc9e234def2820/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=8cec7a693086ef8c29c018bb0d86460016081569f720c8e2660f92f92181f6f2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263236426/30b04e9731cc9e234def2820/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=8cec7a693086ef8c29c018bb0d86460016081569f720c8e2660f92f92181f6f2"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A pop-up window inviting you to share the training in the Community will appear.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263242374/432c067bc715237be2acc809/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=6097909d2c734c83448a5b7e81e883672eb97449a2078d538b151a01c3fdab87" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263242374/432c067bc715237be2acc809/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=6097909d2c734c83448a5b7e81e883672eb97449a2078d538b151a01c3fdab87"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can then select the community board(s) on which you want to share the training, depending on the scope concerned.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Example: if the training is available on the internal perimeter as well as a partner perimeter, you will be offered to select one or the other or both.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If you click <b>Skip</b>, you skip this step and your training will not be shared on the Community.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è If you skip this step and decide not to share the training in the Community, you will not be able to share it afterwards.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To share it in the community, select the desired perimeter(s) and click on <b>Share</b>.</p><p class="no-margin">A message including a link to the training concerned will then be published on the selected board.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263240096/581bafd1154519f4095775fb/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=d1d7b59aa3161e2a8ca721f40853c9a522e7ed9d8f5bb3c1c56a642f9e10dfd6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263240096/581bafd1154519f4095775fb/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=d1d7b59aa3161e2a8ca721f40853c9a522e7ed9d8f5bb3c1c56a642f9e10dfd6"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>See more</b>, the learner will access the relevant training catalog page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/05/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Mobile notifications</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            What notifications learners receive via mobile?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Like all iOs and Android apps, the Rise Up Mobile Learning app notifies your learners through push notifications on their smartphones.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Notification windows may therefore appear informing them of actions carried out on the platform that concern them.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264391943/3f24f2c121b31ada3dab173f/image.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=5d7986aea755735b06e77f5c89cdf3171ae758f85d1924244323cd15cf99dbb4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264391943/3f24f2c121b31ada3dab173f/image.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=5d7986aea755735b06e77f5c89cdf3171ae758f85d1924244323cd15cf99dbb4"></a></div><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264392790/b3862db31e48edc6f6cc0aa0/image.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=2a17653132dff15d50ea71c7e253ed89b240d1d1d69bd2241f9e5e92f249cdf0" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264392790/b3862db31e48edc6f6cc0aa0/image.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=2a17653132dff15d50ea71c7e253ed89b240d1d1d69bd2241f9e5e92f249cdf0"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The following actions are notified to learners by push notifications on mobile:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Validation of a training registration </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registration for training by an administrator</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Reminder of an upcoming face-to-face session (sent 2 days before the start of the session)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Live or delayed evaluation available</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Exam corrected </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Synchronization of Scorm-type steps (offline)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Sending answers for a quiz, exams or surveys (offline)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">As a reminder, the mobile app is exclusively made for learner use (no administration feature). Therefore, so push notifications will always be intended for learners.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/09/2020</i></p></article>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Manage the attendance sheet</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How do I generate an attendance sheet for one of my face-to-face sessions? How to download it? How do I sign it on Rise Up?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Your Rise Up platform allows you to generate an attendance sheet for each of your face-to-face sessions.</p><p class="no-margin">To learn more about creating face-to-face sessions, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975362">Managing face-to-face sessions</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="access-the-attendance-sheet-for-a-session" data-post-processed="true">Access the attendance sheet for a session</h2><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Training &gt; Manage face-to-face sessions</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>More options</b> (three vertical dots) for the desired session, you can then click on <b>Attendance sheet</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268493589/7b4c2bec815b28e13b8eaec3/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b0615f85a535327641384d5aff8e2447bee3442087bb2db35f695a2ab0798e82" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268493589/7b4c2bec815b28e13b8eaec3/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b0615f85a535327641384d5aff8e2447bee3442087bb2db35f695a2ab0798e82"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From this Attendance Sheet Management page, you can:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Download the attendance sheet</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Have the learners and the trainer sign the attendance sheet directly via the platform<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="attendance-sheet-template" data-post-processed="true">Attendance sheet template</h2><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Signature by learners</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">The attendance sheet is displayed according to the learners registered for the session. A block for each learner's signature will appear in the interface and on the PDF attendance sheet .</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268484492/3ca3da966674e1ead16077d3/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=0cf131576154a262cc642848196e8950dd6588faeeece8d5659b39063f4e64de" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268484492/3ca3da966674e1ead16077d3/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=0cf131576154a262cc642848196e8950dd6588faeeece8d5659b39063f4e64de"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Signature by trainers</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">In the same way, a block for the trainers' signature will appear on the attendance sheet.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268484854/40067934dc7beda4be2083f5/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4bf32a705a51b2ff4df8a1e0b49d6ba3330d322175c0174aed08342007515a2a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268484854/40067934dc7beda4be2083f5/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4bf32a705a51b2ff4df8a1e0b49d6ba3330d322175c0174aed08342007515a2a"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Legal information</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Legal information appears on the right of the screen (Place, Number of registrants, Duration, Date, Hours ...). This information is also included on the generated attendance sheet.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268485153/8e9369097f14b349eeaff640/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ba611184876abe31e76fbab32ac564e9070f5abd111843d3936da2f440cf3017" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268485153/8e9369097f14b349eeaff640/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ba611184876abe31e76fbab32ac564e9070f5abd111843d3936da2f440cf3017"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="download-the-attendance-sheet" data-post-processed="true">Download the attendance sheet</h2><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Download PDF</b>, you will be able to download the attendance sheet.</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">If the timesheet was <b>not signed on Rise Up platform</b>, you will download it blank. You can then print it and have it signed in the classroom in paper format for example.<br></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If you had the attendance sheet <b>signed on Rise Up platform</b>, the signatures of learners and trainers will appear in the downloaded version.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268482579/6a62eef04c6263af083e584e/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=a7a96d5232a21e6d61ad8225b5c485fb4bb66223d999b15ea1baaa3c0847a02f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268482579/6a62eef04c6263af083e584e/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=a7a96d5232a21e6d61ad8225b5c485fb4bb66223d999b15ea1baaa3c0847a02f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The format of the attendance sheet is customizable. For more information, see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970584">Modify legal document templates</a>.</p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268500002/992686389bf0b3446d2e8530/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=e75675f72c94838a0bdfd6a19701c20229cd1227a1229a846fdac66551d69885" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268500002/992686389bf0b3446d2e8530/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=e75675f72c94838a0bdfd6a19701c20229cd1227a1229a846fdac66551d69885"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br> </p><h2 id="sign-the-attendance-sheet-via-rise-up" data-post-processed="true">Sign the attendance sheet via Rise Up</h2><p class="no-margin">To sign the attendance sheet, click on the <b>Pen</b> icon ‚úèÔ∏è to open the signature area for the learner / trainer.</p><p class="no-margin">This interface is available for session facilitators, as well as administrators and designers.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268488932/a3f263816a2595a721608e8d/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=a381ccf9b6dc371ea970b124690e8a237707c398015e73dfef1858bcf3c48008" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268488932/a3f263816a2595a721608e8d/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=a381ccf9b6dc371ea970b124690e8a237707c398015e73dfef1858bcf3c48008"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A pop-up window will appear with an insert to sign the attendance sheet. Then click on <b>Validate</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268490366/ee87497fd5bde0af221248aa/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=8c3cb3dc8befa5f7b7cd438a5e6492c1e343b671c9d92073522567e1a73c8f2c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268490366/ee87497fd5bde0af221248aa/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=8c3cb3dc8befa5f7b7cd438a5e6492c1e343b671c9d92073522567e1a73c8f2c"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The signature will appear in the corresponding block of the attendance sheet.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268490904/f1ee7f4bab4692fc25e7f399/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=82cb963960dd4b207fcf72a6570918dbe446e485db0d5204cf7934f8a1e5dade" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268490904/f1ee7f4bab4692fc25e7f399/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=82cb963960dd4b207fcf72a6570918dbe446e485db0d5204cf7934f8a1e5dade"></a></div><p class="no-margin">If you have activated, in the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3971753">Settings of the platform - Section Face-to-face sessions &amp; Virtual classrooms</a>, the feature "<b>The user who signs the attendance sheet is recorded as present and receives an email</b>", the presence will be updated automatically during the signature by the learner.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è It is not possible to have the attendance sheet signed remotely (especially for virtual classes). Indeed, the interface is accessible only to the trainer, and the learner does not have access to the signature interface via his account.</p><p class="no-margin">For virtual classrooms, it is the connection times tracked via the virtual classroom tool that justify the presence of the learners.</p><p class="no-margin"><br><br><i>Last updated on 11/20/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">Update presence / absence for a face-to-face session</div>
</div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Update presence / absence for a face-to-face session</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How do I update my present / absent learners in a face-to-face session ?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">In order to update the presence and absence of your learners, you will first need to create your face-to-face sessions, to have registered your learners there.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To learn more about creating and managing face-to-face sessions, see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975362">Managing face-to-face sessions</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="access" data-post-processed="true">Access</h2><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Training &gt; Manage face-to-face sessions</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>More options </b>(three vertical dots) for the desired session, you can then click on <b>View users </b>to access the list of your registrants. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268510705/9309109358b22063d1232be6/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=e69a239547cda4fe3033b25209c1d5436a0a4083a3e2609f1e1ffb71a50a7080" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268510705/9309109358b22063d1232be6/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=e69a239547cda4fe3033b25209c1d5436a0a4083a3e2609f1e1ffb71a50a7080"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A pop-up window showing the list of registrants to date will appear.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268510909/cfed264124ecabf20c91c2b2/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=ed11a9c3dc6e7bf3a7999126c9b69d7a9c0b7939ffb18303f3f180b12540a283" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268510909/cfed264124ecabf20c91c2b2/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=ed11a9c3dc6e7bf3a7999126c9b69d7a9c0b7939ffb18303f3f180b12540a283"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will find the following information there:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">First and last name of the learner</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Session registration date</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registration status</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Duration of the session (or presence)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Presence</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Details&gt; View, will allow you to access the learner's detailed progress</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Documents&gt; Notice of meeting and Attestation of attendance (see details below).</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Actions&gt; by clicking on the cross icon ‚ùå, the learner is unsubscribed from the session</p></li></ul><h2 id="updating-learners-attendance" data-post-processed="true">Updating learners' attendance</h2><p class="no-margin">To update your learners' attendance / absence of your learners, access the drop-down menu in the <b>Attendance </b>column. By default, your learners will have the status "<b>Not set</b>", and you can then carry out the update by indicating <b>Here</b> or <b>Note here</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268511749/dc711fbcd85b0555a01d8c65/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=1850469c24f2aaf8ee4e0bd8df303de86756151e23bcb4e46d4c88d79e956f67" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268511749/dc711fbcd85b0555a01d8c65/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=1850469c24f2aaf8ee4e0bd8df303de86756151e23bcb4e46d4c88d79e956f67"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Once the Attendance have been updated, click on <b>Validate</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">As soon as you click on Validate, the corresponding <b>attendance certificates </b>will be automatically generated, and depending on the settings of your training, will also be sent to your learners.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">As a reminder, you can decide whether or not to <b>send Legal Documents </b>to learners in the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Configuration section of the creation of your training courses</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can also click on <b>Everyone present</b>, to automatically indicate that all of your learners have attended the session. The certificates will then be generated / sent.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è By clicking on <b>Everyone present</b>, the entry is automatically <b>Validate </b>and save. It is therefore not recommended to click on <b>Everyone present</b>, to then update only the absences, because a certificate of attendance will then be generated for the learners indicated absent afterwards.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="documents-generated" data-post-processed="true"><br>Documents generated</h2><p class="no-margin">The documents generated are:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Invitation to a classroom</b> (<b>Convocation</b>) &gt; The document is created when registering for the session.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Attestation of attendance </b>&gt; The document is created when the learner is indicated Present at the session (see above).</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Note: It is not possible to update your learners' attendance until the session has started, or has finished.</p><p class="no-margin">Indeed, it is not possible to note that a person has been here to a session that has not yet taken place.</p><p class="no-margin">The interface that will appear will therefore be simplified like this:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268513313/9589da0e94d3998b25badadb/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=804bf9bbdef1ac7565d23ecc95cd7c8f0e31f674047ccf8aa422a02908b7a2b8" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/268513313/9589da0e94d3998b25badadb/image.png?expires=1619959067&amp;signature=804bf9bbdef1ac7565d23ecc95cd7c8f0e31f674047ccf8aa422a02908b7a2b8"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/20/2020.</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Pin a Community message to your uers' Dashboard</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How can I promote a message from the community to my learners? How do I pin a message on their Dashboard?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Administrators and Community Managers have the possibility to <b>pin messages </b>from the Community board in order to promote them to learners.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In the <b>Community </b>board, select the message you want to highlight, and click on the 3 vertical dots for <b>More options</b>. Then click on <b>Pin</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269736239/5bf372e48b8d1ae6094d7f04/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=c04f2a171030d64c057978e681fb80474fa188211705ba710f5fbd89f1d7fd4a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269736239/5bf372e48b8d1ae6094d7f04/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=c04f2a171030d64c057978e681fb80474fa188211705ba710f5fbd89f1d7fd4a"></a></div><p class="no-margin">When pinning a message you can decide whether or not to send a notification to the learners concerned.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269736531/38a62256d6a20aefcaafd552/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=d7fd66efd17e57d0ddc96921e19f2af8cd6783c82f1214ae23fd2a50e46c008e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269736531/38a62256d6a20aefcaafd552/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=d7fd66efd17e57d0ddc96921e19f2af8cd6783c82f1214ae23fd2a50e46c008e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The message will be highlighted on the relevant dashboard via a colored bar to the left of the message. Plus, the mention üìå <b>The message has been pinned </b>at the top of the message will show.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269725442/c9f89a1cda3af95ce7156cc4/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=f25c7c6fa45056f6ea0e2a6684739a4663df657d2943ba0e5bae67edc29a221a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269725442/c9f89a1cda3af95ce7156cc4/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=f25c7c6fa45056f6ea0e2a6684739a4663df657d2943ba0e5bae67edc29a221a"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Pinned messages will be <b>highlighted</b> in your learners' dashboard in the ‚Äú<b>Community Activity</b>‚Äù area in a specific panel titled ‚Äú<b>Pinned Messages</b>‚Äù.</p><p class="no-margin">In the other panel the user  will find all the latest messages published on the Community. This panel is intitled "<b>New messages</b>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269737761/2b76a3d81ab13f2961b3e008/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=834495c56fb45622a0e451540d76f9a79257e4005e42ff7e4bb23ddb9fcf1067" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269737761/2b76a3d81ab13f2961b3e008/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=834495c56fb45622a0e451540d76f9a79257e4005e42ff7e4bb23ddb9fcf1067"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The user will be directed to the discussion board by clicking on the message.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/24/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Access connection times in virtual classrooms via Zoom</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How can I access the connection times of my learners to virtual classes organized with Zoom?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The connection times of your learners to virtual classes are available in your learners' <b>Activity log</b>, as well as directly via the Zoom tool in an Excel extraction.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è If you test this feature, but only connect as a host, your connections will not appear in the connection log. Indeed, at least one participant must be connected for the data to be displayed in Zoom extraction.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="activity-log" data-post-processed="true">Activity log</h2><p class="no-margin">In the <b>user's details page</b>, a dedicated insert displays the user's connection times, including the time spent in virtual classes by the learner.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This page is accessible via:</p><p class="no-margin">Side menu &gt; Training &gt; View &gt; Manage ‚öôÔ∏è Training &gt; üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è View user details.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">For more information, see Section "Detailed Training Results for a Given User" of the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3991118">Access to detailed training statistics article</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/271076275/09ed957bea47a35caadf8856/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=6f2922b1d6487cb45e267c3c34a66c0360ce1fb5aed28716f6dd8c7b907bb54e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/271076275/09ed957bea47a35caadf8856/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=6f2922b1d6487cb45e267c3c34a66c0360ce1fb5aed28716f6dd8c7b907bb54e"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="zoom-tool" data-post-processed="true">Zoom Tool</h2><p class="no-margin">Directly via the Zoom tool, it is also possible to access the connection times to the learners' virtual classes.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">First, log into your Zoom account (or one of your Zoom accounts if you have more than one).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Then go to the Side Menu in the <b>Account Management &gt; Reports &gt; Active Hosts.</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/275002765/80a2e191469227b6c9726fc2/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=5560f8274505c768c2f2cd6f270818a22879595ca1936d621720d87cc1d51902" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/275002765/80a2e191469227b6c9726fc2/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=5560f8274505c768c2f2cd6f270818a22879595ca1936d621720d87cc1d51902"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Identify the desired virtual class (es) and click on the <b>number </b>displayed in the "<b>Participants</b>" column.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/274997487/4fd3d43beff51f2d04b8e62c/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=9f350ff01a7fa362e0db0bac4ea6583669b39cfba4bea33223c1c870e034ae96" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/274997487/4fd3d43beff51f2d04b8e62c/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=9f350ff01a7fa362e0db0bac4ea6583669b39cfba4bea33223c1c870e034ae96"></a></div><p class="no-margin">La liste des connexions √† la ou les r√©unions s√©lectionn√©es s'affiche. Cliquez sur <b>Exporter</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/275003352/7b5367959265c1d88c139a75/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=28fede23d7b1abcfac9478fd195ad9f2da47810997306c43df37122e7d4bfbb8" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/275003352/7b5367959265c1d88c139a75/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=28fede23d7b1abcfac9478fd195ad9f2da47810997306c43df37122e7d4bfbb8"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can also check "<b>Show unique users</b>" so that only unique participants are displayed. Therefore, you will have an aggregated version of the times per participant, rather than a list of each connection by the same participant.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/275003766/c7477642ff99f4344d00ef94/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1f8b08f92de9916d3c37aaebcda071bf8172dc1d4e074924208ea2b4f464be8d" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/275003766/c7477642ff99f4344d00ef94/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1f8b08f92de9916d3c37aaebcda071bf8172dc1d4e074924208ea2b4f464be8d"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 12/08/2020</i></p></article>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Assess Skills</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to assess skills in the Rise Up plateform?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <span class="avatar__image avatar__fallback"> K </span>

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Katalin Fazekas</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">As a first step, you need to create skills in the General Menu:</p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/274420031/ac52473d9b87c3e9bab51371/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=121a967fa1ac006452817715b8a95ec34c8e7506c8aa0f1b00fd13d65c2f9802" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/274420031/ac52473d9b87c3e9bab51371/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=121a967fa1ac006452817715b8a95ec34c8e7506c8aa0f1b00fd13d65c2f9802"></a></div><p class="no-margin">To do this, go to <b>General Menu</b> &gt; "<b>Skills</b>" &gt; "<b>Create</b>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279072144/d77cccbdc5decdc7715066b8/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=4b8ceb5dd1d01cc6887383c1f0c5b399514da00a117aa6634bb068c10a3dd823" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279072144/d77cccbdc5decdc7715066b8/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=4b8ceb5dd1d01cc6887383c1f0c5b399514da00a117aa6634bb068c10a3dd823"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In the pop-up that appears, you can name the skill, give it a description and eventually link it to a theme if you had configured any in advance.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create a theme, go to <b>General Menu</b> &gt; "<b>Skills</b>" &gt; "<b>Themes</b>" &gt; "<b>Create theme</b>"</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279074187/0fc6ef6e9e056024ba51b521/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=93a4a818ac05b1010dc59f48639981197cada5a46e8aa6f5956216d8693f078f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279074187/0fc6ef6e9e056024ba51b521/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=93a4a818ac05b1010dc59f48639981197cada5a46e8aa6f5956216d8693f078f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will need to name the theme and then you can link skills to it.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The themes and/or skills can be linked to trainings/training paths in the training/training path <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3974276">configuration </a>page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To assess a skill, go to the "<b>Trainings</b>" &gt; "<b>Manage training</b>" &gt; "<b>User details</b>" page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can add a skill assessment by clicking on the little "<b>+</b>" below the "<b>User results</b>" section.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279076837/a3fd76941b2808e2d1f1e95b/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=11f3ac0c5d46232d26ac1f75ae313ef7429c2232914e2f25ce45215355b3753e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279076837/a3fd76941b2808e2d1f1e95b/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=11f3ac0c5d46232d26ac1f75ae313ef7429c2232914e2f25ce45215355b3753e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Depending on what you have configured in "<b>Settings</b>" / "<b>Skills management</b>", you will be able to assess the preconfigured skills linked to the training by</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">a note:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279078700/ecb292998e312a76ecb295b7/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=3031ca653d069b0ba3e7e870431c81254ae46fcf35e982dbeceea6e7f4b430a6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279078700/ecb292998e312a76ecb295b7/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=3031ca653d069b0ba3e7e870431c81254ae46fcf35e982dbeceea6e7f4b430a6"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">a note and a comment:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279079176/80285b0a4e3f584b26d21bb2/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2ab9e49c1c04a19dd99a8262b5ad201ba4e2cd2b59562e56c239039bcfc5aea4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279079176/80285b0a4e3f584b26d21bb2/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2ab9e49c1c04a19dd99a8262b5ad201ba4e2cd2b59562e56c239039bcfc5aea4"></a></div><p class="no-margin">a comment:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279079490/3ec8450e86548225daeedcf2/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=abea7647a380223cb993bb87362d8ed65fcaf5c7ee2e6a5d9e2429a9eb431f3e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279079490/3ec8450e86548225daeedcf2/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=abea7647a380223cb993bb87362d8ed65fcaf5c7ee2e6a5d9e2429a9eb431f3e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Once the assessment is validated, it will appear on the "<b>User Details</b>" page, the user will find this page by clicking on the link in their notifications.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/274414975/311513c079b154dfec807826/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=e3882b651429b18aac7a2b949e11f74528d03c141f7c64f50287078009a60b27" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/274414975/311513c079b154dfec807826/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=e3882b651429b18aac7a2b949e11f74528d03c141f7c64f50287078009a60b27"></a></div><p class="no-margin">OR</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The user can also find the assessment of their skills in the "<b>My trainings</b>" tab &gt; click on the training in question &gt; "<b>My results</b>"</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279081721/6497e5e5c1fa031e896dd18e/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=12ddd9274c8da32ac27c354a121ebc6ea4496921e13dc2c5ab16e65ab28212c7" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/279081721/6497e5e5c1fa031e896dd18e/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=12ddd9274c8da32ac27c354a121ebc6ea4496921e13dc2c5ab16e65ab28212c7"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Roles having access to skills management: <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3973902">Administrator, Designer, Facilitator</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">For more information on skills, see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/4698702">Configure skills management</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Enjoy browsing Rise-Up! üéà‚ú®</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Last updated on 18/12/2020.</p></article>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Dimensions and formats accepted</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Formats of visuals, documents and training content supported by Rise Up
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><h2 id="dimensions-accepted--recommended" data-post-processed="true">Dimensions accepted / recommended</h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Training logo</b>: 500 * 500 (square format only) </p><p class="no-margin"><b>Training banner</b>: 1800 * 450  </p><p class="no-margin"><b>Wallpaper of the login page</b>: 1920 * 1080</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Documents and Video</b>:</p><p class="no-margin">Maximum 1 GB </p><p class="no-margin">16 : 9 optimization (videos encoded in several formats) <br>Note that with regard to the videos used for the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3966535">customization of the platform</a>, the limitation is 10 MB.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è If you are having difficulty importing content (video, audio, etc.), we invite you:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">to check that your file is not corrupted,</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">that its title contains no space or accent</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Scorm module</b>:</p><p class="no-margin">Maximum 1 GB. The recommended scorm formats are Scorm 2004 and Scorm 1.2.</p><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è If there is a problem with uploading your scorm, test it at <a href="https://cloud.scorm.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cloud.scorm.com/</a>. </p><p class="no-margin">You will need to : Create a free account, Click on Add Content on the top right hand side, and upload your scorm to get it tested. <br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="formats-accepted" data-post-processed="true">Formats accepted</h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Text documents</b>: </p><p class="no-margin">'as',' as3 ',' asm ',' bat ',' c ',' cc ',' cmake ',' cpp ',' cs', 'css',' csv ',' cxx ',' diff ',' doc ',' docx ',' erb ',' gdoc ',' groovy ',' gsheet ',' h ',' haml ',' hh ',' htm ',' html ', 'java', 'js',' less', 'm', 'make', 'ml', 'mm', 'msg', 'ods',' odt ',' pdf ',' php ',' pl ',' properties', 'py', 'rb', 'rtf', 'sass',' scala ',' scm ',' script ',' sh ',' sml ',' sql ',' txt ', 'vi', 'vim', 'wpd', 'xls', 'xlsm', 'xlsx', 'xml', 'xsd', 'xsl', 'yaml'</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">PDF files should not be collections, have a password, or contain watermarks.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Presentations</b>: </p><p class="no-margin">'odp', 'ppt', 'pptx' </p><p class="no-margin">Animations in Powerpoint are not compatible with Rise Up.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Images</b>:</p><p class="no-margin">'ai', 'bmp', 'gif', 'eps', 'jpeg', 'jpg', 'png', 'ps', 'psd', 'svg', 'tif', 'tiff', 'dcm', 'dicm', 'dicom', 'svs', 'tga'</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Audio files</b>: </p><p class="no-margin">'aac', 'aifc', 'aiff', 'amr', 'au', 'flac', 'm4a', 'mp3', 'ogg', 'ra', 'wav', 'wma'</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Video files</b>:</p><p class="no-margin">'avi', 'mp4', 'webm', 'mkv', 'flv' </p><p class="no-margin">The <b>recommended format is mp4,</b> the other formats can have a variable level of compatibility.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>3D</b>: </p><p class="no-margin">'obj', 'stl', 'fbx', '3ds', 'dae', 'ply'</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 10/21/2020</i></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Learner Dashboard</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            What information is displayed on a learner dashboard? What notifications are displayed to the learner?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">On logging in, an average learner goes straight to their <b>Dashboard</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264375626/a55f70662614e0dbe524978c/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=b6e8bef15e1481f3419455d6860a22f4feef8563666c5026d9f987c45bba9eb4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264375626/a55f70662614e0dbe524978c/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=b6e8bef15e1481f3419455d6860a22f4feef8563666c5026d9f987c45bba9eb4"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br>Note that unlike an Administrator Dashboard, the Learner sees first the <b>training courses to which he is registered</b>, and has neither access to the Management Side Menu, nor to the Platform Settings.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">A Learner Dashboard mainly consists of the following sections:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My trainings</b>: Three trainings the learner is registered to;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Dashboard</b>: Learner statistics ;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Community Activity</b>: Latest Community posts ;</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">And on the vertical left section of the screen, depending on the settings made on the platform, the learner will find : his level, his future face-to-face sessions, his objectives, his groups, news from the platform ...</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="my-trainings" data-post-processed="true">My Trainings</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218855263/cbd0566740586c0ca364ae40/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=bc6bd7e1154d02d350cf993d5309e74afbec7ad2e9ec50a6c096f6d10a59b5a5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218855263/cbd0566740586c0ca364ae40/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=bc6bd7e1154d02d350cf993d5309e74afbec7ad2e9ec50a6c096f6d10a59b5a5"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From his dashboard, the learner has immediate access to his training courses for which he is already registered. He can : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Resume</b> : to access a training he already started, he can resume his training where he had left it. </p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Begin</b> : to access a training he has not started yet.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">The 3 training courses displayed on the Learner Dashboard appear according to the following rules:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Display by registration date, the training for which registration is the most recent appears on the left;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If a training course is completed, it will be placed towards the end;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If several training courses belong to training paths, they will be classified in the order of the training path;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registrations for courses on which there has been an update (that is to say modification of time spent, progress or completion status) will be placed at the beginning.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="dashboard" data-post-processed="true">Dashboard</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264377987/16db1e516bdf5a44a88df447/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=386d52fcebef6fefdece3205101dd4f7c8855888b4ecf067ee709fde48eef3b3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264377987/16db1e516bdf5a44a88df447/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=386d52fcebef6fefdece3205101dd4f7c8855888b4ecf067ee709fde48eef3b3"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The Dashboard section contains the main statistics of the learner.<br><br></p><h2 id="community-activity-only-if-activated" data-post-processed="true">Community Activity (only if activated)</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218859089/ecc63e7a5925e0d1b9abcccd/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=714db6889fdd1b558323db9867be0db3355e17ba471f86b85c10e8db51f4d6d0" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218859089/ecc63e7a5925e0d1b9abcccd/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=714db6889fdd1b558323db9867be0db3355e17ba471f86b85c10e8db51f4d6d0"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b> </b>‚öôÔ∏è You can activate / deactivate the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3957886">Community section </a>in the dedicated <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3957886">section from the Configuration menu</a>. If the Community feature is deactivated, no activity will appear on the dashboard.</p><p class="no-margin">In the central part of the Dashboard, just below the courses to which he is registered, the learner has access to the messages published in the Community space. </p><p class="no-margin">Only messages related to his community are displayed here, therefore the messages intended for all, present in the General Table, as well as the Tables to which he is linked (training courses he follows, group to which he belongs, etc.).<br><br></p><h2 id="to-do-my-objectives-my-groups" data-post-processed="true">To do, My objectives, My Groups</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218859856/6b26a077ac83402ada3f1f38/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=90ba55db9b846440ec3129b472c466a99a0d541f644df02bb04140bcf211c5ca" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218859856/6b26a077ac83402ada3f1f38/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=90ba55db9b846440ec3129b472c466a99a0d541f644df02bb04140bcf211c5ca"></a></div><p class="no-margin">On the left banner (outlined in red on the screen above), the learner quickly views:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The things he has to do in the<b> To do</b> insert; generally, for an average learner, this is where to view future classroom sessions or virtual classes he has to take.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The objective(s) assigned to him. These are his assigned personal objectives (possibly linked to his membership of a group).</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The groups he belongs to.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Note that for each group created, it can be decided to ‚Äúhide‚Äù membership of this group from its members.  In this case, the particular group will not appear on the learner‚Äôs Dashboard.<br><br></p><h2 id="my-account-search-calendar-notifications" data-post-processed="true">My Account, Search, Calendar, Notifications</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860527/fa768d79c9dae29820238aac/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=118647665c5d9554c2bb5b735d02e7a615e55144f65610776cda72d1b20dc8e5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860527/fa768d79c9dae29820238aac/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=118647665c5d9554c2bb5b735d02e7a615e55144f65610776cda72d1b20dc8e5"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>From the Screen-top Banner (right side - outlined in green), learners can access the following items:</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860793/869dec41e56ad15f016401ab/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=96e9051c4967b4d2b89c22d6bd89e2637045e56beafadd47959fa9aa7f2b4da4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860793/869dec41e56ad15f016401ab/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=96e9051c4967b4d2b89c22d6bd89e2637045e56beafadd47959fa9aa7f2b4da4"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The <b>magnifying glass</b> performs a quick search for training by entering part of the name of the training -&gt; in the window that opens with the different training courses matching the search, clicking the name of the training searched will redirect the learner straight to the Training Presentation Sheet in the Catalog.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860851/59cd7f7a4e63ef69a64d831f/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=4ea9685705ff9cce0d7db9f1c795ad9cc1253f0b9b9172883a7e5d2c2ac61aa6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860851/59cd7f7a4e63ef69a64d831f/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=4ea9685705ff9cce0d7db9f1c795ad9cc1253f0b9b9172883a7e5d2c2ac61aa6"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>The calendar</b> gives direct access to the learner‚Äôs calendar</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860964/0af6ccb60750db1e6f8362fd/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=eaceb20604eebde2ac3e354991732662ce7d94f0a1c2a173760f18974bae773b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218860964/0af6ccb60750db1e6f8362fd/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=eaceb20604eebde2ac3e354991732662ce7d94f0a1c2a173760f18974bae773b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The <b>bell</b> allows direct access to notifications</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218861022/c0e17961612adddfa2c9cd1f/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=65c32689e4d3730495b27491aa03d704c1fbef30c5d274667cc05f6653d5caed" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218861022/c0e17961612adddfa2c9cd1f/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=65c32689e4d3730495b27491aa03d704c1fbef30c5d274667cc05f6653d5caed"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking their photo or first name, learners can log out of the platform or, more particularly, access their personal account : <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3957865">My Account</a>.<br><br></p><h2 id="community-catalog-and-my-trainings-" data-post-processed="true">Community, Catalog and My trainings </h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218864180/e3310529e7be86f22da3c5df/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=a21c9f4853490ce23794b524b7c9da9d2a0d87a11dbc1c401bdf992df7392933" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218864180/e3310529e7be86f22da3c5df/image.png?expires=1620407101&amp;signature=a21c9f4853490ce23794b524b7c9da9d2a0d87a11dbc1c401bdf992df7392933"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Community</b>: The Community tab will only appear if the Community was activated in the configuration.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Catalog: </b>The Catalog tab will only appear if either the Catalog or Resource Library, or both, were activated in the configuration.<br>In the <b>Catalog</b>, Users can view all training to which it has been decided to give them access. They can request registration for some training from the Catalog, subject to approval by their line manager.<br>The Catalog gives users access to the Resource<b> Library</b>, which contains documents (all kinds of documents, text, videos, iframe, etc.) that may be useful to learners.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My training</b>: User can view all training and training paths for which they have been registered as a learner.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"><br></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 09/11/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">My Account configuration</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 06/17/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">By clicking their photo or first name, learners can access their personal account : <b>My Account</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218861022/c0e17961612adddfa2c9cd1f/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=4ebaf30a113e5f5294e0e9d1351d360291c272d9499cc320087aff251f6f844f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218861022/c0e17961612adddfa2c9cd1f/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=4ebaf30a113e5f5294e0e9d1351d360291c272d9499cc320087aff251f6f844f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Below, the user‚Äôs <b>My Account</b> sheet</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218863303/26052e16a340eb3b1bc92444/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=9c2a2200254372e036f5f63b47aa08f9c3312925f0fb1a25611cf0824c0be7d9" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218863303/26052e16a340eb3b1bc92444/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=9c2a2200254372e036f5f63b47aa08f9c3312925f0fb1a25611cf0824c0be7d9"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The user‚Äôs personal data are presented on 4 tabs:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My information</b>, presenting the user‚Äôs main data: contact details (first &amp; last name, telephone number., e-mail address, language, etc.) and customized fields that were configured as ‚Äúvisible at registration‚Äù in the pre-configuration set up by the Administrators. The user is free to edit the information shown on this tab.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My history</b>, listing the training and training paths the learner is currently taking (‚Äúin progress‚Äù) and those ‚Äúcompleted‚Äù</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My legal documents</b>, giving access to the learner‚Äôs legal documents, with a built-in search tool</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My notification, </b>allows you to deactivate the Rise Up Academy thumbnail appearing on the Administrators and Designers dashboard. To deactivate it, check the<b> Hide Rise Up Academy box in my dashboard</b>.<br>By default, the insert to Rise Up Academy appears below the picture of the user at the top left of the dashboard. This is displayed only for Administrators, Partner Administrators and Designers (see visual below).<br>Rise Up Academy give access to information such as tutorials and short trainings on the new features on Rise Up.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/302071312/0475173e2bf4f0a4fe1344bd/kjb.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=476b3273ab678f54439a9dd166ee777e79e8afbbbf931c95db58040fc676e231" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/302071312/0475173e2bf4f0a4fe1344bd/kjb.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=476b3273ab678f54439a9dd166ee777e79e8afbbbf931c95db58040fc676e231"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Security</b>, enabling learners firstly to <b>change their password</b> and secondly to access their <b>QR code for quick access to the mobile app</b> for their training platform.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218864886/b5815c254f03882411a0bc60/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=fb439c459321783f4e39bbf5cd55e34ff6730481a0a1434341b7695200ac6ea4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218864886/b5815c254f03882411a0bc60/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=fb439c459321783f4e39bbf5cd55e34ff6730481a0a1434341b7695200ac6ea4"></a></div></article>
    </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Administrator Dashboard</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 06/17/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>

        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Below is a screenshot of an Administrator‚Äôs Dashboard.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241708373/dcf6051e336ad3110a1c42bc/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=acdcb4241f1283169f983d3ac34d026ed4113e7ed0819710d267ff11b9d50f5b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241708373/dcf6051e336ad3110a1c42bc/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=acdcb4241f1283169f983d3ac34d026ed4113e7ed0819710d267ff11b9d50f5b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Icons outlined in red are only visible to Internal Administrators (i.e. the Administrators of the Main Platform, known as the Internal Platform).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Below you will find the meaning of the main icons and buttons found on the platform:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Configuration</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Hamburger Menu </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">View</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Edit</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Pin</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">More options</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Search</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Notifications</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Helpcenter</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Calendar<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="configuration" data-post-processed="true">Configuration</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241708623/a24ff05358dabacb3a4a84f5/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=78c53feec3a6400a5994f97bf53c6f6828f3e7715aaa3a3cc2d907886b4c07f3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241708623/a24ff05358dabacb3a4a84f5/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=78c53feec3a6400a5994f97bf53c6f6828f3e7715aaa3a3cc2d907886b4c07f3"></a></div><p class="no-margin">This icon ‚öôÔ∏è only appears in the screen-top banner for administrators of the platform and gives them access to the platform‚Äôs configuration.</p><p class="no-margin">When modifying any part of the platform‚Äôs configuration, don‚Äôt forget to save the changes made by going to the bottom of the page and clicking the <b>Save</b> button, generally at bottom right of the page. Otherwise, no modification will be implemented.<br><br></p><h2 id="hamburger-menu" data-post-processed="true">Hamburger menu</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241708748/1c4a72b70e75dcd9ced265c8/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=ddaab8afcc6eb1e81176aa5e60e84b97fd332690ae9c949e401ac78bc507813f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241708748/1c4a72b70e75dcd9ced265c8/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=ddaab8afcc6eb1e81176aa5e60e84b97fd332690ae9c949e401ac78bc507813f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Also called Main management menu or dropdown menu.</p><p class="no-margin">It is at top left of the screen-top banner for administrators (of the main platform and, where applicable, partner platforms), designers, facilitators and group managers. Everyone will have access to a variety of sections of the dropdown menu, depending on their role.</p><p class="no-margin"><b> </b></p><h2 id="view" data-post-processed="true">View</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709070/a1ea64f8aa06b3c255441b5e/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=f7d06004f7109df057d2cc8ad5366cab018790e13ca330d7cdd2b659c0082256" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709070/a1ea64f8aa06b3c255441b5e/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=f7d06004f7109df057d2cc8ad5366cab018790e13ca330d7cdd2b659c0082256"></a></div><p class="no-margin">This Eye icon lets you view the selected item (training, user, etc.). When clicking on the icon, you access to the related detailed information.<br><br></p><h2 id="edit" data-post-processed="true">Edit</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218846446/b9488651e66f00f968e8d4e5/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=2bfd6c69d750e132cc8e8e4a512a49b1d0bf8cdb3744bad106a96c935dec45ca" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218846446/b9488651e66f00f968e8d4e5/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=2bfd6c69d750e132cc8e8e4a512a49b1d0bf8cdb3744bad106a96c935dec45ca"></a></div><p class="no-margin">This pencil icon allows you to edit the element concerned (training, session, etc.). By clicking on the icon, you will access the element modification interface.<br><br></p><h2 id="pin-" data-post-processed="true">Pin </h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218846818/b2bc338276a594d5c70124e6/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=ab4143009b05dc523807e634c61685ef2b371a76b84e1149a15b0dd4f09fabcd" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218846818/b2bc338276a594d5c70124e6/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=ab4143009b05dc523807e634c61685ef2b371a76b84e1149a15b0dd4f09fabcd"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Clicking this button highlights the corresponding item by moving it to the top of the screen for greater visibility. Clicking it again will ‚Äúun-pin‚Äù the item.<br><br></p><h2 id="more-options" data-post-processed="true">More options</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218846984/c8264c5c2a12f63f9360c7b4/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=ddabfc78e55a4928cfaf0b18763a38bf99944258401b683f23d001b4bf5d9dca" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218846984/c8264c5c2a12f63f9360c7b4/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=ddabfc78e55a4928cfaf0b18763a38bf99944258401b683f23d001b4bf5d9dca"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Clicking this icon brings up a menu with several options appropriate to the context<br><br></p><h2 id="search" data-post-processed="true">Search</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709342/43902edb11bd5737aaf49aef/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=2e2eeaff3545fcfcf400e947244616d93d4f8f8c4535e56ffbbcb286e8585888" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709342/43902edb11bd5737aaf49aef/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=2e2eeaff3545fcfcf400e947244616d93d4f8f8c4535e56ffbbcb286e8585888"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The magnifying glass at top right of the screen-top banner performs a quick search for particular training or a particular user (for administrators, designers, facilitators, etc.) and for learners a quick search for a particular training course.<br><br></p><h2 id="notifications" data-post-processed="true">Notifications</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709492/b747789b2458e4c892d24657/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=5a253c67b671a1393c345ff56b2201e5c38a866196495f77f5b8c3572f017135" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709492/b747789b2458e4c892d24657/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=5a253c67b671a1393c345ff56b2201e5c38a866196495f77f5b8c3572f017135"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In My Notifications, users have access to all their notifications related to administering the Platform. For example, a training designer will receive notification when any training they have created has been approved. This icon is not visible to <b>Learner</b> profiles.<br><br></p><h2 id="help-center" data-post-processed="true">Help center</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709586/c5cb45d19c39e13c0687a3ee/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=3810d030422a8063db6b1e59a2e3091b1c26221493495d13844d88080d36509b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709586/c5cb45d19c39e13c0687a3ee/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=3810d030422a8063db6b1e59a2e3091b1c26221493495d13844d88080d36509b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking the Help Center, administrators have access to the Rise Up Help Center presenting all information and features on the platform.  <br><br></p><h2 id="calendar" data-post-processed="true">Calendar</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709673/4c523c436401443c9a6fa127/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=a6272d02947ccad56fb54b9b6815f70de4b1a033dafdc728d52ce23bad0a8165" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241709673/4c523c436401443c9a6fa127/image.png?expires=1620405419&amp;signature=a6272d02947ccad56fb54b9b6815f70de4b1a033dafdc728d52ce23bad0a8165"></a></div><p class="no-margin">It is possible to go straight to your calendar to find the classroom sessions (possibly virtual classes) for which you are registered.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Different ways to register for training</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/24/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">To take a training, learners must be registered to at least one of them (as soon as they are registered for a training, it appears on their <b>Dashboard</b> and learners only have to click<b> Begin</b> to start their training).</p><p class="no-margin">There are 3 different registration methods :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Mode 1/ Direct registration -&gt;</b> done by implementing smart rules (typically -&gt; for the Newcomers group) or by one-off registration by the administrator/partner administrator or by creators/designers for trainings they have created themselves</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Mode 2/ Registration request by the employee from the Catalog -&gt;</b> Awaiting approval by an Administrator or a Group Manager -&gt; once the registration request has been approved, the relevant training will immediately appear in the learner‚Äôs Dashboard, who will only have to click BEGIN.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Mode 3/ Training request via a Form -&gt;</b> for external training given by external training organizations (generally classroom sessions) that you wish to highlight.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="direct-registration-mode-1" data-post-processed="true">Direct registration (Mode 1)</h2><p class="no-margin">Learners have nothing to do. They will have direct access to their training, as listed on their Dashboard.<br><br></p><h2 id="registering-for-training-from-the-catalog-mode-2-" data-post-processed="true">Registering for training from the Catalog (Mode 2) </h2><p class="no-margin">Learners can search the Catalog for training for which they want to register. A search tool on the left of the screen makes it easier to search for training (sorted by category, session dates, location, etc.).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking <b>See more</b> for one of the training courses presented in the Catalog, learners have access (below) to the training description sheet containing a description, objectives of the training, and the various modules. They also see the different opinions that may have been posted about the training by other learners.<br></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230183832/1f4b9fa95648c740cd7fcf8e/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=b2c9ae65740319f39e106d95141e917a96e3e32eda2ce8e93170ad4ff623ae4c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230183832/1f4b9fa95648c740cd7fcf8e/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=b2c9ae65740319f39e106d95141e917a96e3e32eda2ce8e93170ad4ff623ae4c"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking <b>Sign Up</b>, learners initiate a training request that will be forwarded to the administrators (or partner administrators, as applicable, if the learner is a partner learner) and possibly to their Group Manager.<br><br></p><h2 id="registration-for-training-not-included-in-the-catalog-mode-3" data-post-processed="true">Registration for training not included in the Catalog (Mode 3)</h2><p class="no-margin">To request registration for training not included in the Catalog, learners can click on <b>Can‚Äôt find your training ?</b> (outlined in red in the screenshot below).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230184244/093c1f4fd979faba1f801aab/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=1083db2f4ae99ff5ddd660d177f0b566149c244fdc5bdec8fe2fe31fc2e868d8" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230184244/093c1f4fd979faba1f801aab/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=1083db2f4ae99ff5ddd660d177f0b566149c244fdc5bdec8fe2fe31fc2e868d8"></a></div><p class="no-margin">‚öôÔ∏è<i>  For this prompt to appear, the Administrator must have previously configured the platform accordingly (checkbox ‚Äú<b>Activate training requests in the catalog</b>‚Äù must have been checked in the Configuration).</i></p><p class="no-margin">A form will appear, in which learners can express their training needs and describe any external training that might interest them.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230184352/053c79e046ca934bca2dc3f3/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=7bcae2eab11a3ce77500c53daefcbfe0f6a58eece1fc5d19d2f2f1ca45eed1d1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230184352/053c79e046ca934bca2dc3f3/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=7bcae2eab11a3ce77500c53daefcbfe0f6a58eece1fc5d19d2f2f1ca45eed1d1"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Once the form has been completed and submited, the request is forwarded to the administrators (or partner administrators, as applicable, if the learner is a partner learner) and possibly to their Group Manager.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
