      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><h2 id="help-center" data-post-processed="true">Help center</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/214338151/265b2d81aaabe54426ffd807/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=23be3a499fcb241cf75ec1fe0602ff9d12788fd13836f365d1efd3c34d895fa2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/214338151/265b2d81aaabe54426ffd807/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=23be3a499fcb241cf75ec1fe0602ff9d12788fd13836f365d1efd3c34d895fa2"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking the Help Center, administrators have access to the Rise Up Help Center presenting all information and features on the platform.<br><br></p><h2 id="online-help-chat" data-post-processed="true">Online help chat</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218851057/ba1272497482b04ade633ef5/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=774df45edb9b85f7285579b1adb12b40b9edd385c8354cb905a0d82cf631a9c6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218851057/ba1272497482b04ade633ef5/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=774df45edb9b85f7285579b1adb12b40b9edd385c8354cb905a0d82cf631a9c6"></a></div><p class="no-margin">If you are an administrator, the icon above is available at the bottom right of the screen on every page. This is online help chat, allowing you to put questions to Rise Up teams.<br><br></p><h2 id="access-to-rise-up-caf-" data-post-processed="true">Access to Rise Up Caf√© </h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218850721/fc9b3448b7e443128a157866/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=edd3d970362168d7576779cf341abb1f4e1208278679facf538cac7d48d6395d" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218850721/fc9b3448b7e443128a157866/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=edd3d970362168d7576779cf341abb1f4e1208278679facf538cac7d48d6395d"></a></div><p class="no-margin">At any time, if you are an administrator, partner administrator, designer or community manager, you can access our discussion space dedicated to Rise Up and more generally the training world. It has tutorials on the Rise-Up Platform and on new features implemented, as well as countless tips on best training practices.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Rise Up Caf√© is accessible:</b></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Either from the thumbnail above, located on the right of your screen, by scrolling down from your Dashboard.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Or by clicking <b>Rise Up Caf√©</b> in the window that opens by clicking your first name or profile picture at top right of the screen-top banner.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218850946/a0f4037f3fddd0928665a250/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=726d1bf4a090b506ec85b9aba3be1393602d445288ba8276e10a6c4f50237f39" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/218850946/a0f4037f3fddd0928665a250/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=726d1bf4a090b506ec85b9aba3be1393602d445288ba8276e10a6c4f50237f39"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>

</div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Manage e-mail templates</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/05/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Can be accessed in two ways : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Side menu</b> &gt; <b>E-mails</b> &gt; <b>Manage templates</b> </p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Side menu</b> &gt; <b>E-mails</b> &gt; <b>View</b> &gt; <b>Manage E-mails templates </b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">First of all, you can customize your email templates differently depending on the Platform (Internal Platform / Partner Platforms). All you have to do is choose in <b>Perimeter</b> (see screen below) the Platform for which you want to customize the email template.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233502249/9ee57c4c8d63cbf4dc3e2429/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+11.25.45.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=223f0eb77c53a8954bab776aa13dcae0e66a761142c085d2d17a3cf97a2c3524" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233502249/9ee57c4c8d63cbf4dc3e2429/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+11.25.45.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=223f0eb77c53a8954bab776aa13dcae0e66a761142c085d2d17a3cf97a2c3524"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The available and configurable Perimeters are:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Default</b>: This is the default configuration applied when no modification has been made on the other perimeters (internal &amp; partner).</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Internal</b>: This is the configuration applied to your users linked to the Internal perimeter and therefore not linked to a partner.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Partner</b> X: In addition, as many partners as you have created will be displayed in the drop-down list, allowing you to configure the e-mail templates partner by partner.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è <b>If you make changes to email templates on the Default perimeter, these will be automatically applied to all the perimeters (Internal &amp; Partner)</b>. EXCEPT if you modify one or more email templates on perimeters (internal or partner), then it will be the modifications made to these models that will take precedence over those made via the Default perimeter. </p><p class="no-margin">The modifications made to the Default perimeter therefore apply by default if no modification has been made to the other perimeters.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">From this screen, it is possible to manage more than 60 email templates offered by the platform.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To do this, you must select the template you want to modify from the available list</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233503283/be9e83bd48a82cc64642ae0f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+11.29.58.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=e5302b8668169a334a4dcfc09f5f93ba84fae7c75e233eedf53950b4aaa5799b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233503283/be9e83bd48a82cc64642ae0f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+11.29.58.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=e5302b8668169a334a4dcfc09f5f93ba84fae7c75e233eedf53950b4aaa5799b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Just below are the business rules for the selected email template:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Email recipients</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The events that trigger the automatic sending of the email</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">An explanatory note</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">You view the email as defined by default but you can modify the proposed email template by modifying the text, the shape, or even by adding some available dynamic variables presented on the left side.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è <b>Dynamic variables</b> correspond to information which varies as soon as a standard document is generated, depending on the corresponding information. For example: the first name of the learner varies from one convention to another depending on the identity of the learner concerned. In order to modify / integrate them into your email templates, you just need to copy them from the available list, and paste them into the email template you want to customize. We invite you to<b> Paste in plain text</b> your variables so that they are integrated with the final formatting. To do so right click then <b>Paste in plain text</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">It is also possible to integrate into the email templates the variables corresponding to the <b>custom fields</b> that may have been created upstream in the settings.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Note that you can switch to the other available languages, by clicking on the chosen language on the template (for example : English). You can then personalize the template in English as you wish, which will be sent to any recipient who has chosen any language other than French in their profile (see <b>My account</b> by clicking on their first name or photo at the top right of the banner top of screen). </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233551802/a3f969e4c7eadf81d24a9281/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+11.40.52.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f75f36420de2045c46b6c5b1b3a3b544bc855e14161ebb3ad361c576896970ac" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233551802/a3f969e4c7eadf81d24a9281/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+11.40.52.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f75f36420de2045c46b6c5b1b3a3b544bc855e14161ebb3ad361c576896970ac"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Once the changes have been made, you can test the modified template, by clicking on the "<b>Test the template</b>" button. This then triggers the sending of the e-mail as you modified it in your mailbox (check that your e-mail address has been entered correctly in your My account area).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Note that when you Test the template, the dynamic variables are not replaced in the generated test document.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The sender of the email is: Rise Up Team &lt;<a href="mailto:no-reply@riseup.ai" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">no-reply@riseup.ai</a>&gt;.</p><p class="no-margin">So you can check the rendering of the email as you have customized it.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Below is the email received in your inbox:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233551008/f19b7bce194de23beaad245b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+14.04.57.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=efaac59ab0b8343a4c318b91960284192220ffb33bd8bc3cdc9edcf4e16539a7" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233551008/f19b7bce194de23beaad245b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+14.04.57.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=efaac59ab0b8343a4c318b91960284192220ffb33bd8bc3cdc9edcf4e16539a7"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can return to the default template any time by clicking on <b>Reset template</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>See original template</b> you can display the original template. Then clicking again on the same button takes you back to the template that you are modifying. This is an aid for writing / modifying your email template.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Modify legal documents templates</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to customize the legal documents generated by the platform?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Legal Documents</b> &gt; <b>Manage Templates</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233903550/f74dbb13fcae7f32e01f5bd8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.49.18.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1524ee56fbb818580eb4a6d0af9c80de0abe8ee768f993ad06a6f8fcb2dcd88c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233903550/f74dbb13fcae7f32e01f5bd8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.49.18.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1524ee56fbb818580eb4a6d0af9c80de0abe8ee768f993ad06a6f8fcb2dcd88c"></a></div><p class="no-margin">As with email templates, it is possible to customize the templates of legal documents differently depending on the platform (Internal or partner platform).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To customize a template, you must:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Define the Perimeter</b>: that is to say define the relevant Platform (Internal, or Partner)</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233904387/2a1dd1dfb0a88b3c53c98c67/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.51.45.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=a7d4a6dd7a8924f3360a532fd40e5fb965cf6731ab93bcb08682846c5b69549a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233904387/2a1dd1dfb0a88b3c53c98c67/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.51.45.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=a7d4a6dd7a8924f3360a532fd40e5fb965cf6731ab93bcb08682846c5b69549a"></a></div><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è If you customize your documents on the Internal Perimeter, and wish to use the same ones for your Partner perimeters, you will <b>need to make the same modifications by selecting each of your partners </b>and copying the modifications. The modifications applied to one perimeter do not automatically apply to the others.<br></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Choose the Legal Document </b>you want to customize from the drop-down list of all available documents.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233928270/1f4b9c850db4af6e6116f5f2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+13.14.44.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=9644bd847025968f2104cca7b0988642a64cb4754c76810f7d9585953505a857" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233928270/1f4b9c850db4af6e6116f5f2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+13.14.44.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=9644bd847025968f2104cca7b0988642a64cb4754c76810f7d9585953505a857"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Choose the language</b> (French, English and German) of the document template you want to customize. Note that the English version is there by default. Therefore, it is the English version that will be generated when no other language has not been chosen (see <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3957865">My Account</a>).</p></li></ul><ul><li><p class="no-margin">In the lower part of the page, all you have to do is adapt the content of the document (text and form) and, if necessary, use the available <b>dynamic variables</b> listed on the left part of the screen.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Dynamic variables correspond to information that varies as soon as a standard document is generated, depending on the corresponding information. For example: the first name of the learner varies from one document to another depending on the identity of the learner concerned. In order to modify / integrate them into your email templates, you just have to copy them from the available list, and paste them into the email template you want to customize.</p><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è We invite you to <b>Paste in plain text</b> your variables so that they are integrated in the final formatting. To do so Right click then Paste in plain text.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Before saving any changes made to the legal document, you can test this customization by clicking on <b>Test the template</b> (the modified template will then be sent to your email address). It is always possible, if you are not satisfied with the changes made, to reset the template by clicking on <b>Reset template</b>. </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Note that when you <b>Test the template</b>, the dynamic variables are not replaced in the generated test document.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233931792/c664f1b61ccee5d855d9682d/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+13.25.13.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d5bfd0be3db8c4c8ed71e0818a31d5e37cde17774cc0f9ef527d542b72f45a5f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233931792/c664f1b61ccee5d855d9682d/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+13.25.13.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d5bfd0be3db8c4c8ed71e0818a31d5e37cde17774cc0f9ef527d542b72f45a5f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>See original template</b> you display the original template. Then by clicking again, you come back to the template you are modifying. This can help you easily write / modify your legal document template.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 08/06/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>

</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu </b>&gt; <b>Certificates</b> &gt; <b>Create </b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233596325/4fa76a4a17472e9d53855a59/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.54.57.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=197aa4242ba8b60e6cac4536529ad12ec6895499976069c4aebe1970c1da5119" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233596325/4fa76a4a17472e9d53855a59/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.54.57.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=197aa4242ba8b60e6cac4536529ad12ec6895499976069c4aebe1970c1da5119"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From the certificate creation window, you will need to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Complete the required information and define a perimeter</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Customize your certificate</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="information-and-settings" data-post-processed="true">Information and settings</h2><p class="no-margin">You will need to fill in:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">A title</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Indicate if it is linked to a training or a training path</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Indicate if it is attached to the internal perimeter or a partner. If it is the 2nd situation you will also have to indicate which partner it is.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A period of validity or expiration date of the certificate. If you leave it blank, the certificate will be considered of unlimited duration.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Configure a reminder linked to the expiration of the certificate, in order to receive a reminder X days before the expiration of the certificate (if you have set a validity period or an expiration date).</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Description</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Information related to the legal representative of the structure (name, first name, signature)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="customize-your-certificate" data-post-processed="true">Customize your certificate</h2><p class="no-margin">In order to personalize the visual of your certificate, you can define a logo (badge) which will appear in the user dashboard but also in the interface of the certification training. Then, you can define the visual model of the certificate.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To personalize your certificate, you can select a template among those offered (<b>portrait</b> and <b>landscape</b> version available) or integrate your own (by clicking on <b>Personalize</b>).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233601736/8279f2ef258ad3c976ca49d9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+16.02.10.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=4fb94517d8420e80af2098849273c3af4c416f59774e440f1d587395c19e92e9" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233601736/8279f2ef258ad3c976ca49d9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+16.02.10.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=4fb94517d8420e80af2098849273c3af4c416f59774e440f1d587395c19e92e9"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can also customize the information appearing on the certificate.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233603132/545509c1aeaae3d90bead1ee/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+16.06.37.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=5b93360abb3a3adc9121c7f36b6d6f5318ef6fe8b9193b1171b87ce8d7fffe93" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233603132/545509c1aeaae3d90bead1ee/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+16.06.37.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=5b93360abb3a3adc9121c7f36b6d6f5318ef6fe8b9193b1171b87ce8d7fffe93"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Add variable</b>, you will be able to add elements within the certificate. For example the first and last name of the learner, will be automatically indicated thanks to the variables "learner.firstname" and "learner.surname".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The variable then appears in the box just above the "<b>add a variable</b>" button, in the box marked "<b>Insert text</b>". You can add other variables to the text block before formatting and adding them to the template.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Be careful, if you put several variables in the text block simultaneously, you will then create a single uniform text block. You will therefore not be able to place the information in different places on the certificate template.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can also Insert free text by typing it in this same text insertion box. Where "<b>Insert text</b>" appears, type your text and click <b>Add</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Finally, you can add your company logo by clicking on ‚ûï:</p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233608175/d8471f2739d3d6c7ded063dc/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+16.21.46.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f656085084dd3f4a3756e836e2652aa61bbe76fc545cdbdabe638cf10c58ad16" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233608175/d8471f2739d3d6c7ded063dc/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+16.21.46.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f656085084dd3f4a3756e836e2652aa61bbe76fc545cdbdabe638cf10c58ad16"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">In which cases are groups useful ?</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/07/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Groups</b> &gt; <b>Create group</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234845581/d022f7518223aae1cdf8d1b9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-10+%C3%A0+10.48.46.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=5d2c0fb4fb1b4c29565deff7451199ef12bad6667227dbe52bf614f6ba3eb2bf" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234845581/d022f7518223aae1cdf8d1b9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-10+%C3%A0+10.48.46.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=5d2c0fb4fb1b4c29565deff7451199ef12bad6667227dbe52bf614f6ba3eb2bf"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">One of the main goals pursued when creating Groups is to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Manage </b>users who are members of the same Group in a <b>uniform manner</b> in terms of r<b>egistration for trainings</b>, <b>training paths</b> and <b>objectives</b>.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">It is thus possible to automatically link groups to training courses, paths or objectives (that is to say, automatically manage the registration of all current and future members of the Group).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏èSetting up this link is not done in the "Groups" Section in the Side Menu. You have to go, via the Side Menu, in the respective sections :</p><p class="no-margin">&gt;<b> Trainings</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>&gt; Training paths</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>&gt; Objectives</b><br>For more information, see article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3989126">Link Groups to a training course to trigger automatic registration</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Designate a Group Manager</b> (this could be the hierarchical superior) and assign him certain management rights over users who are members of the Group of which he is a manager.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è Note that it is possible to designate several Group Managers for the same Group.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The Group Manager, by default, will have the necessary rights to validate registration requests from members of the Group, and may possibly register them directly for certain training paths (depending on the Group's settings). </p><p class="no-margin">The access path to assign or modify a group manager is :</p><p class="no-margin"><b>Side Menu </b>&gt; <b>Groups</b> &gt; <b>View </b>&gt; ‚úèÔ∏è</p><p class="no-margin">For more information, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973859">Creating groups</a>.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Trainings catalog and Resource Library</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 12/01/2021
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The catalog allows your learners to discover the training courses available on their platform</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The Catalog is accessible via the navigation bar at the top of the page, and gives access to the Training catalog, as well as to the Resource Library.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286506244/089f3297d71bcc12b99a075a/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=45b6b242d82e5d20f7f3aeaba8ccfc3a8d98bdeddf6455290979c9a1af1e0e6d" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286506244/089f3297d71bcc12b99a075a/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=45b6b242d82e5d20f7f3aeaba8ccfc3a8d98bdeddf6455290979c9a1af1e0e6d"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="access-to-the-catalog" data-post-processed="true">Access to the Catalog</h2><p class="no-margin">The catalog groups together all the training courses validated and made visible by the administrator or the designer.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The learner can consult the training courses available to him by sorting and searching according to categories, keywords or skills configured by the administrator.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286499127/83bccfcc7b84703949f1a763/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=342c944f83b9949901c1e98b04ad107f4793f05d6707120fad2f2324fd3ade98" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286499127/83bccfcc7b84703949f1a763/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=342c944f83b9949901c1e98b04ad107f4793f05d6707120fad2f2324fd3ade98"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt; Learners can mark trainings as ‚Äú<b>Favorites</b>‚Äù. They will then appear in a dedicated section in the Catalog tab. This will allow them to highlight and <b>report on the training courses they wish to attend</b> or simply identify the training courses that they particularly liked;</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt; A ‚Äú<b>New</b>‚Äù section allows you to highlight your <b>latest published trainings</b>. This will allow learners to easily identify recently published content;</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt; Learners will be able to see <b>which training courses have been completed member(s) of their group(s)</b>, and thus discover in a more fun way the trainings that could interest them;</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To find out more, go to <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3971606">settings of the Training Catalog</a>. These settings are only accessible to Internal Platform Administrators (and not to partner administrators).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="resource-library" data-post-processed="true">Resource Library</h2><p class="no-margin">The resource library groups together documents (documents of all kinds, texts, videos, iframe, etc.) that can be useful to learners.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">These documents can be grouped into folders. The Resource Library works similarly to a kind of an internal Google Drive on the platform.</p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286504603/a3df13890de86fbcfc6f6e6f/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=79772758c0ea2ffb98e4b542b6478e50798c09fdfb97d07e606bc757b565f9a9" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286504603/a3df13890de86fbcfc6f6e6f/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=79772758c0ea2ffb98e4b542b6478e50798c09fdfb97d07e606bc757b565f9a9"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286504761/de4c577d19c96f1b849f6628/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=91ff8a633146ba7b63defaa1192c399d07d9416706a9099f94f31a5e27b8f300" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/286504761/de4c577d19c96f1b849f6628/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=91ff8a633146ba7b63defaa1192c399d07d9416706a9099f94f31a5e27b8f300"></a></div><p class="no-margin">&gt; Click on the link to find out more about the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3971522">Resource Library settings</a>. These settings are only accessible to Internal Platform Administrators (and not to partner administrators).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The <b>catalog</b> and the <b>resource library</b> are accessible to users by clicking on the Catalog tab on the left side of the banner on the top of the screen.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In case both the catalog and the resource library have been activated.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">After clicking on this button, the user directly accesses the training catalog, with the possibility of switching to the resources library by clicking on the <b>Resources </b>button.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Last updated on 12/27/2020</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

          <h1 class="t__h1">Activate objectives for learners</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/10/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">It is possible to assign Objectives to Learners if this feature has been activated in the Platform Settings (click on ‚öôÔ∏è on the horizontal bar at the top of the screen). All you have to do is check the following box: "<b>Activate objectives feature</b>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234902556/f8fb4c748a598e670720506e/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=aa1978a028f2e5d10f2ccd3d540904644800b15862b02ab48c55889d651c3fae" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234902556/f8fb4c748a598e670720506e/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=aa1978a028f2e5d10f2ccd3d540904644800b15862b02ab48c55889d651c3fae"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The Administrators (or Partner Administrators) may therefore assign one or more Objectives to a User or a Group of Users.</p><p class="no-margin">Objectives are defined over a given period and can be of different types :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Complete a Training, a Training Category, a Training Path</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Complete an Objective</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Spend time (teaching time OR real time) on a Training, a training category, a Training path</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">If Objectives have been assigned to a Learner, the latter will then see these Objectives displayed on the left vertical banner of his Dashboard as well as the percentage of progress achieved for each of the objectives to which he has been registered (see below).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235579666/77b7fbef30a775863074fc34/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+09.17.49.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=33fa023704b25b87abfebc84b8e2fddb792ffca6a5ff019e87fa89f1c9cafc03" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235579666/77b7fbef30a775863074fc34/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+09.17.49.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=33fa023704b25b87abfebc84b8e2fddb792ffca6a5ff019e87fa89f1c9cafc03"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For more details on the Objectives feature, see the other dedicated articles:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973714">Creating an objective</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973721">Register users for an objective</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973718">Consulting the Objectives </a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p></article>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Translate a training</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to translate my training? How to realize a translation outside of Rise Up platform by importing / exporting a CSV ?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Your platform is aimed at an international audience? </p><p class="no-margin">After having <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973438">activated internationalization</a> on your platform, you can then translate the content of your training courses.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="manage-training-translations" data-post-processed="true"><b>Manage training translations</b></h2><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Trainings</b> &gt; <b>View</b> then ‚öôÔ∏è in the selected training thumbnail.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Normal access to the management of training translations is done via the <b>Training management </b>screen, by clicking on the <b>Manage Translations</b> button :</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264220005/5f3239b37387f20aa6956b8e/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=a7b0ad15934993b1e3e7d42a294ac1f4252d0e407a345c28b4b5bebc2e1a26d0" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264220005/5f3239b37387f20aa6956b8e/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=a7b0ad15934993b1e3e7d42a294ac1f4252d0e407a345c28b4b5bebc2e1a26d0"></a></div><p class="no-margin">It is located below the training data sheet in the top left corner of the screen. You then access the <b>Translation Management Page : </b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236422915/82816c19f3b8b55b839ad8ce/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+16.12.48.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1709203f40e52710a2a0c59331f4b2b7c34cffeb0ebd72189a985c1d5451cf53" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236422915/82816c19f3b8b55b839ad8ce/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+16.12.48.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1709203f40e52710a2a0c59331f4b2b7c34cffeb0ebd72189a985c1d5451cf53"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The original language of the training (in this example English) is presented at the top of the list with a progress of "translation" up to 100%.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Note</b>: when creating a training, you must determine the language in which the course is created ("<b>source</b>" language). It will no longer be possible to change the original language (or source language) of the training once you have started to translate the training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In the example above, the Spanish translation has not started and therefore it is not published. As soon as the translation is finalized, it will be possible to publish this version by clicking in the corresponding checkbox. <br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="add-a-translation" data-post-processed="true">Add a translation</h2><p class="no-margin">To start a translation in a new language, click on <b>+ Add translations</b> and choose, from the pop-up that appears, the language of your choice. You can even choose multiple languages &ZeroWidthSpace;&ZeroWidthSpace;to enable multiple translations at the same time.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264221230/f3112933f83fc0213366e3ec/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4db3f0d7b3aa865b2dd6d096a1a87e8268db2fb55fc00a4fce492b72959fa027" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264221230/f3112933f83fc0213366e3ec/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4db3f0d7b3aa865b2dd6d096a1a87e8268db2fb55fc00a4fce492b72959fa027"></a></div><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264221285/24045c6db81a9c6e6e689255/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=3b45afe843434a1c25a1cf988b4de8987460a49676ea4554d0d20700c6b00649" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264221285/24045c6db81a9c6e6e689255/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=3b45afe843434a1c25a1cf988b4de8987460a49676ea4554d0d20700c6b00649"></a></div><h3 id="edit-" data-post-processed="true"><b>Edit </b>‚úèÔ∏è</h3><p class="no-margin">You are redirected to the training translation interface, -&gt; for each stage of the training, you will have an interface where you can view the text in the source language and an area in which you can translate this text while always having the original text in front of you.<br></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264221981/101c123332b610cf90d34623/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=bc13ed123e910e53cffa50a73039f49250824715a073e0cc1272e217f6019aa9" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264221981/101c123332b610cf90d34623/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=bc13ed123e910e53cffa50a73039f49250824715a073e0cc1272e217f6019aa9"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h3 id="export-" data-post-processed="true">Export üì§</h3><p class="no-margin">The Rise Up platform allows you to translate your trainings and to export a file including the training in the original language that you can have translated externally before re-importing the file once the translation is done.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt; The "<b>Instructions</b>" tab will give you tips for using the file properly;</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; The "<b>Data</b>" tab contains the details of the structure of your content, the content in your original language (default language) and a column to complete to integrate your content once translated.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264222379/5c219d3c796efe15632108a8/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=c1f5e542338a9b0e8fc5e62932a48f50c70da33c35af4a9bb8eb997fae616fbb" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264222379/5c219d3c796efe15632108a8/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=c1f5e542338a9b0e8fc5e62932a48f50c70da33c35af4a9bb8eb997fae616fbb"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>Element</b>: type of element to translate: training, module, stage or session;</p><p class="no-margin"><b>Attribute</b>: detail of each element;</p><p class="no-margin"><b>Default language</b>: content on the default language to be translated;</p><p class="no-margin"><b>Translated language</b>: fill in this column with the desired translation;</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h3 id="import-" data-post-processed="true">Import üì•</h3><p class="no-margin">A window will invite you to upload your completed CSV file with your translation. Please note that once sent, the content of the file will erase the current translation, if applicable.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è When importing the CSV with your translation, the <b>formatting is not preserved</b>. You will therefore have to carry out the formatting in the interface of the platform.</p><p class="no-margin">In the same way, it is not possible to modify the steps documents, videos, and other content other than the text via the import of CSV.<br></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">üóëÔ∏è Deletion of the translation concerned</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è Provides an overview of the training in the language concerned</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="preview-of-the-translation-assistance-interface-" data-post-processed="true"><b>Preview of the Translation assistance interface </b>üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è</h3><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264223781/8fa8b4478c177acec29dc25d/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=8a96c30c89f8b09bff0e8ea9a611a3cd6204927681212b8a9ff07a139cd38568" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/264223781/8fa8b4478c177acec29dc25d/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=8a96c30c89f8b09bff0e8ea9a611a3cd6204927681212b8a9ff07a139cd38568"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Provides an overview of the training in the language concerned.<br><br></p><h3 id="deleting-" data-post-processed="true">Deleting üóëÔ∏è</h3><p class="no-margin">Delete the translation concerned.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/09/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">To create a user, click on the <b>Side menu</b> &gt; <b>Users</b> &gt; <b>Create</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232803791/22dbb284c5d3e95f3fc189ce/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-03+%C3%A0+14.52.43.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=70f77a9365a4e88fc4289b84a14b1906bc1624db586dba9b61513b239d35cb7e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232803791/22dbb284c5d3e95f3fc189ce/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-03+%C3%A0+14.52.43.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=70f77a9365a4e88fc4289b84a14b1906bc1624db586dba9b61513b239d35cb7e"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232804577/ecbd86122cade9bbbea8c332/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-03+%C3%A0+14.57.14.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=ecad6272b574262d14dbb722cc36fa1c3a3dcc54cb3f2790c622300d65153e68" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232804577/ecbd86122cade9bbbea8c332/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-03+%C3%A0+14.57.14.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=ecad6272b574262d14dbb722cc36fa1c3a3dcc54cb3f2790c622300d65153e68"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Fields that need to be completed in the User Creation Sheet are divided into 2 sections:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">General information</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Customized fields<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="general-information" data-post-processed="true">General information</h2><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Username*</b>: this is the user‚Äôs login name that will be used to connect to the platform (without SSO) combined with the password. It must be unique and contain no ‚Äúblank‚Äù spaces. An error message warns you if a user already has the same login name. This is the only truly required field when creating a user. It is possible to use the user‚Äôs e-mail address as <b>Username</b>. </p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Last name </b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>First name</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>E-mail</b>: the e-mail address is required when the password is not specified, i.e. when <b>Create a password</b> is selected.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Phone number</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Language</b>: the chosen language will determine the language of the E-mails and legal documents that will be sent/generated (English will be the chosen language by default, unless otherwise stated)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Internal ID</b>: this is an internal identification number </p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Password</b>: the choice is given between: </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">&gt; <b>Create a password</b>: in this case, a valid user e-mail address must be entered, enabling the user to receive a login request and create their own password when they log in to the platform for the first time.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt; <b>Specify the password</b>: in this case, the administrator who creates the user imposes their first password, but can ask the user to change their password when they log in for the first time by checking the dedidacted box.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232807483/0adb91087ac5a7bc1ca39f08/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1aeceec2b730609731a84e515af22423729e6f0b63193b96c88545ad0fbef920" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232807483/0adb91087ac5a7bc1ca39f08/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1aeceec2b730609731a84e515af22423729e6f0b63193b96c88545ad0fbef920"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">One <b>Role</b> to choose among 5 options : </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">&gt; <b>Learner</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>&gt; Administrator</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>&gt; Creator/Designer</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>&gt; Community manager</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>&gt; Session Instructor </b>(*)</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">(*) The Session Instructor role must be reserved for people, outside of the company, leading classroom sessions or virtual classes. By construction, a User with a "Session Instructor role" is someone outside the company and therefore cannot follow training courses himself. </p><p class="no-margin">It is possible later to designate other users (Administrator, Creator/Designer, Learner, Community Manager) who are by construction internal to the company, as Session Instructors of such or such classroom session or virtual classroom. This is referred to as the ‚ÄúHost‚Äù attribute.</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Date of suspension</b> : useful to fill in this field when the user, for example, has a mission limited in time or is on a fixed-term contract</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Biography:</b> it's a free field</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Profile photo</b> : it is possible to upload a profile photo by clicking on the image </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="personalized-fields" data-post-processed="true">Personalized fields</h2><p class="no-margin">Below the Custom fields section : </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234233878/1819f0d7573434372da61bec/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+09.39.07.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=b877efdc9e34db34fe26fac16e97fa7b00360c9e8429036fc853976659f05cb5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234233878/1819f0d7573434372da61bec/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+09.39.07.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=b877efdc9e34db34fe26fac16e97fa7b00360c9e8429036fc853976659f05cb5"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In the example above, 3 custom fields appear, which implies that these 3 fields have been previously configured in <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3966547">settings by an Administrator</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="user-creation" data-post-processed="true">User creation</h2><p class="no-margin">Once the <b>Create User Form</b> has been completed and saved (click on <b>Save</b>), you will then be able to access all the features available from the user's profile. For more information see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973605">Edit and view users</a>.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Create users via CSV import</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to create multiple users easily ? How to import a list of users ?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">In addition to the possibility of <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973595">manually creating users</a>, you have the option of importing your list of users in CSV format from a spreadsheet.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">From your administrator account, follow the following path:</p><p class="no-margin"><b>Side menu </b>(in the top left corner) &gt; <b>Users</b> &gt; <b>View </b>&gt; <b>Import users</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242420070/839bf42282c464a9dc044d68/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.54.12.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=81ef4c944097e4e05eefa29385be307760691480a5fc60ec3b746855c2a1523e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242420070/839bf42282c464a9dc044d68/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.54.12.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=81ef4c944097e4e05eefa29385be307760691480a5fc60ec3b746855c2a1523e"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242420399/e5b3bfab3a56670f3c0f0138/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.55.12.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=9da07dd88e2f2cd5f4fdf26bad8cbcff08d95c5d21af379a145c0baf6beeaeb2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242420399/e5b3bfab3a56670f3c0f0138/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.55.12.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=9da07dd88e2f2cd5f4fdf26bad8cbcff08d95c5d21af379a145c0baf6beeaeb2"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="import-users" data-post-processed="true">Import users</h2><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Import users</b>, you will access the interface for depositing your CSV file.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242421426/c5244b739c16692c67338e3e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.58.39.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=dd44e0f42b360fcde4494a2197de416fd2994cf4c2752bc89cef9503e494207c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242421426/c5244b739c16692c67338e3e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.58.39.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=dd44e0f42b360fcde4494a2197de416fd2994cf4c2752bc89cef9503e494207c"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will find there:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">detailed instructions to help you complete your import;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">the insert where you can drop your completed CSV file;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">a CSV file template to complete in order to perform your user import.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="preparation-of-your-import-file" data-post-processed="true">Preparation of your import file</h2><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Download</b>, you can download a CSV file template to help you with your import.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242421122/e8ca3af9080fb1edc8d6dc14/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.57.27.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=c6a057f734ae4c5374614f2b0a28719b2e5b787607caf89200b649ff7db274f2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242421122/e8ca3af9080fb1edc8d6dc14/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+10.57.27.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=c6a057f734ae4c5374614f2b0a28719b2e5b787607caf89200b649ff7db274f2"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Open the downloaded "userimport" excel file: it contains two tabs detailing the formats to be respected so that your user import goes as smoothly as possible.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="presentation-tab" data-post-processed="true">Presentation tab</h3><p class="no-margin">This tab details the content to be completed and the format to be respected for each column. You will be able to adapt your database for a fast and smooth import.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="users-tab" data-post-processed="true">Users tab</h3><p class="no-margin">This is where you will enter your data, taking care to respect the information contained in the presentation tab. Here are some additional tips to help you best carry out your user import:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Type &amp; Partner columns</b>: only relevant if you set up one or more partner platforms (find out more about partner platforms <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973508">here</a>);</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Role</b>: discover the different roles <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973902">here</a>;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Login (Username)</b>: Unless using automated synchronization and / or SSO we recommend that you use the email address of your users as Login (user ID). This will reduce the risk of users forgetting their login credentials.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Password</b>: If this column is left empty, the Email column becomes mandatory. The user will then receive an email inviting him to create a password the first time he logs in. If this column is completed, the password will be created with the information completed, and no email will be sent to the user.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Language</b>: Useful if your users are of different nationalities and speak different languages: no matter the language chosen for your platform, users will benefit from automatic translations in the language that has been specified for each of them. Note that <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973438">the content of the training must be translated by you</a>.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>RHID</b>: This optional element must be completed if there is an internal number or ID (from existing HRIS software for example) if necessary;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Paths and Training</b>: You can, from the import, indicate the training and paths to which you wish to register your users. Note that the trainings and training paths must be created upstream and that you must strictly indicate the title of the said training or the said path (a typing error may result in the data not being taken into account);</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Group</b>: From the import, you can indicate the group(s) in which you want to add your users. Unlike training and training paths: if you indicate in one of the "Groups" columns a name that does not exist on the platform: a <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973862">group</a> will automatically be created during import;</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Group manager</b>: From the import, you can indicate the group (s) for which your users will be group manager.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Custom fields</b>: After the Groups and Paths columns, you can add as many "custom fields" columns as you want.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è Note that you will need to create these custom fields upstream from the configuration menu. The columns in your CSV will have to be strictly titled like the fields created on the platform.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="verification-of-imported-data" data-post-processed="true">Verification of imported data</h2><p class="no-margin">After submitting your import file, a verification step appears and displays the different columns that will be taken into account in your import (Last name, First name, etc.).</p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Check</b>, the tool will check the completion of the columns and display an error message if any mandatory information is missing.</p><p class="no-margin">You can, in the event of an error, modify your file and then upload it again or make the modifications directly on the platform by modifying the data concerned in the board that is displayed.</p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242426529/16722500a45450eaf613be13/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+11.14.04.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=63fdb4e5c147b9b927aee5d590ff00cfef46f0e9600a37a4aaf2ebd789bb072b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242426529/16722500a45450eaf613be13/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+11.14.04.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=63fdb4e5c147b9b927aee5d590ff00cfef46f0e9600a37a4aaf2ebd789bb072b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Make sure during the verification step that all the columns have been identified and taken into account. Indeed, when many columns remain empty, the last columns will not appear in the import.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To finalize the import after this verification step, click on Submit.</p><p class="no-margin">You will need to correct the errors found by the tool before you can confirm your import by clicking on <b>Send</b>.</p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242431639/aa3dcc3c37d13896ec8fbc44/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+11.29.25.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d62d723adf9186eb849be589600d7e4b9b1106e007251cf92963fc5e38b3de7b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242431639/aa3dcc3c37d13896ec8fbc44/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-03+%C3%A0+11.29.25.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d62d723adf9186eb849be589600d7e4b9b1106e007251cf92963fc5e38b3de7b"></a></div><h2 id="updating-users" data-post-processed="true">Updating users</h2><p class="no-margin">The CSV user import tool also allows users to update user data. By following the same import process, you can export your list of users, modify the content of the columns or add information and then re-import your list.</p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Be careful during this update process to keep the same <b>Logins</b> for your users. These Logins make it possible to recognize your users and carry out updates on them.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To go further in the use and management of your users, also learn how to <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973595">add your users one by one</a> and <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973862">how to manage your user groups</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/13/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Users</b> &gt; <b>View</b> &gt; üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">From this page you can : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Modify the user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Suspend the user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Resend welcome email</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Log in as this user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Contact the user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Delete the user</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241579954/0956e9283b231de69884a32a/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2e3333be5853db749860fc28a142aea112f7466efeaf3efd97ddf45633a63cf7" class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241580739/a93f6fb9affd2821e4267309/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=669752848e54b0ff784937b905d1d28c949030c543d48e834ff68efa49b3dbca" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241580739/a93f6fb9affd2821e4267309/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=669752848e54b0ff784937b905d1d28c949030c543d48e834ff68efa49b3dbca"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The action buttons (circled in red) on the User Details Sheet screen are accessible only to Administrators / Partner Administrators.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="log-in-as-the-user" data-post-processed="true">Log in as the user</h2><p class="no-margin">This button is only accessible to Administrators (Partner Administrators) and allows them to view the platform as if they were the user in question. Note that it is not possible to log in as another Administrator or Partner Administrator.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è From this sheet, the Administrator can directly register the user for an Objective, a Group, a training course or a training).</p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Approving Users</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/07/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">User validation is only accessible to Administrators and eventually Partner Administrators.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Note</b>: Partner Administrators will only be able to ‚Äúvalidate‚Äù users if a <b>Full Control</b> has been set up for them upstream, in Settings.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Administrators will immediately see from their Dashboard (in the <b>Pending Actions</b> box on the left side of their screen) whether there are Users awaiting validation.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="access-path-for-user-validation" data-post-processed="true">Access path for User validation</h2><p class="no-margin">It is possible to validate or refuse users awaiting validation:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">either by clicking directly on their Dashboard on <b>Pending Users</b> in the <b>Pending Actions box (</b>in the example below, there are 3 users awaiting validation by the Administrators) : </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234295003/ce595f72a583d2ae22792196/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+13.31.53.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=82769a6bd23fbe44c99b6ead39b16cf79a3de5e5dd13f26b0a1f1bc81642b943" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234295003/ce595f72a583d2ae22792196/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+13.31.53.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=82769a6bd23fbe44c99b6ead39b16cf79a3de5e5dd13f26b0a1f1bc81642b943"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">either by going through the <b>General Management Menu</b> &gt; <b>Users</b> &gt; <b>Validate users</b></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234295548/e3e7805f7726eceac0788915/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+13.34.12.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=8b753fa85dc858dc89cce54242fab05c310e8639101cc3cbd01f18e8fe48101e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234295548/e3e7805f7726eceac0788915/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+13.34.12.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=8b753fa85dc858dc89cce54242fab05c310e8639101cc3cbd01f18e8fe48101e"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="pending-users" data-post-processed="true">Pending Users</h2><p class="no-margin">Once on the <b>Pending Users </b>page, the Administrator / Partner Administrator can, for each user awaiting validation, click on:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ùå to refuse the user, who will then receive a refusal message by email (no user account will be created for him on the Platform and he will not be able to access it)</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚úÖ to validate the user, who will then receive a validation message by email</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è to access the User Details Sheet, and if necessary modify or complete his file by clicking on the Edit User button</p></article>

          <h1 class="t__h1">Visualize users</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/07/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>

        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu </b>&gt; <b>Users</b> &gt; <b>View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The <b>User List </b>screen appears.</p><p class="no-margin">To access a user's <b>Details Page</b>, click on <b>View </b>üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è (eye icon) on the line corresponding to the desired user.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241575783/a501300947e82ffb5232c292/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f48a4ea8574e9a1eb636c7de56bf39e4da6b453b27f84f4f1cf4ecdcbb12dfe1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241575783/a501300947e82ffb5232c292/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f48a4ea8574e9a1eb636c7de56bf39e4da6b453b27f84f4f1cf4ecdcbb12dfe1"></a></div><p class="no-margin">As a reminder, Administrators / Partner Administrators, can, from the User Details Sheet:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Modify a user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Suspend a user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Resend the welcome email</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Log in as this user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Contact the user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Delete the user</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Register the user for an Objective </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Register the user to a Group</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Register the user for a Training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Register the user for a Training path <br></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234259859/35b80b990cf07504e4d62100/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+11.17.28.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=ef272155b4cd8ac87fd680dc633dd71fe410f1115bdf86ea16d7a65a2cb6b370" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234259859/35b80b990cf07504e4d62100/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+11.17.28.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=ef272155b4cd8ac87fd680dc633dd71fe410f1115bdf86ea16d7a65a2cb6b370"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The <b>User List</b> screen is also displayed for For Creators/Designers and Group Managers but they don't have the same rights as Administrators / Partner Administrators (see the screenshot below). Below are the list of actions available for Creators/Designers and Group Managers.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">User Details Sheet screen (view by designers (*) / group managers)</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234828689/e23a5ad50e7dbf37f4405bb6/image.jpeg?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=b92020e450a7a8bd47563696c6b98e084c8c0d7e897098ba25cc9a532553b0b9" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234828689/e23a5ad50e7dbf37f4405bb6/image.jpeg?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=b92020e450a7a8bd47563696c6b98e084c8c0d7e897098ba25cc9a532553b0b9"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From this sheet, <b>Group Managers and Designers/Creators</b> will be able to (according to their scope):</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Resend the welcome email (for Group Managers only)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Contact the user, by sending an e-mail</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">according to the rights given to them, register the user for a training or a training path : </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">&gt; <b>Group Managers </b>: when trainings are created, Group Managers can only register member(s) of their group(s) (for more information see 'Group Management' section)</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt; <b>Designers/Creators</b>: Designers/creators can only register Users for Trainings that they created / or to all trainings - depending on the platform settings.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Sort function</p><p class="no-margin">On the right, under the Action buttons, a search and sorting / filtering tool allows you to display only the searched Users and, if necessary, activate actions (see below) on only sorted Users.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">It is possible to sort the following items:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Users never connected to the platform</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Role: Administrators / Learners / Designers/Creators / Community Managers / Animators</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Type (*): Internal / Partner specifying the Partner concerned</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">State: active, inactive, suspended</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Group</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Creation date: enter a range</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Last login date: enter a range</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Custom fields: sorting is possible on each of the custom fields that will have been created upstream in Settings</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">(*) Sorting on the Type item is only accessible for internal Administrators. Partner Administrators can only view Users of their own Partner Platform.</p><h2 id="h_cf52f53382" data-post-processed="true"></h2><h2 id="action-buttons" data-post-processed="true">Action buttons</h2><p class="no-margin">From this same page, it is possible for Administrators / Partner Administrators only to:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235950956/e52eeef717dcaa9811c1dddd/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+09.29.26.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=162a5b3b70d999adbdba68301d2a29583cea09788a3c2937dc45086533a8b507" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235950956/e52eeef717dcaa9811c1dddd/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+09.29.26.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=162a5b3b70d999adbdba68301d2a29583cea09788a3c2937dc45086533a8b507"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Create a new user</b> (the button redirects to the "User creation page")</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create users by <b>importing an excel file</b>. All you have to do is download an excel file, complete it as specified in the file and then upload it again to the platform so that all the users included in the excel file are created at once on the Platform.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Export the list of users in Excel format</b>.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Action on users : </b>perform a number of actions on the users that may have been filtered. The filter criteria are defined on the right area of the screen. The list of the different possible actions is given below:</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235206763/caddd8152869ecea7438e469/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+09.40.11.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=33d99d972d12a3069e348f600fb88ceac7e86bb6d9b7966d3dc3bae584b62ed2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235206763/caddd8152869ecea7438e469/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+09.40.11.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=33d99d972d12a3069e348f600fb88ceac7e86bb6d9b7966d3dc3bae584b62ed2"></a></div></article>
