    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Create a training &gt; Configuration</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to configure a training? How to make it visible in the catalog? Allow registrations? Link a certificate / assessment?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">When creating a training course, the following information must be completed:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974260">General information</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974262">Detailed information (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Configuration (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974277">Information about the organization (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974282">Customized fields (optional)</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This article focus on the <b>Configuration </b>section.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="default-training-configuration-" data-post-processed="true">Default training configuration </h2><p class="no-margin">This section is already completed with the default configuration, hence the qualification as <b>Optional</b>. At the very least, you should check that the default configuration is actually appropriate to your organization.</p><p class="no-margin">Below you will find the Default Configuration that will be applied, if you don‚Äôt modify this section.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Screen showing the <b>Training Configuration</b> default configuration<br></p><p class="no-margin"><br><br></p><h2 id="visible" data-post-processed="true">Visible</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is checked.<br> </p><p class="no-margin">This box allows you to make the training visible or invisible in the Catalog for Multi-scope Training (in the Public Catalog for Public Training) for all users.</p><p class="no-margin">If the box is checked, <b>the training is visible in the Catalog</b> for all users (obviously only after the training has been published). If the box is not checked, the training is no longer visible in the catalog, but is only visible in the training management interface for Administrators (internal and/or partner) and the Designer ( &gt; Training &gt; View)</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="sequential" data-post-processed="true">Sequential</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is unchecked.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This box allows you to make the training sequential or non-sequential. If the ‚Äúsequential‚Äù box is checked, the learner will have to take the training modules and stages in the order in which they appear. The learner will have to finish one module before moving on to the next and within each module finish the previous stage before being able to begin the next stage.  If the ‚Äúsequential‚Äù box is not checked, the learner will be able to take the modules and training stages in any order they wish. This ‚Äúsequential‚Äù button is also in the training path. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="dedicated-page" data-post-processed="true">Dedicated page</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is unchecked. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The dedicated page makes it possible to communicate only the <b>Training Description Sheet</b> to people outside the company (customer, prospect or partners). If this box is checked, a URL link will be generated. It will therefore be possible for the Administrator or Designer to share this URL link with an external person. The external person will only have access to the training description sheet without needing access to this Training.</p><p class="no-margin"><br>Access path to retrieve the URL for the dedicated page: Side Panel &gt; Training &gt; View &gt; three dots icon &gt; dedicated page URL.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231865042/fab318579bca9a2def46d16c/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=00faf687ca19832263a59cce8817b6cc9b661e3fbe4b979c3890bee1ba5a29bb" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231865042/fab318579bca9a2def46d16c/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=00faf687ca19832263a59cce8817b6cc9b661e3fbe4b979c3890bee1ba5a29bb"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br><br></p><h2 id="create-a-board-on-the-community-page" data-post-processed="true">Create a board on the community page</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is unchecked.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The Community is a space where learners can discuss among themselves. This space can be accessed at any time by clicking the Community tab in the top banner of your screen (see below) as long as the Community has been activated by the Administrator in the platform configuration (‚öôÔ∏è).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By default, the <b>Create a board on the community page</b> box is not checked in the Configuration section of the training being created.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231865698/91a196ceb3e8376243b51e7d/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=65506683b49c8ecd3f537d4df5ebcdf2b459e41eb0803b6ca2cdfba7ea2551a7" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231865698/91a196ceb3e8376243b51e7d/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=65506683b49c8ecd3f537d4df5ebcdf2b459e41eb0803b6ca2cdfba7ea2551a7"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By checking this box, a specific forum dedicated to the training being created will be set up and made accessible to anyone registered for this training. The forum‚Äôs subject will have the same title as the training created.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="send-legal-documents" data-post-processed="true">Send legal documents</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is checked.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By default, the <b>Send legal documents </b>box is checked, which means that the 3 legal documents related to this training, <b>Invitation to a classroom session</b>, <b>Attendance certificate</b> and <b>Training completion certificate</b> will be generated automatically and sent to the Learners by e-mail.</p><p class="no-margin">For more information on theses documents see: <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/4033011">Generate legal documents</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If the <b>Send legal documents</b> box is not checked, no legal documents will be e-mailed automatically to learners. </p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è However, these legal documents will be generated and will remain available for learners to download by accessing their <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3957865">Account</a>. You can not deactivate the automatic creation of documents.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">These legal documents are configured by the administrator (internal and/or partner). To get access : <b>Side Panel &gt; Legal Documents &gt; Manage Templates.</b></p><p class="no-margin">More information in the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970584">Edit legal documents templates</a>.<br><b> </b><br></p><h2 id="allow-registrations" data-post-processed="true">Allow registrations</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is checked.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is checked, it means that learner will be able to ask to be registered for the training by accessing it through the Training Catalog.</p><p class="no-margin">A <b>Sign up </b>button then appears in the <b>training description sheet</b>, which learners can access in the Catalog. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231868942/88dde3ae2e7bde7ac1753fd6/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=309bff4306adc6035ba43c18cca181e3df2f7dced224a84b09d61aa0541be5aa" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231868942/88dde3ae2e7bde7ac1753fd6/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=309bff4306adc6035ba43c18cca181e3df2f7dced224a84b09d61aa0541be5aa"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In the default configuration (see the point below), learners will not automatically be able to take the training immediately after clicking this <b>Registration</b> button, as they must wait for approval by the Administrator and/or Designer and/or their ‚ÄúGroup Manager(s)‚Äù to actually be registered for the training and be able to take it.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is unchecked, learners will not be able to ask to be registered for the training from the Catalog. So the <b>Registration</b> button is not displayed in the training description sheet. Only an administrator or designer of the training or, if applicable, their Group Manager(s) (if they have been given such permission - see Side Panel &gt; Groups) can register learners for this training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231869343/a4578a179794e3891a494926/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=f34a5cfb1f674a5b807239726fe8a65dfb08938a7d47b9b21a6ae5326a0bc74e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231869343/a4578a179794e3891a494926/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=f34a5cfb1f674a5b807239726fe8a65dfb08938a7d47b9b21a6ae5326a0bc74e"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="deactivate-approval-of-registrations-for-training-in-the-catalog" data-post-processed="true"><b>Deactivate approval of registrations for training in the catalog</b></h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is unchecked. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This means that when Learners click on the <b>Sign up </b>button in the Training description sheet, they will have to wait for Administrative Approval of their registration request (approval by an Administrator, a Training Designer or a Group Manager, as applicable).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is checked, learners will immediately be registered for the training following their training registration request from the Catalog.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="allow-users-to-unregister-from-training" data-post-processed="true">Allow users to unregister from training</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is unchecked.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is unchecked, users don‚Äôt have the option to unregister automatically from training.</p><p class="no-margin">If this box is checked, users can unregister at any time during the training, without administrative approval. A window is displayed asking users to confirm their choice to unregister, in which the reason for cancelling can be given (not a required field). The administrator simply receives an e-mail notifying unregistration.<br><br></p><h2 id="users-must-pass-the-quizzes-to-complete-training" data-post-processed="true">Users must pass the quizzes to complete training</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, this box is unchecked</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can create quizzes in a training course. For each quiz, it is possible to define a minimum score to pass your stage.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is unchecked, a learner who has not achieved the minimum score will still be able to complete the training, but will not be able to receive the occupational certification in the default configuration (it is possible to change the default configuration to issue the certificate even if the learner has not successfully completed the training ‚Äì see section below on certificates).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is checked, a user who has not achieved the minimum score in the quiz will not be able to complete the training and consequently will not obtain a training completion certificate and, as a result, will not be able to receive the certificate for certified training.<br><br></p><h2 id="training-availability-period--continuous-or-in-periods" data-post-processed="true">Training availability period ‚Äì continuous or in periods</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, the <b>All the time</b> is activated.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The training is available:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>All the time</b>: the training is available ‚Äúall the time‚Äù, which means that the training is accessible all the time, once the learners are registered for the training.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>In periods</b>: The training is available ‚Äúin periods‚Äù, which means that the training is only available over a specified period. When the period ends, it is possible to add a new period, so that the training is once again visible to the learners. Note that once the period has been approved, it is no longer possible to change it. The training must be duplicated to be able to change this period.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏èTraining configured in periods cannot be included in a training path.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="configuration-of-training-assessments-for-each-platform" data-post-processed="true">Configuration of training assessments (for each platform)</h2><p class="no-margin">By default, no assessment is associated with the training being created.</p><p class="no-margin">For <b>Multi-scope</b> Training, Assessments are configured Platform-by-Platform.<br>There will then appear dynamically as many Assessment Configuration blocks as there are Platforms defined in the Scope. The Platform name is given in brackets.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231871375/6bcdbf0b64fed8f25b4740f8/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=b755747463721f7c839cdf03b1072725bac3ffb72abac4234bc88bd0efc54c7e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231871375/6bcdbf0b64fed8f25b4740f8/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=b755747463721f7c839cdf03b1072725bac3ffb72abac4234bc88bd0efc54c7e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">It is possible to link assessments to a training course and to use the platform‚Äôs default assessment templates.</p><p class="no-margin">It is also possible to create your own assessment templates before creating training. Only Administrators (internal and partner) can create assessment templates <b>Side Panel  &gt; Assessments &gt; Manage templates.</b></p><p class="no-margin">For more information, see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4581737">Set up live / delayed evaluations</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">There are 2 types of assessments:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Live assessments (on-the-spot evaluation)</b>: The live assessment is generated immediately the learner has completed the training.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Delayed assessments</b>: For the delayed assessment, it is possible to define a number of days after which the assessment will be generated.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">It is possible to generate both assessments, or a single assessment.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="associating-a-certificate-with-training-for-each-platform" data-post-processed="true">Associating a certificate with training (for each platform)</h2><p class="no-margin">It is possible to associate a training course with a Certificate previously created by an Administrator (internal or partner) : <b>Side Panel &gt; Certificates &gt; Create.</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">See Article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970601">Create a certificate template</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By default, the Certificate associated with the training will only be issued to the learner if the training has been successfully completed, but this can be overridden and the Certificate always issued to the learner as soon the training is completed, by checking the box provided.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Once the certificate is issued to the learner, the certificate appears on the learner‚Äôs dashboard.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 07/30/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

          <h1 class="t__h1">Create a training &gt; Information about the organization</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/30/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">When creating a training course, the following information must be completed:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974260">General information</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974262">Detailed information (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Configuration (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974277">Information about the organization (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974282">Customized fields (optional)</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This article focuses on the <b>Information about the organization </b>section.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This section only relates to training organizations.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231875800/8c402eff74f4e58dd1ae6dd6/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=6e539ab1a1b3775d13aaec7a0ecf0ed05d68389952136b45bf188be6f431f0e2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231875800/8c402eff74f4e58dd1ae6dd6/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=6e539ab1a1b3775d13aaec7a0ecf0ed05d68389952136b45bf188be6f431f0e2"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Reference: this is a reference assigned to a training course</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Formacode: this is the business sector to which the training belongs</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Type: training course type as defined by the French Labor Code</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">All of this information is automatically included in the <b>training contract</b>.</p></article>

</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">When creating a training course, the following information must be completed:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974260">General information</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974262">Detailed information (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Configuration (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974277">Information about the organization (optional)</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974282">Customized fields (optional)</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This article focuses on the <b>Customized fields </b>section. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This section will only appear if an Administrator (only Internal Administrators have permissions to do so) has previously created one or more customized fields related to Training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Associating customized fields with Training can be useful for subsequent reporting purposes.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Customized fields are created during Pre-configuration (<b>Settings ‚öôÔ∏è &gt; Customized fields</b>).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">See Artcile <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3966547">Settings - Customized fields</a>.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creating a module</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/30/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Training content is created by <b>successively creating the different modules that will make up your training</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">At any time, you will be able to change the order in which your modules are displayed as well as the stages within your e-learning modules. This gives you a great deal of creative flexibility.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Similarly, to help you go faster, on many occasions instead of creating a new module from scratch, you can import previously created content from the library (see below, <b>Import from library</b> option).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This page will be displayed at each stage of creating a new module:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231883635/6e4e4cec20ecda7278818005/image.png?expires=1619961246&amp;signature=3f66a64e0125e9c1f566abe601a3b1562ee13b84d8dde8396757c749b9989250" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231883635/6e4e4cec20ecda7278818005/image.png?expires=1619961246&amp;signature=3f66a64e0125e9c1f566abe601a3b1562ee13b84d8dde8396757c749b9989250"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For every new module you must choose between 3 alternative possibilities:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975036">Create a new classroom module</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975037">Create a new online (e-learning) module</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Import content from the library to save time <br>(see below for detailed information).</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">When all the modules have been created (with the various stages within each module), you will obviously have to click the <b>Publish</b> button to change the status of the training from <b>Draft</b> to <b>Published</b> or <b>Pending approval</b> when the training is created by a Designer in the default configuration*.<br><br></p><h2 id="importing-existing-content-from-the-library" data-post-processed="true">Importing existing content from the library</h2><p class="no-margin">To work faster, you can import previously created content from the library (see above, <b>Import from library</b> option).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You then access a page listing all existing training courses and can search for content from the training, from the modules or from the various stages that make up existing training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Simply import the content searched for and it will be added to the training you are creating.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231884484/cbaaa5cc5c1b24aaac8a8a5a/image.png?expires=1619961246&amp;signature=2af7d15eb6c2ca8b0875762fce35f4351956a8e967772c020b86c8a6d4d46ada" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231884484/cbaaa5cc5c1b24aaac8a8a5a/image.png?expires=1619961246&amp;signature=2af7d15eb6c2ca8b0875762fce35f4351956a8e967772c020b86c8a6d4d46ada"></a></div></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creating a new classroom module</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/30/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Creating a training is done by successive creation of the various modules that will make up your training.</p><p class="no-margin">See <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975035">Creating a module</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create a new classroom module, click on the dedicated icon:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231908033/56f4cb5ba535142b357ecb04/image.png?expires=1619961665&amp;signature=36d628ed1170321b42047bc1a4a585c61658f7d8508f0cfc1d704a0a37838cd1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231908033/56f4cb5ba535142b357ecb04/image.png?expires=1619961665&amp;signature=36d628ed1170321b42047bc1a4a585c61658f7d8508f0cfc1d704a0a37838cd1"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Follow the instructions to complete the information in the Classroom Module.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231907473/60a1ab56a9cd113b34bdc1b8/image.png?expires=1619961665&amp;signature=523a042d70484d2c3bcca815273aed7e8bd66cf35fdd1a4f995743e038a80b95" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231907473/60a1ab56a9cd113b34bdc1b8/image.png?expires=1619961665&amp;signature=523a042d70484d2c3bcca815273aed7e8bd66cf35fdd1a4f995743e038a80b95"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For each classroom module, you can specify:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The title of the classroom module</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The description of the classroom module, by entering text and/or submitting a descriptive document</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">You can enter as many Classroom Sessions as you like.</p><p class="no-margin">As a reminder, the principle is that, to complete the classroom module, the learner should have attended one of the classroom sessions offered in the module.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Depending on the configuration, a learner can register for a given classroom session or be registered by someone else.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By default, the platform‚Äôs pre-configuration (‚öôÔ∏è) allows a user who would be registered for Training via the Catalog (by clicking the <b>Register</b> button) to register for a given classroom session at the same time. </p><p class="no-margin">However, it is possible to remove this option for the User*, in which case it will necessarily be an administrator (internal and/or partner) or even the training designer or the session facilitator or group manager who will have to register the user for a session.</p><p class="no-margin"><i>(*) to do so ‚Äì the pre-configuration must have this checkbox deselected: ‚ÄúAllow users to register for a classroom session at the same time as registering for training in the catalog‚Äù)</i></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Obviously, for each session you have to enter:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The start and end date of the session*</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The teaching time*</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The place and room</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Number of places available</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The Language in which the session will take place</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The facilitator(s) for the session</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A description of the session</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If the session is in a classroom or virtual class (checkbox if training can take place in a virtual class), once the administrator has activated the Virtual Class option in the configuration.<br>See <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3971753">Settings - Physical &amp; Virtual classrooms</a> article for further information.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231909704/5b50ba10de41175fb7949972/image.png?expires=1619961665&amp;signature=79e3b3a14068a4be8a4dcf2e5e28f59d26ea2ca905192531ba274c9b68fd0dce" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231909704/5b50ba10de41175fb7949972/image.png?expires=1619961665&amp;signature=79e3b3a14068a4be8a4dcf2e5e28f59d26ea2ca905192531ba274c9b68fd0dce"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>The facilitator(s) for the session:</b></p><p class="no-margin">It is not essential to enter a Facilitator for the classroom session created. One or more facilitator can be entered; this can be a person from outside the company with a user account in a Facilitator Role, but it can also be any other user with a ‚Äúrole‚Äù other than ‚ÄúFacilitator‚Äù. It can even be just a ‚ÄúLearner‚Äù with the skills to facilitate the Classroom Session created.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Note that any Facilitator of a Classroom Session can:</b></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">register a learner for a session that he or she is facilitating (provided, of course, that the particular learner is already registered for the corresponding training);</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">have access to reports related to the session being facilitated.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">It is always possible to add new sessions afterwards, or to cancel sessions. Sessions can be managed by Administrators (internal and/or partner) or designers.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creating a module - E-learning</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to create an e-learning module? What kind of content can I create on Rise Up?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">After <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974013">creating a training course</a>, then <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975035">creating a module</a>, you will have the opportunity to compose your module by creating different stages.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231900936/eae45edf11daa8248765f46f/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4e494cf4105fe07c3c9bece9e205bb672370ad6660a3ca7f37b641df04762f10" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231900936/eae45edf11daa8248765f46f/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4e494cf4105fe07c3c9bece9e205bb672370ad6660a3ca7f37b641df04762f10"></a></div><p class="no-margin">To create an e-learning module, the following information is entered:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="required-information" data-post-processed="true">Required information:</h3><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Title</b>: If you don‚Äôt change the title, it will appear with Title ‚ÄúNew online module‚Äù</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Teaching time</b>: This is the estimated time to approve the training module. This is a required field.</p></li></ul><h3 id="optional-information" data-post-processed="true">Optional information:</h3><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Description</b>: This insert describes the subject and expectations for this module. This description will be visible in the Catalog. This description can be entered in text format. But it is also possible to include an image and/or a video. A PDF file can also be included, and a link will be generated automatically in the insert. Just click it to access the content.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Deadline to access the module</b>: It is possible to specify a date or a number of days after registering for the training, after which the learner will be able to access the module.<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="creating-the-different-stages-making-up-an-e-learning-module" data-post-processed="true">Creating the different stages making up an e-learning module</h2><p class="no-margin">An e-learning module can contain as many stages as you wish. It will always be possible to change the order in which the different stages of a module are displayed by simply clicking  to the right of the module icon, then drag and drop.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231904077/049f996718f474dfa41a8c1c/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=9c27f1ac2b295eb755b89e36c86d48d52b4040cfa530674a9f07d3e687bdfda6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231904077/049f996718f474dfa41a8c1c/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=9c27f1ac2b295eb755b89e36c86d48d52b4040cfa530674a9f07d3e687bdfda6"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Each stage must have a title and must be uniquely associated with a single e-learning format from among the 10 offered by the Platform.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231912408/1ab751b7333c471d246a05e0/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=dfb8c25c85e3795663166104db1b4bb6cd066219a596a9e1237d2c94e46b28bb" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231912408/1ab751b7333c471d246a05e0/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=dfb8c25c85e3795663166104db1b4bb6cd066219a596a9e1237d2c94e46b28bb"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Create a video</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Document</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975290">Create a Quizz</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Text</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4143378">Create an Exam</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create an Iframe step</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Survey</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4274015">Create a Webcast</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Scorm</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Import an already existing step from the library</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="preview-your-training" data-post-processed="true">Preview your training</h2><p class="no-margin">By clicking on the <b>Preview</b> button, in the bottom left of your screen, you will be able to access a preview of your training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/266084694/1eb799c12808f1fe6445c445/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b56b28f8bcfec93566a002c337bf48670e3d561737ded929b4b5259a2f74463e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/266084694/1eb799c12808f1fe6445c445/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b56b28f8bcfec93566a002c337bf48670e3d561737ded929b4b5259a2f74463e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will visualize it as if you were a learner in order to be able to check what your training look like when completing it and to test for example your quizzes.</p><p class="no-margin"><br><br></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/13/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <title>Create an e-learning module &gt; Quiz | Rise Up Help Center</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Last updated on 09/04/2020">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

      <link rel="alternate" href="http://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3975290-create-an-e-learning-module-quiz" hreflang="en">

  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Create an e-learning module &gt; Quiz</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 09/04/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">In this article, find out how to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Set up a quiz</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create questions in a quiz </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235657001/5f450b297e70a1abc131ae39/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.57.17.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=4f1fc1dad3d83f7805ca247868ac51e6347ef32acd64fbe657d7d2d5c67f1e62" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235657001/5f450b297e70a1abc131ae39/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.57.17.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=4f1fc1dad3d83f7805ca247868ac51e6347ef32acd64fbe657d7d2d5c67f1e62"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="set-up-a-quiz" data-post-processed="true">Set up a quiz</h2><p class="no-margin">As part of the creation of a quiz, it is possible to configure:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">a score to achieve</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">a maximum number of trials</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">a timer</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">the coefficients per response</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">display of corrections</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242987091/ea74487b4fa6487616aee5cc/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=f05c1fbc3e9f68bca53fce10d063f8a54906e392821c35e3e9b84fc4f99fda54" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242987091/ea74487b4fa6487616aee5cc/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=f05c1fbc3e9f68bca53fce10d063f8a54906e392821c35e3e9b84fc4f99fda54"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="score-to-achieve" data-post-processed="true">Score to achieve</h3><p class="no-margin">The score to be achieved corresponds, as its name suggests, to the minimum score that the learner must achieve to pass his quiz. This is a percentage (XX%) of correct answers to have on the whole quiz.</p><p class="no-margin">Logically, the higher is the percentage, the more difficult it will be to pass the quiz. On the contrary, if the percentage is low, it will be easier for him to pass the quiz.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If he does not reach this minimum score, he will be told that he has failed the quiz and if he has any tries left, he will be invited to retake the quiz. This mechanism will recur as long as he has not reached the minimum score, and he has still possible tries.<br><br></p><h3 id="maximum-number-of-trials" data-post-processed="true">Maximum number of trials</h3><p class="no-margin">The maximum number of attempts is the number of attempts the learner has to redo the quiz and attempt to pass the quiz and / or improve his score.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The number of tries he has is displayed at the start of the quiz.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h3 id="timer" data-post-processed="true">Timer</h3><p class="no-margin">The time entered corresponds to the time granted to the learner to complete the quiz.</p><p class="no-margin">When starting the quiz, the learner is warned by an information window of the time he has to complete the quiz and the time scrolls at the top of the page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242988501/57bc63685cceaf10fef0b0eb/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=8edefd3d8660b2d00bbb2c1241c356e861f373651fed93fb3c3b8688e9138927" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242988501/57bc63685cceaf10fef0b0eb/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=8edefd3d8660b2d00bbb2c1241c356e861f373651fed93fb3c3b8688e9138927"></a></div><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242988875/1250f4a5d26dd72bcb307515/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=f356813dfd648c587d2f643b2bcec2bd02ca0e8fe9d5f9cbb3ef3722c6c375ec" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242988875/1250f4a5d26dd72bcb307515/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=f356813dfd648c587d2f643b2bcec2bd02ca0e8fe9d5f9cbb3ef3722c6c375ec"></a></div><p class="no-margin">If he does not finish the quiz before the end of the allotted time, his answers are taken into account as they are and validated. If he did not answer some questions, those questions are considered incorrect.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="modify-the-coefficients" data-post-processed="true">Modify the coefficients</h3><p class="no-margin">By default, if the <b>Modify coefficients </b>box is not checked, all the questions have the same value. The weighting is distributed equally among the different questions.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By checking the <b>Modify coefficients </b>box, an additional field appears in front of each question.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242989708/1e77bcdaa22e74830081e92b/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=5c7a203233f47dd05e8122a8498164a3ad9c20fd6692ac39ad20918ab4387dd7" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242989708/1e77bcdaa22e74830081e92b/image.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=5c7a203233f47dd05e8122a8498164a3ad9c20fd6692ac39ad20918ab4387dd7"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For every question, you must enter the corresponding coefficient.</p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è The sum of the coefficients must be equal to 100.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h3 id="show-correction-to-users" data-post-processed="true">Show correction to users</h3><p class="no-margin">This box is checked by default when creating a new quiz.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If this box is checked, the correction will be displayed to learners as soon as they have reached the minimum score to be reached or when they have reached the maximum number of attempts and will therefore no longer be able to repeat the quiz.<br><br><br></p><h2 id="creating-questions-in-a-quiz" data-post-processed="true">Creating questions in a quiz</h2><p class="no-margin">When creating an e-learning quiz module there are 6 types of quiz/questions : </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235245416/d7e1e7bf938c0006219894e6/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+11.55.02.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=e4e2c5427602da3fcb696347c634b36ce1aa1f471d8ceefb72651d80ce543ae8" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235245416/d7e1e7bf938c0006219894e6/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+11.55.02.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=e4e2c5427602da3fcb696347c634b36ce1aa1f471d8ceefb72651d80ce543ae8"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>True or False</b>: In this exercise, you ask your question, and the user must say if he thinks the answer is True or False. You can include text explaining the answer.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235591526/255f6c16249c02a83293e608/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+10.08.49.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=5fbe7cd88aac70e18994a2c6836f895940592d76a71c2dae9fd24125f22e6440" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235591526/255f6c16249c02a83293e608/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+10.08.49.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=5fbe7cd88aac70e18994a2c6836f895940592d76a71c2dae9fd24125f22e6440"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Multiple choice</b>: In this exercise, you ask your question, add the different possible answers, and define on the right side of the screen which ones are correct. The learner will have to select the correct answers from those offered. An explanatory text may also appear to enrich the answer.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235370151/cc755f1c929204d7b46793e5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+17.30.12.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=0390cc58af8c982f71864dacd97968082484fdc201c4e18d36995e8868c05f86" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235370151/cc755f1c929204d7b46793e5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+17.30.12.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=0390cc58af8c982f71864dacd97968082484fdc201c4e18d36995e8868c05f86"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235290697/901c368da27a1046ee37d5ea/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+14.12.50.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=35fa72a31b63108b640e088ed1a22e93e7e2bb9774289fccaeb4fd63cf8b912a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235290697/901c368da27a1046ee37d5ea/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-11+%C3%A0+14.12.50.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=35fa72a31b63108b640e088ed1a22e93e7e2bb9774289fccaeb4fd63cf8b912a"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Dragging the words</b>: In this exercise, you write a sentence or a blank text and leave some spaces to be filled. To add the blanks, you will need to use the * around the words, or the sentence. The learner will then have to select and drag the suggested words to the right place. </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235970126/0d6b9d2588180bc1493f2082/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+10.47.46.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=6b6268d98fe681c7a516abfd9f4ab91de552898e4592d1fbb96634e280b0437c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235970126/0d6b9d2588180bc1493f2082/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+10.47.46.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=6b6268d98fe681c7a516abfd9f4ab91de552898e4592d1fbb96634e280b0437c"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Fill in the blanks</b>: this is about filling in the white areas</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235601880/3c3fac43c36fbdaa03526988/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+10.45.42.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=1201e4f4721fb05afa073cd13ec8476bf4b5c808803f7f0da8439da5b405f880" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235601880/3c3fac43c36fbdaa03526988/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+10.45.42.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=1201e4f4721fb05afa073cd13ec8476bf4b5c808803f7f0da8439da5b405f880"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Image hotspot</b>: In this exercise, you ask a question, and then select a background image on which you define one or more areas of interest to find. The user will have to click and drag on the area(s) corresponding to the question.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235605174/a6054939d5a6b1141e30f0ac/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+10.56.18.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=b0ec1600ea58af2c0ca6b5e696600b576d231580c76c467f55c57524e8a169c5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235605174/a6054939d5a6b1141e30f0ac/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+10.56.18.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=b0ec1600ea58af2c0ca6b5e696600b576d231580c76c467f55c57524e8a169c5"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Drag &amp; Drop</b>: this exercise is about combining ideas. It is possible to associate an image with text or another image. It is also possible to associate text with another text.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235609197/e37aa8e9d9af00faeb68924a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+11.11.59.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=511ad35c0dd055d309815905630b709c1cd725de53b83df1ab0c7737e9f780e1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235609197/e37aa8e9d9af00faeb68924a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+11.11.59.png?expires=1619906862&amp;signature=511ad35c0dd055d309815905630b709c1cd725de53b83df1ab0c7737e9f780e1"></a></div></article>
    </div>

  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Validate trainings created by Designers</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/13/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Two accesses are possible:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Direct access from the Dashboard, by clicking in the<b> Pending Actions</b> box</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236338922/79fd812d6b9dc2cbdeefdbae/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+11.23.10.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=23cebdb036426130acf03b56de5bc7d8ad5e86221159395428feb34c6c5ef709" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236338922/79fd812d6b9dc2cbdeefdbae/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+11.23.10.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=23cebdb036426130acf03b56de5bc7d8ad5e86221159395428feb34c6c5ef709"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Access via : <b>Side menu </b>&gt; <b>Training</b> &gt; <b>Validate trainings</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">In the previous steps, we saw how to create a training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Only Administrators (partner administrators) and designers can create a training. However, there is a difference depending on whether the training is created by an Administrator (partner administrator) or by a Designer.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>When the training is created by an Administrator</b>, as soon as the administrator clicks on the <b>Publish</b> button, the status of the training changes from <b>Draft</b> to <b>Published </b>and can therefore be visible to learners according to the visibility rules that have been defined.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">On the other hand, in a standard configuration, <b>when the training is created by a Designer</b>, when the latter clicks on the <b>Publish</b> button, the training does not immediately go to the Published state but goes through a <b>Pending validation</b> state.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In the latter case, the Administrator (or partner administrator) must validate the training so that it is published and therefore accessible.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">He will access the validation page for pending training (below)</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236341191/ac3a1692ba51370588aff52b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+11.45.46.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b151c79d9da21cd32baa0399ee824cbe954e70d8f6e54e5c847ddfede47bb94e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236341191/ac3a1692ba51370588aff52b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+11.45.46.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b151c79d9da21cd32baa0399ee824cbe954e70d8f6e54e5c847ddfede47bb94e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">He can then decide whether to:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">‚úÖ Validate the training </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">‚ùå Refuse to validate the training </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The designer will receive an email to notify him (if it has not been deactivated).</p></article>
    </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Manage trainings created</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/13/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Trainings</b> &gt; <b>View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will arrive on the Training consultation page, which is accessible to Administrators, Partner administrators, Designers, Group managers.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235980967/66e892ba4d4a492f48c2396c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+11.26.31.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b7b495c7fed6d7a5a855558f79c06163aa79ad8581eaa01af398fb4f5f6a2333" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235980967/66e892ba4d4a492f48c2396c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+11.26.31.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=b7b495c7fed6d7a5a855558f79c06163aa79ad8581eaa01af398fb4f5f6a2333"></a></div><p class="no-margin">This training consultation page presents the list of training courses that you can consult, each training being presented in the form of a horizontal band (thumbnail) showing the main training information (see above).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">All training courses are presented, regardless of their state (draft, awaiting validation, published) and their type (multi-perimeter, public, anonymous).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="sort-function" data-post-processed="true">Sort function</h2><p class="no-margin">A Sort function on the right side of the screen allows you to select the desired training according to the following criteria:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Presence of copies to be corrected in training </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Presence of physical sessions in training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Archived training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>State of training</b>: Published,  Draft, Pending validation,</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Accessibility</b> of training: Visible, Invisible, Inaccessible </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è Training in 'Draft' or 'Awaiting validation' state is necessarily inaccessible. Once 'published', a training course can be either Visible (in the Catalog) or Invisible, depending on what has been configured in the description of the training course when it was created.</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Type</b> of training: Internal, Partner (associated with a specific Partner), Public, Anonymous, Imported training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training categories and sub-categories</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training creators/designers</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training path</b> to which the training is linked</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Keywords</b> associated with the training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If this category has been selected upstream in the configuration : <b>Custom fields </b>associated with training </p></li></ul><h2 id="presentation-of-a-training-thumbnail" data-post-processed="true">Presentation of a training thumbnail</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236041586/bb615b7b862f4f82e65d6706/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+14.48.14.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=5230eb5e24cee77c9c2313f7c76ccd7b3e07d19ab11683713407ab30e912cfce" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236041586/bb615b7b862f4f82e65d6706/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+14.48.14.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=5230eb5e24cee77c9c2313f7c76ccd7b3e07d19ab11683713407ab30e912cfce"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Directly on the training thumbnail, appear : </p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Pending corrections</b>: With a single click, it is possible to go directly to the exam correction management page </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236064098/6e4f9df6ac66cfbd866fc188/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+15.41.06.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4b7cb83d35d542b290cafda4cece0229e572b790477fb77530d2d6722eb381ce" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236064098/6e4f9df6ac66cfbd866fc188/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+15.41.06.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4b7cb83d35d542b290cafda4cece0229e572b790477fb77530d2d6722eb381ce"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Physical modules</b>: With a single click, you can go directly to the classroom session management page </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236320937/563a4b61e652d29db83169ed/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+10.28.02.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=37b471d31c58fba4fda3c036eae4ba81fc8b81e5b842013bd60e57eb2579ef34" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236320937/563a4b61e652d29db83169ed/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+10.28.02.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=37b471d31c58fba4fda3c036eae4ba81fc8b81e5b842013bd60e57eb2579ef34"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In the top right corner of each thumbnail, you can access the different management options : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">‚úèÔ∏è <b>Modification of the training</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">‚öôÔ∏è <b>Training management</b> (see focus below): Allows access to the Training Management Page where it will be possible:</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">&gt; To consult the training statistics</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; To manage the translations of the training (if internalization has selected in the configuration upstream -&gt; the 'Activate training translations' box has been checked)</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; To manage classroom sessions (if applicable)</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; To register users for Training</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; To link user groups to this training (allows to register automatically any user included in a user group, to the training - NB: there will be no unsubscription once the user has registered if the latter is subsequently deleted from the group linked to the training)</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">üìå <b>Pin a training to move it to the top of the list</b>: To find it easily, it is always possible to display at the top of the screen the training(s) on which you are most likely to work. All you have to do is pin the training by clicking on the icon, which will become darker when the training is pinned. Unpin the training by clicking again on the same icon.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">[<b>3 vertical dots</b>] Shows more management options: </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236096842/7e28a6ed74fbfb7653ccbc63/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.00.15.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4caea8f87a98287975ba3f402742a362339670d675880ab49858ff5b40406ab3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236096842/7e28a6ed74fbfb7653ccbc63/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.00.15.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=4caea8f87a98287975ba3f402742a362339670d675880ab49858ff5b40406ab3"></a></div><h2 id="available-training-management-options" data-post-processed="true">Available training management options</h2><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Preview</b>: By clicking on Preview you will be taken to a page where you can view the training as learners can see it and you can complete the training yourself by clicking on <b><i>Start</i></b> to appreciate the user experience for learners.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236100503/dbfe7e627989e85f9e740835/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.13.27.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=f160513b358f635063634a8f8d044279fec5631dd269dae13ac8bfc7af5df877" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236100503/dbfe7e627989e85f9e740835/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.13.27.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=f160513b358f635063634a8f8d044279fec5631dd269dae13ac8bfc7af5df877"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Duplicate</b>: By clicking on "<b><i>Duplicate</i></b>", you access the training creation / modification page, with a green ephemeral message indicating that you have successfully duplicated the training. If you leave the page just after having duplicated the training, no problem, a duplicate of your training will have been created. You will find it in a 'draft' state in the list of your training courses with the mention (copy) (by returning to Side Menu &gt; View &gt; Training). It will look like the first training in every way, but will have a new creation date.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/237274922/38f465b868918b0728ea2c5b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-18+%C3%A0+10.09.31.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=2f7d32c835120b9f4b008008751f1816c288a8aa69745b73c34993b6c8b8a93f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/237274922/38f465b868918b0728ea2c5b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-18+%C3%A0+10.09.31.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=2f7d32c835120b9f4b008008751f1816c288a8aa69745b73c34993b6c8b8a93f"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Manage visibility</b>: By clicking on Manage visibility ‚Äô, you will bring up the following window where you can choose whether you want the training to be <b><i>Accessible</i></b> or <b><i>Inaccessible</i></b>.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236104331/7266fefcad275303444b670c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.21.47.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ebfadeffa90ddf8a8fa08fce2cb9ffafc01f9767319d0d49a63227c62b1be9f5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236104331/7266fefcad275303444b670c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.21.47.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ebfadeffa90ddf8a8fa08fce2cb9ffafc01f9767319d0d49a63227c62b1be9f5"></a></div><p class="no-margin">&gt; <b>Inaccessible</b>: The training will not appear in any Catalog. It will only be accessible in the Training Consultation Page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">&gt;<b> Accessible</b>: In this case, it is possible to manage the visibility of the training, either positively (by defining the users and / or groups of users for whom the training will be visible in the Catalog) or exclusively ( by defining the only users and / or groups of users for whom the training will not be visible in the Catalog).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Archive</b>: By clicking on Archive, after a double validation (a pop-up appears to validate that you have not made a wrong manipulation), you archive the training definitively. You will be able to find the training (in particular by sorting to select only the archived training) in your Training consultation page but it will become permanently inaccessible and you will no longer be able to register anyone for this training.</p></li></ul><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Delete</b>: By clicking on Delete, after a double validation (a pop-up appears to confirm that you have not done a wrong manipulation), you permanently delete the training. It won't be visible anywhere, not even on your Training list Page.</p></li></ul></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Edit a training</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/30/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Panel &gt; Trainings &gt; View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To edit existing training, you must:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Go to the <b>View training list page</b>,</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Identify the training you wish to edit and click on the pen edit icon ‚úèÔ∏è in the thumbnail of the chosen training.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">It is possible to edit any formation, regardless of its status: <b>Draft</b>, <b>Pending approval</b> or even <b>Published </b>(obviously it is not possible to edit archived training). </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>A Pop-Up </b>will then be displayed, if necessary, to warn you in either or both of the following 2 situations:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">If the status of the Training you want to edit is <b>Published</b> (therefore approved), you will be notified that any changes you make to the training and save will then immediately be visible to all learners to whom the training is visible.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If the training translation feature was activated in the Platform‚Äôs Pre-Configuration, you will be alerted to <b>direct you to the right translation management page</b> in case you just want to edit the translations of the particular training.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">In fact, by clicking the <b>Edit</b> button in the pop-up window, you will be able to edit the training, apart from any translations of the training.</p><p class="no-margin">If you want either to start one or more translations of the training or to edit/complete translations already started, you won‚Äôt have to click the <b>Edit </b>button but <b>Click Here</b> outlined in red below.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231881697/1916426fa9448b483dfddb80/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=62237b1689085054cac9d10c9a33803a4a76c79b6f885f06a403f40088531ba3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231881697/1916426fa9448b483dfddb80/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=62237b1689085054cac9d10c9a33803a4a76c79b6f885f06a403f40088531ba3"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">To manage translations, refer to the specific stage on managing translations.<br>For more information see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973441">Translating a training</a> article.</p></li></ul></article>

          <h1 class="t__h1">Management of classroom sessions</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/17/2020
          </div>

      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Two accesses are possible:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Side menu</b> &gt; <b>Training</b> &gt; <b>Manage </b>‚öôÔ∏è in the thumbnail of the chosen training course, then click on <b>Manage classroom sessions</b> located in the top left corner of the training management screen (the training must have a least a classroom session for this button to appear).</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236373073/4d5a54d7dfbd311d877fa856/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+13.46.18.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=342cf0e7f6742f191754b2e30fa2c32404604bd22cf3e63c556b1b83e8838747" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236373073/4d5a54d7dfbd311d877fa856/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+13.46.18.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=342cf0e7f6742f191754b2e30fa2c32404604bd22cf3e63c556b1b83e8838747"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Side menu</b> &gt; <b>Training</b> &gt; <b>Manage classroom sessions</b> (to access to all classroom sessions for all trainings combined)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This takes you to the <b>Classroom Sessions Page</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236374098/839176ce34cc14d86ac3e2e7/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+13.52.21.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=219ae98e4121287f98fc25acce61bfe1714d357598df3fd797792311aa6565cf" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236374098/839176ce34cc14d86ac3e2e7/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+13.52.21.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=219ae98e4121287f98fc25acce61bfe1714d357598df3fd797792311aa6565cf"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From this page you will be able to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Create a new session</b> (see '<i>Create a new session</i>' below)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Sort to find sessions</b>. The Sort function is on the right side of the screen.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">For each existing classroom Session:</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è<b> View </b>the classroom Session</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; ‚úâÔ∏è <b>Contact all Users registered</b> for the classroom Session</p><p class="no-margin">&gt; ‚úèÔ∏è <b>Modify</b> the classroom Session </p><p class="no-margin">&gt; [3 vertical dots] <b>Activate additional options</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="create-a-new-session" data-post-processed="true">Create a new session</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236919656/86cd64eeab35aad162e4b956/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-17+%C3%A0+11.14.49.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=06ae520a8e13c0f4b01751c7520c70657b698696f8b14896a7e5bdc9034b2962" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236919656/86cd64eeab35aad162e4b956/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-17+%C3%A0+11.14.49.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=06ae520a8e13c0f4b01751c7520c70657b698696f8b14896a7e5bdc9034b2962"></a></div><p class="no-margin">To create a new classroom session, click on "<b>Add classroom session</b>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The modal allows you to configure the classroom session:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training</b>: Select the training to which the classroom session is linked.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Module</b>: Select the module to which the classroom session is linked.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Then complete the fields related to the creation of classroom session.</p></li></ul><h2 id="manage-classroom-sessions" data-post-processed="true">Manage Classroom sessions</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>Vizualize the Session in person</b> üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236379273/1c7dc142f25d1f3ef47a8a71/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+14.10.56.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=37e9fbce760806d504f3a1775bbb5af162fd087bd7e9a7eeca27cbaab187fff6" class="no-margin"><b>Contact all Users registered for the Classroom Session ‚úâÔ∏è</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236381895/572be8f017ace92ee64f1b5d/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+14.19.08.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=e2dca546e3d1cbb140aab9b68196a0ed5d77282f26295a73d8c45d38c4c5e510" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img class="no-margin"><b>Modify the Classroom Session</b> ‚úèÔ∏è</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236384596/7ef950febb3cff94133aeac9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+14.28.13.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=af5069448094f73537a0b9e0ec26bad4d9a0eccd4baaec20b04a5f3ead2ff419" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img
