class="no-margin">The additional options (3 horizontal dots) are as follows:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236394321/cfd0ca7d98b31c380bb907cf/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+14.31.21.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=0595b8f1c97ff584b0b40551e7e98adbb368566e39589c86146ea982b0b942c5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236394321/cfd0ca7d98b31c380bb907cf/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+14.31.21.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=0595b8f1c97ff584b0b40551e7e98adbb368566e39589c86146ea982b0b942c5"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Register Users to a classroom session</b></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236405343/422d5e547f3e15b12fe9ae6a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.30.38.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=c56fc7904525724b9744464007acfa6c7524491a6f3e6a107f424c1884feb526" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236405343/422d5e547f3e15b12fe9ae6a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.30.38.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=c56fc7904525724b9744464007acfa6c7524491a6f3e6a107f424c1884feb526"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Attendance sheet for a classroom session</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236406232/5d878dc20a3952b441fcfd94/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.33.46.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=8c942ac43bf5ad42761506378ca809567668ae3613f2b55e8e9efe39502f17ae" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236406232/5d878dc20a3952b441fcfd94/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.33.46.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=8c942ac43bf5ad42761506378ca809567668ae3613f2b55e8e9efe39502f17ae"></a></div><h2 id="manage-session-state" data-post-processed="true">Manage session state</h2><p class="no-margin">In order to manage / display if a session is confirmed / unconfirmed, sessions can have two distinct states:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Pending</b>: By default, a new session created is in "Pending" state. This means that the session has a temporary state and is not yet confirmed by the facilitator.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236410744/55ac452494bdbc74b245d049/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.35.09.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=55bf3e914958520d7ebe417bddef1a0d696dbc03074751ab25e2ad9a9e536af3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236410744/55ac452494bdbc74b245d049/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.35.09.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=55bf3e914958520d7ebe417bddef1a0d696dbc03074751ab25e2ad9a9e536af3"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Validated</b>: The session is confirmed by the facilitator and will take place.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236410345/caf2364b7f910fe24e94f22c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.35.57.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=1d70ce66b956275b52c2280884d8307df78094126e6e722df7e8c04f9bd938a2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236410345/caf2364b7f910fe24e94f22c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.35.57.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=1d70ce66b956275b52c2280884d8307df78094126e6e722df7e8c04f9bd938a2"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The states can meet a session management need. They allow to display that a session is confirmed beyond a certain number of registrants, a few days before the training, etc. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The state allows the learner to know if his session is already confirmed or not. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In order to <b>Validate a session</b> in a <b>Pending state</b>, select the session in question, click on <b>More options</b> (3 horizontal dots), and then on <b>Validate</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236415823/c4db75492a53b9c66b518ab1/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.55.26.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=b9b88f36f780f7d1b93d827f44bba21f808bfcf4c99e82e36b513fd5d15b370e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236415823/c4db75492a53b9c66b518ab1/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-14+%C3%A0+15.55.26.png?expires=1619959111&amp;signature=b9b88f36f780f7d1b93d827f44bba21f808bfcf4c99e82e36b513fd5d15b370e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">When a session is validated, the people concerned (learners, facilitators, etc.) are notified.</p></article>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Correct learner's exams</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/17/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Only the Designers / Conceptors of the training integrating an exam or the Administrators (potentially Partner Administrators) can correct the exams.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In this article, discover how to : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Access to the exam correction</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Correct an exam</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Re-open an exam to let your learner retake his exam</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="access-to-the-exam-correction" data-post-processed="true">Access to the exam correction</h2><p class="no-margin">To access the exam correction page, there are several possible ways :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">From the <b>Pending Actions</b> insert accessible directly on the <b>Dashboard</b> (on the left of the screen) by clicking on Pending Corrections. The number of exams awaiting correction is then displayed.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236108963/ccc7edd62854042fdf4ee6f4/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.32.19.png?expires=1619959749&amp;signature=9c5cda32d8e1a4a4bc4b158c46be5495ce0dfb54cc50b45a09067a149e36f14c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236108963/ccc7edd62854042fdf4ee6f4/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.32.19.png?expires=1619959749&amp;signature=9c5cda32d8e1a4a4bc4b158c46be5495ce0dfb54cc50b45a09067a149e36f14c"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">From the<b> General Management Menu </b>&gt; <b>Training </b>&gt; <b>Pending corrections</b></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236108066/b39199474afd74512f1f360e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.30.16.png?expires=1619959749&amp;signature=4f84c57a5782bc4d7b35bfbf19710abecc6b3ba78e9eacee3f4dc33300f26c8e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236108066/b39199474afd74512f1f360e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.30.16.png?expires=1619959749&amp;signature=4f84c57a5782bc4d7b35bfbf19710abecc6b3ba78e9eacee3f4dc33300f26c8e"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">From the <b>Training consultation page</b>, after having check the box on "<b>Copies to correct</b>" on the right side of the screen.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Pending corrections are highlighted (circled in red below) for each training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236111800/e8128c872a16c1bd43837ab4/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.39.59.png?expires=1619959749&amp;signature=28e1f3261cd6cf1e7069a6e949b2c33a233755c57505af6c6c8efebe164cef52" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236111800/e8128c872a16c1bd43837ab4/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.39.59.png?expires=1619959749&amp;signature=28e1f3261cd6cf1e7069a6e949b2c33a233755c57505af6c6c8efebe164cef52"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on "<i>pending correction</i>" you access the Exam Correction Page :</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236112445/2fd943702cde28e76b69d6ea/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.42.21.png?expires=1619959750&amp;signature=ae3a3d0cdd79cb0f0b88511d24f9eb9ff9a1c8b5accaabf3e0dbb01aa599d8ca" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/236112445/2fd943702cde28e76b69d6ea/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-13+%C3%A0+17.42.21.png?expires=1619959750&amp;signature=ae3a3d0cdd79cb0f0b88511d24f9eb9ff9a1c8b5accaabf3e0dbb01aa599d8ca"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="correct-an-exam" data-post-processed="true">Correct an exam</h2><p class="no-margin">By clicking on Edit ‚úèÔ∏è on the line of the desired exam, the correction page opens. You will find :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The question that had been asked the learner</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The learner's answer</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/239790925/2f643b8888ac4432555e20ac/image.png?expires=1619959750&amp;signature=142adad36b08d75acbc035f10e291b3170a415291c2995d8a7f29059a476f271" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/239790925/2f643b8888ac4432555e20ac/image.png?expires=1619959750&amp;signature=142adad36b08d75acbc035f10e291b3170a415291c2995d8a7f29059a476f271"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can then enter:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">your corrected answer</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">a free comment</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Finally, you must indicate whether the answer is correct or not by clicking on <b>Right / Correct </b>or <b>Wrong / False</b>.<br>Then by clicking on <b>Correct</b>, the learner is notified that his exam has been corrected and can access the correction entered by the corrector.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="re-open-an-exam" data-post-processed="true">Re-open an exam</h2><p class="no-margin">If needed, you have the option of allowing the learner to retake the exam by checking the <b>Re-open the question</b> box. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/239791734/6436828a04028ebe46b87e32/image.png?expires=1619959750&amp;signature=1cf9b32c94abfb9804c66efd4f5129d5cab05ce848ecd22b71d6e6017a1a660b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/239791734/6436828a04028ebe46b87e32/image.png?expires=1619959750&amp;signature=1cf9b32c94abfb9804c66efd4f5129d5cab05ce848ecd22b71d6e6017a1a660b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In this case, by clicking on <b>Correct</b>, the learner will be able to retake the exam again and the state of the exam becomes "<b>Exam Reopened</b>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The learner is notified that his exam has been corrected and can retake the exam.</p></article>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Register several learners to a training</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/04/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>

    </div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access :  <b>Side menu </b>&gt; <b>Training</b> &gt; <b>View. </b></p><p class="no-margin">Then click on<b> "Settings" </b>‚öôÔ∏èin the thumbnail of the chosen training. Click on "<b>Register users to training</b>" located in the upper right corner of the training management screen.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233158288/11c658d6259788cab1bfa3d5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+13.37.48.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=f6657e6836b39bb67624ff89ebec7c958903c2ccbd4ea7f1bd0ff0b3c4426efb" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233158288/11c658d6259788cab1bfa3d5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+13.37.48.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=f6657e6836b39bb67624ff89ebec7c958903c2ccbd4ea7f1bd0ff0b3c4426efb"></a></div><p class="no-margin">On this interface are listed all the users and/or user groups already registered for the training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on "<b>Register users to training</b>", the following window appears : </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233164940/2758cf11838758a15aa887a5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+14.00.26.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=4afa10e74c1c032e661d3360d91729a9d6dd58a657abc6b4d7b57a1839e3ec07" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233164940/2758cf11838758a15aa887a5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+14.00.26.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=4afa10e74c1c032e661d3360d91729a9d6dd58a657abc6b4d7b57a1839e3ec07"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You must enter letters contained in the name of the users sought to make them appear below the <b>Search</b> box.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233174618/95c242194ef549eb79459930/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+14.23.26.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=df471406921a2f25abbbd470891dd5660414a5077b806ad7143c32db948d8439" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233174618/95c242194ef549eb79459930/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+14.23.26.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=df471406921a2f25abbbd470891dd5660414a5077b806ad7143c32db948d8439"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will find in the user registration page :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">On the left, your search results among existing users in the directory.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">On the right, the people you have selected and added to the list of registrants by clicking on the‚ûï</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">In fact, by clicking on the ‚ûï in front of a User / Group, this group / user is automatically selected, and then goes in the list on the right side of the page. Once all the desired Users/groups have been selected, all you have to do is click on the <b>Next</b> button (the number of users to register is indicated in parenthesis) to display the window for registration to sessions.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233185663/2415487f2fe842b11a45ceb0/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+14.24.01.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=fb17ec26a05b286eb9c0ed96f2a736d7d5fb049b85391d33cae28c4545edc2fd" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233185663/2415487f2fe842b11a45ceb0/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+14.24.01.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=fb17ec26a05b286eb9c0ed96f2a736d7d5fb049b85391d33cae28c4545edc2fd"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on the Register button, the previously identified users are registered.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">When returning to the training management page, you will immediately see that the list of users registered for the training has been updated accordingly.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can link a group to a training to automatically register members of this group to this training. For more information, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3989126">Link groups to a training to register them automatically</a>.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Link Groups to a training course to trigger automatic registration</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to set up automatic registrations for training courses?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Only Administrators, Partner Administrators, and Designers can link groups to a course.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Lateral Menu &gt; Training &gt; View </b>in the thumbnail of the training selected, scroll down to the bottom part of the page dedicated to Users, then click the <b>Linked Groups</b> button to switch from managing registered users to managing linked groups.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241646932/939675b18a2c10d83b85ae65/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=d3a405e24da83c4b796e749c724b4ee1a03455db778821ae77c9ec4e2fd45527" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241646932/939675b18a2c10d83b85ae65/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=d3a405e24da83c4b796e749c724b4ee1a03455db778821ae77c9ec4e2fd45527"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Screenshot - bottom part of the <b>Manage training </b>page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241647129/3cf0138e9e8c007dc26b89f4/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=c2199403e088888ff093f1b373e3480dbb63c3477ed3a6726b2993082687215a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241647129/3cf0138e9e8c007dc26b89f4/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=c2199403e088888ff093f1b373e3480dbb63c3477ed3a6726b2993082687215a"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The window below is displayed to select the groups you want to link to the training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241647324/28d6e360ad08546dae2a22d9/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=a8dd4874e5b5b5e6378dc3068707ee2ffa52d3aaade9c0a75bc48a184e7e696b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241647324/28d6e360ad08546dae2a22d9/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=a8dd4874e5b5b5e6378dc3068707ee2ffa52d3aaade9c0a75bc48a184e7e696b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Simply click the <b>Valdiate </b>button to link the selected groups to the training and see the new groups linked to the training appear in the box outlined in green.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241647549/87f0efeb06e6f4e90a6ae6c8/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=05a7e2dc39a3605bdfce2e3453c09aa2406d4b6b0efe231f02a5ac617d279d85" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241647549/87f0efeb06e6f4e90a6ae6c8/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=05a7e2dc39a3605bdfce2e3453c09aa2406d4b6b0efe231f02a5ac617d279d85"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>Principle of Groups Linked to Training:</b></p><p class="no-margin">When a user group is linked to a training course, it means that any user who is a member of that group or becomes a member in the future will be registered for the training automatically.</p><p class="no-margin">Note that if Users are subsequently removed from the group, they will not be unregistered from the training for which they were automatically registered.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 12/02/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Approving registrations made by learners</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/25/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><h2 id="prerequisite---settings" data-post-processed="true">PREREQUISITE - Settings</h2><p class="no-margin">In this case, <b>Administrative Approval</b>, which can only take place if, during configuration of the training in the Configuration section, the <b>Allow users to register</b> box has been checked and the <b>Allow users to register without needing confirmation from the administrator</b> box has remained unchecked. This is the default Configuration for the Rise Up Platform.<br>For more details on configuring a training, see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Create a training &gt; Configuration</a>. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Direct access from the Dashboard, by clicking in the <b>Pending actions</b> insert</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚¨õ Allow users to register<br></p><p class="no-margin">‚¨ú Allow users to register without needing confirmation from the administrator</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can access to the pending registration request from : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Direct access from the Dashboard, by clicking in the <b>Pending actions</b> insert</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241644727/526cca7b5c15a65559388d63/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=e7ef08b7ccc37c4784ddd2bd961a5b55d5465b724767e39eb99130efbc432b3f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241644727/526cca7b5c15a65559388d63/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=e7ef08b7ccc37c4784ddd2bd961a5b55d5465b724767e39eb99130efbc432b3f"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Access via: <b>Lateral Panel &gt; Training registration &gt; Approve training </b></p></li></ul><h2 id="approving-pending-requests" data-post-processed="true"><br><br>Approving pending requests</h2><p class="no-margin">For a User to be registered for training:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Either the administrator (internal or partner, as applicable), the designer or even the Group Manager directly registers the user for training (by single user registration or using a linked group).<br>This is what we have just seen in the previous stage.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Or User take the initiative by registering themselves for a training course accessible and visible in the Catalog. In this case, as part of the default configuration, this user registration is only a simple registration request that has to be approved administratively to trigger the actual user registration for training.<br>This is what we‚Äôll describe below.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"><b>Pending Training Registration Approval Page</b> page</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241645175/929435facc568984958b8374/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=f9fddc8286ae6a8b3379b7fc26a6114d8a3fb94f3d064fdd931ccf8a20112c3c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241645175/929435facc568984958b8374/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=f9fddc8286ae6a8b3379b7fc26a6114d8a3fb94f3d064fdd931ccf8a20112c3c"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking <b>View </b>üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è (eye icon), you will display: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Details of the registration request.    </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Details of the training (with option of access to the training)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Information about the user</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241645522/ebc5e053eacdba1010f27f2a/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=c3854d34a9ad11b4c3c3cb5c5dfca03faebf2524ce7512087daf016df313655e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241645522/ebc5e053eacdba1010f27f2a/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=c3854d34a9ad11b4c3c3cb5c5dfca03faebf2524ce7512087daf016df313655e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can then make an informed decision as to whether or not to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">‚úÖ Approve the registration request</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">‚ùå Refuse the registration request</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">(if the corresponding e-mail templates have not been deactivated, the user will receive an e-mail to notify them of the decision: Approval or Refusal)</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="container">
      <div class="content educate_content"><section class="section section__article">
    <div class="breadcrumb" dir="ltr">
  <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">
    <a href="/en/">All Collections</a>
  </div>

      <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">
        <a href="/en/collections/2299715-management-of-registrations">Management of registrations</a>
      </div>

  <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">Manage registration requests (made by form)</div>
</div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Manage registration requests (made by form)</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/04/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">In the Settings section, you have the option of enabling learners and / or administrators to make requests for training that would not be available in your catalog.</p><p class="no-margin">For more information, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3971606">Setting - Training Catalog</a>, section Activate training requests in the catalog &amp; Activate training requests on the training administration page.<br></p><p class="no-margin">To access training requests by form : <b>Side menu &gt; Training registrations &gt; Manage training requests</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Two settings are possible:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Possibility for a learner to express an individual training request (from the Catalog)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Possibility of expressing training requests for a group of learners</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="opportunity-for-a-learner-to-express-an-individual-training-request-from-the-catalog" data-post-processed="true">Opportunity for a learner to express an individual training request (from the Catalog)</h2><p class="no-margin">A learner cannot find the training actually searched for in the training catalog.</p><p class="no-margin">During Pre-Configuration of the Platform ‚öôÔ∏è, learners can be given the option of expressing their training needs by posting a request to administrators. To do so, simply check the check box <b>Activate training requests in the catalog.</b><br></p><p class="no-margin">To request registration for training not included in the Catalog, learners can then click <b>You can‚Äôt find your training</b> (outlined in red on the Training Catalog screenshot below).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241697223/fe5219c8b65882d87967bb37/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=26e71ded3fb16925dd570523be86a577e61fda91a3421905008b7b5f18907404" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241697223/fe5219c8b65882d87967bb37/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=26e71ded3fb16925dd570523be86a577e61fda91a3421905008b7b5f18907404"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A form will be opened where learners can express their training needs.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>There are 2 conventional cases:</b> </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Either the learner makes a simple request to feedback new training needs to the Platform administrators, in the hope that this request will lead to creating suitable new training or searching for existing training offered by a training organization outside the company.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Or the learner has identified existing training already offered by an external organization and completing this form means that the learner is requesting registration for this external training, the references to which can be specified in the form. This is then a <b>separate training registration request mode</b>.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Below is the <b>Training Request Form</b> to be completed by the Learner.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241697858/2a1bf1db4005eadcc237c6f9/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=659bb4e8358bef7e830d970e4da56fffe9657c19aa79ac2330ce017fdcf8339c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241697858/2a1bf1db4005eadcc237c6f9/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=659bb4e8358bef7e830d970e4da56fffe9657c19aa79ac2330ce017fdcf8339c"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br><br></p><h2 id="opportunity-to-express-training-requests-for-a-group-of-learners" data-post-processed="true">Opportunity to express training requests for a group of learners</h2><p class="no-margin">It is also possible for administrators (internal and partner), designers or group managers to express training requests, if the pre-configuration of the platform allows it, i.e. if the check box below was checked during Pre-Configuration : <b>Activate training requests on the training administration page)</b></p><p class="no-margin"><i> </i></p><p class="no-margin">Administrators (internal or partner), designers or group managers may actually notice that they don‚Äôt find suitable training to train certain learners.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Subject to the Platform‚Äôs pre-configuration, they can express their training needs <b>from the training administration page</b> by clicking ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt find your training?‚Äù outlined in red on the screen below.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698332/2324eef50fb76a3f5487bb92/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=db16173706c28a92894b52d2945bead1d9dc4309fe6d4870ba2bf18feb7fbe26" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698332/2324eef50fb76a3f5487bb92/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=db16173706c28a92894b52d2945bead1d9dc4309fe6d4870ba2bf18feb7fbe26"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A training request form then opens. It is similar to the form presented above for a request made by a learner, except that administrators (designers or group managers) must specify in the request form which users will be registered for the training if it is actually implemented.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698549/22c3bfdf8f3057cade95e26a/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=982213e23794d71191e821c171a01f9bb2c9ac60d960913864f3fab999f48b27" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698549/22c3bfdf8f3057cade95e26a/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=982213e23794d71191e821c171a01f9bb2c9ac60d960913864f3fab999f48b27"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="approval-or-refusal-of-training-requests" data-post-processed="true">Approval or Refusal of training requests</h2><p class="no-margin">Once the training request form (whether it is an individual request from a learner or a request for a group coming from an administrator, designer, or group manager) has been completed and approved by the applicant, Administrators and Group Managers will see an alert in their dropdown Management Menu, in the <b>Training Registrations</b> Section under the <b>Manage Training Requests</b> sub-section.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698802/58163b2b7a7f7d64d4173e88/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=ab8403a665b485e5a6e4499d2c18cd9f0fbf85cbef1225cffd892807996c8635" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698802/58163b2b7a7f7d64d4173e88/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=ab8403a665b485e5a6e4499d2c18cd9f0fbf85cbef1225cffd892807996c8635"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking <b>Manage training requests</b>, they can access the screen for managing training requests, where they can directly either approve or refuse the training request.</p><p class="no-margin">On this interface, they can view and search for old training requests that were previously approved or refused.</p><p class="no-margin"><br>Below is the <b>Manage training requests screen</b>, to which you will have access.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698953/4b2da494000f1f0083545d2e/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=7c4867eb18a9ef4c51a8c07baff4152f122e084024d312cfeff3d70dbc416965" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241698953/4b2da494000f1f0083545d2e/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=7c4867eb18a9ef4c51a8c07baff4152f122e084024d312cfeff3d70dbc416965"></a></div></article>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creating training paths</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/29/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Training Paths</b> &gt; <b>Create</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Only Administrators and Partner Administrators have permissions to create a new Training Path. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create a Training Path, simply enter : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Path name</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Perimeter </b>: Internal or Partner, in which case you must specify the name of the Partner Platform on which the created path will be available. Thus, unlike trainings (which can be multi-perimeter), a training path can only be associated with a single Platform. </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Once the perimeter is defined, it can no longer be changed.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231492745/0bd6967c6547234ac67fe039/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.51.52.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=9179955e80e509551fc9e2c9d32b5ed8179130d4c412e669b39c2eaff4a0d616" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231492745/0bd6967c6547234ac67fe039/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.51.52.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=9179955e80e509551fc9e2c9d32b5ed8179130d4c412e669b39c2eaff4a0d616"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Optionally, it is possible to: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Make the Path <b>sequential</b>, in which case you will have to take the training Path in the order in which the courses are displayed. </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a forum specific to the Path created, by checking the <b>Forum Category</b> box. In this case, the forum created will have the same name as the Path. </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Then click on <b>Next</b> to create it. You can then build it.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="building-a-training-path" data-post-processed="true">Building a Training Path</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231500905/26fb567ed8bbfbebd2c94c92/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+15.00.32.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=3892e9ac907dbefbd23903cb5b381b784faaab774fab023c55462e24a267ccb1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231500905/26fb567ed8bbfbebd2c94c92/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+15.00.32.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=3892e9ac907dbefbd23903cb5b381b784faaab774fab023c55462e24a267ccb1"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">On the right side of your screen you will access the list of your training paths. By clicking on ‚ûï you can add the chosen training to your course.</p><p class="no-margin">You can also add <b>Certificates,</b> by clicking on ‚ûï, in the Certificate component. It is located at the bottom of the side list on the right.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking and dragging the <b>icon in the form of 3 horizontal bars</b> in front of the training added within the course you can, drag and drop the corresponding training in order to place it on top or on bottom within your path.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231494922/3692eec460fdcc5074f01b3e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+15.13.01.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=0783438e915c3de8dceab9fab466320cb98472f3db57a76e481ad7db5d80a2f1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231494922/3692eec460fdcc5074f01b3e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+15.13.01.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=0783438e915c3de8dceab9fab466320cb98472f3db57a76e481ad7db5d80a2f1"></a></div><p class="no-margin">When you add a certificate, you must select it from the existing templates. You must therefore create it beforehand in the Certificates Section (Side Menu &gt; <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970601">Certificates</a> &gt; Create).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can choose to issue the certificate even if the training has not been successfully completed. The learner will therefore receive the certificate concerned at the end of the course even if he has not obtained the minimum score expected in the various quizzes that make up the course. All you have to do is check the corresponding box (<i>Issue a certificate even if the training has not been successfully completed</i>).</p></article>

      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu </b>&gt; <b>Training path </b>&gt; <b>View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The consultation page of the list of training paths appears : </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231483075/63dd29bdde6f3d9ff1dff4f1/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.39.54.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=ff76f9565def681806f2543705524c2aa6049dbaf58c1dde6543ad162f297ddc" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231483075/63dd29bdde6f3d9ff1dff4f1/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.39.54.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=ff76f9565def681806f2543705524c2aa6049dbaf58c1dde6543ad162f297ddc"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on the line corresponding to the path searched, you can: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Edit</b> the path ‚úèÔ∏è</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Manage</b> the path ‚öôÔ∏è, which essentially involves registering users and user groups for the training path considered. The method for registering new users or defining groups linked to a path works on the same principle as training registration.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>More options</b> (3 vertical points) : <b>duplicate</b> or <b>delete</b> the path</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Below, the <b>training path management screen:</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231472612/c2fada356488272edcd4607a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.09.20.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=03316dd842b7e09905169dc8840c688383506074addafea2d09b137195d2963f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231472612/c2fada356488272edcd4607a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.09.20.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=03316dd842b7e09905169dc8840c688383506074addafea2d09b137195d2963f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Register Users to training path</b>, the following window will appear to search for users and groups that can be registered for the Path : </p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234008201/a81b500284efea480004dbd0/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.48.51.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=886bc2f5ef8a453f5287ca649c7b6ef4c8c340f5e046f48650e83b7c27855f52" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234008201/a81b500284efea480004dbd0/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.48.51.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=886bc2f5ef8a453f5287ca649c7b6ef4c8c340f5e046f48650e83b7c27855f52"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You have to enter letters from the names of the users you are searching for to make them appear below the <b>Search</b> field. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking the ‚ûï alongside a User, you can move this User into the list of registered users (dotted rectangle on the right of the screen). Once all the Users searched for have been put inside the dotted rectangle, simply click <b>Register </b>to register all these Users for the Training Path</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231480263/daf3bdebd0a311bbe053fa40/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.19.54.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=fa4051278bd4f81b5ff3ba621e7e215773424ef8bc4608be6cc86518e4f8774d" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231480263/daf3bdebd0a311bbe053fa40/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+14.19.54.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=fa4051278bd4f81b5ff3ba621e7e215773424ef8bc4608be6cc86518e4f8774d"></a></div></article>

          <h1 class="t__h1">View E-mails sent</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/05/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>E-mails</b> &gt; <b>View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233583313/72b3133ee55d21cb28b763cf/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.09.19.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=87cd1a7a252a88e2755ac626bab7ad35d0e00f553142736c9d9f2c0348dd7a84" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233583313/72b3133ee55d21cb28b763cf/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.09.19.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=87cd1a7a252a88e2755ac626bab7ad35d0e00f553142736c9d9f2c0348dd7a84"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can access the list of all the e-mails sent to the different users of the Platform. <br><br></p><h2 id="search-and-sort-among-the-list-of-sent-emails" data-post-processed="true">Search and sort among the list of sent emails</h2><p class="no-margin">On the right side of the screen, a tool allows you to sort e-mails according to the following criteria:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Email</b>: clicking on the small arrow will display the list of different<b> Email templates</b></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233585935/10207cc5a43ebec7b5485f94/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.30.00.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f6723713b129af58c18b602e0c32dad973d8cd23d0e24b7291fdd0a426bf4aa4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233585935/10207cc5a43ebec7b5485f94/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.30.00.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f6723713b129af58c18b602e0c32dad973d8cd23d0e24b7291fdd0a426bf4aa4"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>State</b>: <b>Received</b>, <b>Failure</b> or <b>Not sent</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Sending date</b>: you can enter the <b>Period</b> (Start date and End date) during which the emails were sent</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Recipient</b>: <b>Recipient</b> of the sent emails<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="viewing-a-particular-e-mail" data-post-processed="true">Viewing a particular e-mail</h2><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>View</b> üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è next to the desired E-mail in the <b>View page</b> <b>of the list of sent e-mails</b>, you reach the<b> Detail page of the e-mail</b> containing all the elements of the e-mail and allowing a preview of the e-mail selected.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233588236/75d7d622177c23eac0177f25/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.37.29.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=cb87e47b53624e06118094c2811fe4a66506dc24473821828aea37d271e2158c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233588236/75d7d622177c23eac0177f25/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.37.29.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=cb87e47b53624e06118094c2811fe4a66506dc24473821828aea37d271e2158c"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From this page, it is possible to resend the e-mail in question by clicking on <b>Resend e-mail</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Disable the automatic sending of e-mails</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/05/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Access<b> : Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>E-mails </b>&gt; <b>Enable and disable </b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By default, all the email templates present on the Platform are <b>enabled</b>. Administrators or Partner Administrators can <b>enable or disable</b> any email template.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Each email template is presented in a section that lists the essentials, namely: the recipients, the triggers of the email and a note.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233591313/d1e1caa2cc55fa1507b1423e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.44.37.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1a821d87703fd5f44c5d56735f6dace5e3fcc5c7b556b72d4397bdf6b51ce083" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233591313/d1e1caa2cc55fa1507b1423e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+15.44.37.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1a821d87703fd5f44c5d56735f6dace5e3fcc5c7b556b72d4397bdf6b51ce083"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">From this page, it is possible for each of the email to decide to enable or disable them by checking or unchecking the corresponding checkbox.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Upstream, you must decide on the <b>Perimeter </b>you want to configure, namely whether these e-mails are sent to your internal learners or to your partner learners.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The available and configurable Perimeters are:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Default</b> : This is the default configuration applied when creating a new partner.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Internal </b>: This is the configuration applied to your users linked to the Internal perimeter and therefore not linked to a partner.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Partner X</b> : In addition, as many partners as you have created will be displayed in the drop-down list, allowing you to configure the e-mail templates partner by partner.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è <b>If you wish to activate / deactivate emails, you must apply the modifications (tick / untick the corresponding box) to the emails falling within the Internal or Partner (s) concerned.</b></p><p class="no-margin"><b>The Default scope itself is not active</b>, it only serves as a fixed template when creating a new partner scope.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Also from this page, it is possible to <b>Customize</b> an email template by clicking on Customize, you will then be redirected to the<a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970582"> Manage Email Templates screen.</a></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">View legal documents</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/06/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">

      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Only Administrators/Partner Administrators can manage legal documents.</p><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Legal documents</b> &gt;<b> View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233897436/711ed8c6f0298a320995a200/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.27.26.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=a6f070f4107a6821db5d9a685285b86d33509186e50ebe8b8235137ed1f78667" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233897436/711ed8c6f0298a320995a200/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.27.26.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=a6f070f4107a6821db5d9a685285b86d33509186e50ebe8b8235137ed1f78667"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The Legal Documents Consultation screen allows Administrators / Partner Administrators to view all Legal Documents generated for the different users (whether they are legal documents sent by email or downloaded by their recipient).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="sort-feature" data-post-processed="true">Sort feature</h2><p class="no-margin">A <b>Sort feature</b> is available on the right side of the screen with the following criteria:</p><p class="no-margin"></p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Document </b>: type of Legal Document - (see list below)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training</b> : Training concerned by legal documents</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training Path</b>: Path concerned by the legal documents sent</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Group </b>: group to which the recipients of legal documents belong</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Recipient </b>: recipient of legal documents</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Sending Date</b> : entry of a period to be taken into account</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">By clicking on the vertical arrow at the end of the line, you can download the corresponding legal document and view it.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233900102/853a866bc5a46870cda9b396/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.36.35.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d34571ac835f9c5401835f945389f6c7b5b73bc167d260becd8cdf727f5250d3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233900102/853a866bc5a46870cda9b396/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.36.35.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d34571ac835f9c5401835f945389f6c7b5b73bc167d260becd8cdf727f5250d3"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="list-of-legal-documents" data-post-processed="true">List of legal documents</h2><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Training program</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Path program</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Invitation to a classroom session</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Attendance sheet</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Certificate of attendance</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Certificate of end of training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Statement of objective</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Training contract</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Certificate of end of training path</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">For more details on creating legal documents, see the articles :  </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4033011">Generate legal documents</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970584">Modify legal documents templates</a></p></li></ul></article>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Access to detailed results from trainings</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/28/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Statistics are available in different places on the platform and mainly via:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Administrator and Creator Dashboards</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The training Management page</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The classroom sessions Management page<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="administrator-and-creators-dashboards-" data-post-processed="true">Administrator and Creators Dashboards </h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Dashboard of an Administrator</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232182944/6a7b9439fbb0d58575d76722/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-31+%C3%A0+13.54.26.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=269050711c6ff29c53f6143e85f333115a4c99f22f7db8de6aff32982b485ab6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232182944/6a7b9439fbb0d58575d76722/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-31+%C3%A0+13.54.26.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=269050711c6ff29c53f6143e85f333115a4c99f22f7db8de6aff32982b485ab6"></a></div><p class="no-margin">An administrator will see on his Dashboard :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">A general view with global statistics such as the percentage of registered learners present to their classroom sessions</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A graph showing training registrations follow-up by state</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The number of registrations per day (average, minimum, maximum)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The ongoing activity showing the current and future trainings, the instructor and the location</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The top 5 most successful trainings</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Pending actions (pending user, pending training registrations and pending corrections)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Community activity</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"><b>Dashboard of a Creator</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232205823/154324631632e22e91e64c9d/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=ea69310e83dd48035efb81c26387eb5599b7195fab5eb1f6ad44cab41db4dc15" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232205823/154324631632e22e91e64c9d/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=ea69310e83dd48035efb81c26387eb5599b7195fab5eb1f6ad44cab41db4dc15"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A creator will visualize 3 elements on his Dashboard:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The total time spent (in hours) on trainings for which he is the creator</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The number of registrations on trainings for which he is the creator</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The average progression of learners on trainings for which he is a creator and for which there have been registrations</p></li></ul><h2 id="the-training-management-page" data-post-processed="true">The training management page</h2><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Training &gt; View</b>, then select the desired training and click on <b>Manage</b> ‚öôÔ∏è to display the<b> Management Page of the selected Training.</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231039959/7795cf74fa651a9098e7c6c1/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.25.59.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=7521c30bee4c3062c562eddb20b83c6dbd0808fce5187f36ee9b6255c9baf752" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231039959/7795cf74fa651a9098e7c6c1/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.25.59.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=7521c30bee4c3062c562eddb20b83c6dbd0808fce5187f36ee9b6255c9baf752"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">On this page that you can consult:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Global Statistics on a Training</b> (by clicking on <b>See all statistics</b>, at the top right of the page)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231040419/74e6187669dadaff5511190b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.28.27.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=35585bf7762c57286f9a26428fa897ee32fe2127cecfc3db0d4c01bf2be71cdd" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231040419/74e6187669dadaff5511190b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.28.27.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=35585bf7762c57286f9a26428fa897ee32fe2127cecfc3db0d4c01bf2be71cdd"></a></div><p class="no-margin">These are "Average" type statistics taking into account the results of all users who have taken the training. You can click on the different tabs (circled in red) : General /  Quiz Statistics / Survey, in order to view the Statistics corresponding.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231041082/1cb70989c6a98b1a88204b29/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.30.51.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1d58d7667a1aa169096546ceae518c03386e817852c196a5cd0d17b0100c48c0" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231041082/1cb70989c6a98b1a88204b29/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.30.51.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1d58d7667a1aa169096546ceae518c03386e817852c196a5cd0d17b0100c48c0"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The <b>detailed results of a Training for a given User</b> (by identifying the desired user and clicking on<b> View </b>üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231049725/e09e4adc409c69027ffb1a80/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.00.37.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=6a4a6bb19eae5cbe5534fc6d034e07b1067d32075299a39cbd6aced12ac0661b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231049725/e09e4adc409c69027ffb1a80/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.00.37.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=6a4a6bb19eae5cbe5534fc6d034e07b1067d32075299a39cbd6aced12ac0661b"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The user's results sheet makes it possible in particular to distinguish the results by registration. In fact, it is possible to unsubscribe and re-register the employee so that they can redo the training as a whole. In this case, the results of his various registrations will be accessible. It is also possible to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3991120">Archive the registration </a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3992725">Export the results in Excel format</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3992721">Reset the progress</a></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231042624/b9012f973449da74175a3ea8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.36.20.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=3c73ef41b51eb6f9166bec93b0496da218fd417222a22449c923ccdf60028a55" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231042624/b9012f973449da74175a3ea8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.36.20.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=3c73ef41b51eb6f9166bec93b0496da218fd417222a22449c923ccdf60028a55"></a></div><p class="no-margin">On this "<b>User details</b>" page, all the detailed results of the training follow-up are also visible.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231044159/229d116e8de4fc8ee16002a3/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.43.55.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=39164f29337818205a60a4b6c79576cdc11d8f834b41ffb86592c518b4cdd643" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231044159/229d116e8de4fc8ee16002a3/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+10.43.55.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=39164f29337818205a60a4b6c79576cdc11d8f834b41ffb86592c518b4cdd643"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For each module, you can see:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The time spent</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Whether the module has been passed or failed</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">For classroom sessions, you can visualize whether the learner was present or not.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">You can unfold the modules using the small arrows on the right of the screen to view all the steps of a module.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on<b> View</b> üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è, you can open the activity log, which gives details of the dates and durations of the user's connection and the means used to connect (computer, tablet, mobile, etc.) as shown in the example below. In this example, we see that the user has made 2 attempts on the final quiz, that the first attempt was unsuccessful and that he passed the quiz on the second attempt.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231412952/7b547c7ba27a61d9f9d127cc/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+10.39.28.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=297513e7bdd14d3a406ed143f2f8dcda639bd76a1ac4356fd22ee379002d49c8" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231412952/7b547c7ba27a61d9f9d127cc/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+10.39.28.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=297513e7bdd14d3a406ed143f2f8dcda639bd76a1ac4356fd22ee379002d49c8"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on View answers, you can access the details of the questions and answers for the quizzes or exams taken by the user.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="the-classroom-sessions-management-page" data-post-processed="true">The Classroom Sessions Management page</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231050183/5c9b2466c400494f281d80ce/image.jpeg?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4de0b35fa2888354a2a4d326e9698dc7a2854e54ec2f031b5381606ed7ce6e52" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231050183/5c9b2466c400494f281d80ce/image.jpeg?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4de0b35fa2888354a2a4d326e9698dc7a2854e54ec2f031b5381606ed7ce6e52"></a></div><p class="no-margin">On the classroom sessions management screen, based on the sorting method used (filter feature on the right side of the screen), you can view: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Number of classroom sessions</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Number of users without classroom sessions</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Percentage of occupancy of classroom sessions</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Average attendance rate of classroom sessions</p></li></ul><h2 id="access-to-results-from-training-and-training-paths-" data-post-processed="true">Access to results from training and training paths </h2><p class="no-margin">Administrators, partner administrators, creators and managers have access to the following statistics, each within their scope *.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">(A) Overall statistics of a specific training, all users combined</p><p class="no-margin">(B) Detailed results of a specific training for a given user</p><p class="no-margin">(C) Statistics for a list of training paths</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">(*) the scope is as follows:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Internal administrators : access to all results and statistics both from the internal platform and partner platforms.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Partner administrators : access to results and statistics from the only partner platform they administer.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Creators : access to results and statistics related only to training paths they designed.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Group managers: access to results and statistics of all the members of the group(s) they manage.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <title>Archiving your learner's registration | Rise Up Help Center</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Last updated on 07/27/2020">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

      <link rel="alternate" href="http://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/3991120-archiving-your-learner-s-registration" hreflang="en">

  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Archiving your learner's registration</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/27/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><h3 id="you-can-archive-your-learners-registration-to-a-training" data-post-processed="true">You can archive your learner's registration to a training.</h3><p class="no-margin">The objective is to allow the learner to completely restart his training, while allowing you to keep the statistics (results and other follow-up data) linked to his previous registration.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu </b>&gt; <b>Trainings </b>&gt; <b>View</b>, then select the desired training and click on <b>Manage </b>‚öôÔ∏è to display the Management Page of the selected Training. Finally, click on <b>View </b>üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è of the line corresponding to the affected learner. You will then be taken to the User Details Page, from which you can click on <b>Archive Registration</b>.<br></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230732018/3eb66a62c4c25f19dd53a60f/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=e4d440d34d4fd638d254b737710a72ea64d0b1c2d8758e8cd8146c09cb065b16" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230732018/3eb66a62c4c25f19dd53a60f/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=e4d440d34d4fd638d254b737710a72ea64d0b1c2d8758e8cd8146c09cb065b16"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Check in the pop-up that appears (see below) ‚ÄúGenerate new registration for concerned users‚Äù.</p><p class="no-margin">In this way, you will have archived all results from the first registration before resetting the entire training registration.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230727997/dac12ecf4b612b5a5f0221ec/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b6a6a64e743288feafc5d6b8abca487699d0fefd9b6afe971db56738b7cbedae" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230727997/dac12ecf4b612b5a5f0221ec/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b6a6a64e743288feafc5d6b8abca487699d0fefd9b6afe971db56738b7cbedae"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Thereby, there will have been 2 registrations for the same training for the same user and it will be possible at a later date (when the user has again completed his training) to access details of the results for each of the 2 registrations, by selecting the correct registration from the dropdown menu on the button at the top of the ‚ÄúUser details‚Äù page).</p><p class="no-margin">In the example below, there were 2 registrations to the same training for the user involved.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230735215/0396048c591c9a65a8cac539/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=898977fcf5e827486440116bae3ded421aac85e4e0aee8bb8c6f319dac8e7d23" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/230735215/0396048c591c9a65a8cac539/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=898977fcf5e827486440116bae3ded421aac85e4e0aee8bb8c6f319dac8e7d23"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You also have the option of archiving multiple registrations at the same time. To do so, all you have to do is select several learners in the <b>Training Management Page </b>view and click on <b>Archive</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232206660/9eeb94657a02fee7e8539c3a/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b90d6d05ba6501eb93174b37d84ed15c37afed62358939e96909560b528cc02e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/232206660/9eeb94657a02fee7e8539c3a/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b90d6d05ba6501eb93174b37d84ed15c37afed62358939e96909560b528cc02e"></a></div></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">Reset the progress of a learner</div>
</div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Reset the progress of a learner</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/27/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">In the registration settings of a learner for a training, it is possible to reset all or part of their progress. <br></p><p class="no-margin">The aim is to give the learner a second chance. <br> </p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu </b>&gt; <b>Trainings </b>&gt; <b>View</b>, then select the desired training and click on <b>Manage </b>‚öôÔ∏è to display the Management Page of the selected Training. Finally, click on <b>View </b>üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è of the line corresponding to the concerned learner.<br> </p><p class="no-margin">Once on the<b> User's details</b> page you can :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Reset the progress of the user and the <b>entire training</b> : you have to click on <b>Reset progress</b> on the left side of the page. The learner will restart his training from the beginning. </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231413476/2516389c50419c415b594581/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+10.41.30.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=543407d03439aa838ab93668beb6577ddf5d23aaaa16733d297d974b74e77cdb" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231413476/2516389c50419c415b594581/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+10.41.30.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=543407d03439aa838ab93668beb6577ddf5d23aaaa16733d297d974b74e77cdb"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Reset user progress on <b>one or more modules only</b>. This gives the user the opportunity to redo the module that he missed.</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231413718/433b4d6f53c1864039f7b753/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+10.43.06.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ea5eebc26cc3cfb72b52de9565f8e4d0a154d5cb8bce9d02fa81d15626742174" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231413718/433b4d6f53c1864039f7b753/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+10.43.06.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ea5eebc26cc3cfb72b52de9565f8e4d0a154d5cb8bce9d02fa81d15626742174"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è By resetting the progress, you <b>lose the history </b>of the results already obtained by the user on the particular module/ training.</p><p class="no-margin"><br>However, there are two solutions to overcome this disadvantage (of course, you can combine them): </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Solution 1: <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3991120-archiver">archive the training registration</a> before resetting. He will then start the training again, from scratch. You will therefore always have available the results and other statistics related to his previous registration.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Solution 2: <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3992725">export the results to Excel</a> before resetting. You will therefore be able to keep his results outside the platform.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
