    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Export results of learners in Excel format</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/28/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">It is possible to obtain statistics as Excel exports for:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">One or more users</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A training path</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è When you perform an Excel export, the document is not directly downloadable, but is sent to you by e-mail. The file is generated via a waiting line system and therefore there may be a delay of +/- 5 minutes to receive your excel by email.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="export-of-data-linked-to-one-or-more-users" data-post-processed="true">Export of data linked to one or more users</h2><p class="no-margin">To export data related to a user, you must access his detailed page related to the training concerned.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Training &gt; View</b>, then select the desired training and click on <b>Manage</b> ‚öôÔ∏è to display the<b> Management Page</b> of the selected Training. Finally, click on<b> View</b> üëÅÔ∏è&zwj;üó®Ô∏è of the line corresponding to the desired learner. </p><p class="no-margin">Then from the <b>User Details Page</b>, click <b>Excel Export</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231054714/4c5e9c8c7a4d2a3d1b977962/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.15.12.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=026aaf82957b7caa6d26400955717b0596a28908cf4fc3fb50ca224f42625f61" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231054714/4c5e9c8c7a4d2a3d1b977962/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.15.12.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=026aaf82957b7caa6d26400955717b0596a28908cf4fc3fb50ca224f42625f61"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin">To export the data of several users, all you have to do is select several users from the <b>Manage training page</b>, and click on the <b>Excel Export </b>button.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231057168/4d1dddbc8f911472c415149e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.19.54.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b230e965f05cbbdde03c64b8bf08ac5bd5456aab7c022d276b79df03b97f5619" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231057168/4d1dddbc8f911472c415149e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.19.54.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b230e965f05cbbdde03c64b8bf08ac5bd5456aab7c022d276b79df03b97f5619"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="export-of-data-linked-to-one-or-more-training-paths" data-post-processed="true">Export of data linked to one or more training paths</h2><p class="no-margin">To export data related to a training, all you have to do is export the data of all learners registered for that training. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Training &gt; View</b>, then select the desired training and click on Manage ‚öôÔ∏è to display the <b>Management Page</b> of the selected Training. </p><p class="no-margin">Then select all the learners registered for the training and click on <b>Excel Export.</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231057600/baac625a7c1af65b26885ee6/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.19.54.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=2eb3a29aaee7501d301664cc2a224971a0ff415cf0008a461d5ecd610f234eef" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231057600/baac625a7c1af65b26885ee6/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.19.54.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=2eb3a29aaee7501d301664cc2a224971a0ff415cf0008a461d5ecd610f234eef"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will then download all the data related to the training concerned.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To export data related to several training courses, you need to access the list of your training courses, by following: <b>Side menu &gt; Training courses &gt; View.</b> </p><p class="no-margin">On the training page you can then select the training courses based on the filters available on the right of the screen. You can thus filter the trainings by creator, state, type, category, etc. Once your<b> Filter</b> has been selected, click on <b>Excel Export</b>. You can then download all the data related to the training paths that meet this filter.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231059452/7cad42941373aec2621bdae0/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.30.47.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=973c85d3fde768e3079c89678a7a0f6a619648e5cb4a6a43d40de8c46de88b63" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231059452/7cad42941373aec2621bdae0/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.30.47.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=973c85d3fde768e3079c89678a7a0f6a619648e5cb4a6a43d40de8c46de88b63"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br><br></p><h2 id="export-of-data-linked-to-a-training-path" data-post-processed="true">Export of data linked to a training path</h2><p class="no-margin">The procedure is identical than the one used to download data from a training but this time for a learning path. </p><p class="no-margin">To export the data linked to a path, all you have to do is export the data of<b> all the learners registered for this path. </b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Training &gt; View</b>, then select the desired path and click on Manage ‚öôÔ∏è to display the <b>Manage Selected Path Page</b>. </p><p class="no-margin">Then select all the learners registered for the course and click on <b>Excel Export</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231059687/21770471e7c17fc42b5fc4c2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.19.54.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=57551f786e9c7ec932fa2790d69d4ba2dc69699212b59a16f660a127ebcac443" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231059687/21770471e7c17fc42b5fc4c2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+11.19.54.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=57551f786e9c7ec932fa2790d69d4ba2dc69699212b59a16f660a127ebcac443"></a></div><p class="no-margin">It is also possible to carry out the same exports of data related to <b>Training registrations</b>, by reproducing the same process via the <b>Training registration Management page</b>.</p><p class="no-margin">This page is accessible via the <b>Side menu &gt; Training registrations &gt; View.</b></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Introduction to the Datalab</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/28/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">A special section is dedicated to Reports and Statistics.</p><p class="no-margin">Access :<b> Side Menu  &gt; Datalab</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container intercom-align-center"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241307062/0fffb1b1204eec669f2df4c0/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=52225c00686a3878939ffff239e0ada10c4ca2825be337f6cf8e0b3b6823ae79" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/241307062/0fffb1b1204eec669f2df4c0/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=52225c00686a3878939ffff239e0ada10c4ca2825be337f6cf8e0b3b6823ae79"></a></div><p class="no-margin">There are 2 sub-sections: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Online follow-up</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Data export<br></p></li></ul><h2 id="online-follow-up" data-post-processed="true">Online follow-up</h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Online follow-up </b>gives access to reports presented visually with different types of graphs.</p><p class="no-margin">In this section you can find :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">‚Äú<b><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993071">General Report</a></b>‚Äù, available to Administrators, Partner Administrators, Creators and Group Managers, based on their respective scope.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">‚Äú<b><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993072">Dashboards by topic</a></b>‚Äù, currently only available to Internal Administrators.</p></li></ul><h2 id="data-export" data-post-processed="true">Data Export</h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Data export</b> gives you access to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993075">Excel exports by theme</a>, to be chosen from a list, with a sorting / filtering function allowing the Excel Export to be limited to the scope chosen by the administrator. ‚ÑπÔ∏è This section is not available to partner Administrators.</p></li></ul><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993076">Personalized exports</a>, which you can configure according to your needs and automatically receive by email on a weekly or monthly basis.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Access to these exports is open to Administrators, Partner Administrators, Creators and Group Managers, according to their respective scope.</p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; General Report</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/28/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The <b>Datalab</b> consists of the following features :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993076">Datalab - Customized exports</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993075-datalab">Datalab - Data export</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993072">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; Platform activity</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993071">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; General report</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This article focuses on the "<b>General report - Online follow-up &gt; General Report</b>" feature.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Datalab &gt; Online follow-up &gt; General Report. </b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231193132/877775b660d3ab84daa64f9f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+16.30.28.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=3bc744fc766420017e53005ca1948fe0728dc47fc7ef096503065aca3f569580" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231193132/877775b660d3ab84daa64f9f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+16.30.28.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=3bc744fc766420017e53005ca1948fe0728dc47fc7ef096503065aca3f569580"></a></div><p class="no-margin">First of all, you will find<b> Sort</b> and <b>Filter</b> features on the top-right side of the screen to help you define the selected perimeter (group) as well as the period (by default, last week is displayed for all groups).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will find the following sections:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Usage statistics</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Duration statistics</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Progress statistics</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Social statistics</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">General statistics</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Statistics related to classroom sessions</p></li></ul><h2 id="usage-statistics-" data-post-processed="true">Usage statistics </h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231178356/83422b07e4f4c4c3f6abdeb4/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.07.08.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=13e54aea8292a5d51e5eb237e56078f07d55c1cad2e766742ea61f7e4ff460ab" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231178356/83422b07e4f4c4c3f6abdeb4/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.07.08.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=13e54aea8292a5d51e5eb237e56078f07d55c1cad2e766742ea61f7e4ff460ab"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will find there:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Number of active users during the selected period</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Number of concerned groups of these users</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Number of trainings followed by these users during the selected period</p></li></ul><h2 id="duration-statistics" data-post-processed="true">Duration statistics</h2><p class="no-margin">You will find the training courses that have been followed, and for each of them the real time spent by the learners during the selected period.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231179325/cc608f8271e03d0a965ba2f6/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.11.07.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=954507500f8bfa0057c7c17bf56d4f405c618564762cdc00bac553813259f068" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231179325/cc608f8271e03d0a965ba2f6/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.11.07.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=954507500f8bfa0057c7c17bf56d4f405c618564762cdc00bac553813259f068"></a></div><h2 id="statistics-of-registration-progress-" data-post-processed="true">Statistics of Registration progress </h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231430132/93a1e9cf2ccb52f0f8e04cfa/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+11.40.00.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=0cd113bda354dd864a6ab20abc10caace0c471a3087d33fb8745300a33b76862" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231430132/93a1e9cf2ccb52f0f8e04cfa/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+11.40.00.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=0cd113bda354dd864a6ab20abc10caace0c471a3087d33fb8745300a33b76862"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For each of the training paths taken during the period, you will find here the average percentage of progress of the training. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="social-statistics" data-post-processed="true">Social statistics</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231181289/99c6eb05e3cdd2efa8e3f94f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.15.19.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=be2ae188740a4ab68c5ab3722455b2c2fd663750bae455f460ba5729df74195d" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231181289/99c6eb05e3cdd2efa8e3f94f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.15.19.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=be2ae188740a4ab68c5ab3722455b2c2fd663750bae455f460ba5729df74195d"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will find here the number of discussions on the forum and the number of comments on training paths during the selected period </p><h2 id="h_ff0259cc51" data-post-processed="true"></h2><h2 id="general-statistics" data-post-processed="true">General Statistics</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231182530/a5c485eb3be834615711bffc/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.19.37.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=baf43078c2107161b164b2b0aa435162d56a4a561fcff52bd7bc9fa443bd9d7a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231182530/a5c485eb3be834615711bffc/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.19.37.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=baf43078c2107161b164b2b0aa435162d56a4a561fcff52bd7bc9fa443bd9d7a"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will find here general statistics since the platform was activated (the selected period is not applied to these fields).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="statistics-related-to-classroom-sessions" data-post-processed="true">Statistics related to classroom sessions</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231189584/a4fe1d8bead204a524bb26a8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.35.37.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=08fc4991203102509889ef7842e5c8820a7b1cf908a2754e8882acacc5e82b61" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231189584/a4fe1d8bead204a524bb26a8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+17.35.37.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=08fc4991203102509889ef7842e5c8820a7b1cf908a2754e8882acacc5e82b61"></a></div><p class="no-margin">If applicable, you will find displayed here users who followed classroom sessions during the selected period.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p></article>
    </div>

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Datalab - Data export</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 07/28/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The <b>Datalab</b> consists of the following features :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993076">Datalab - Customized exports</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993075-datalab">Datalab - Data export</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993072">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; Dashboards by theme</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993071">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; General report</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This article focuses on the "<b>Data export</b>" feature.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side Menu &gt; Datalab &gt; Data export </b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will have access to : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">exports already configured and targeting specific themes (developed in this article).</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993076">personalized exports</a>, which you can generate according to your needs.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">On some common themes, you will have screens allowing you to define sorting criteria quickly to select the scope to be included in your Excel export. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The <b>Sort</b> feature, to determine the perimeter, is always on the right side of your screen. Sort criteria differ depending on the theme. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The following themes are available for your Excel exports: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Training registrations</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Classroom session registrations</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Upcoming user's classrooms</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Customized exports</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">We will take the example of <b>Training registrations </b>below.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231118589/592dabe06191e4532d4bcb80/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+14.45.01.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4e40b6dd5a7b4128c0ec471bef92dcf2128c30dfcf034317044c77b1a0003b58" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231118589/592dabe06191e4532d4bcb80/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+14.45.01.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4e40b6dd5a7b4128c0ec471bef92dcf2128c30dfcf034317044c77b1a0003b58"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The following items are available to add (sorting possible on each column) : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The name of the training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The registered user‚Äôs name</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registration date</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registration state : approved, pending (if registration has not yet been approved), archived</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The user‚Äôs progress </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Average score</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Time passed</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">End date</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">On the right side, it is possible to search for the name of a training or a user. It is also possible to perform a sorting to select certain registrations for training courses, on the basis of the following sorting criteria : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Training Path</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Category</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Group</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Type (internal, partner)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registration state : approved, pending, archived</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">User state : active, inactive, suspended</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Progress: In this way, you can reduce the search to trainings for which, for example, progress has reached more than 50% or select only trainings completed, where progress has reached 100%.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Registration date : selection of a period</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">End date : selection of a period</p></li></ul></article>
    </div>

      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The <b>Datalab</b> consists of the following features :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993076">Datalab - Customized exports</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993075-datalab">Datalab - Data export</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993072">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; Dashboards by theme</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3993071">Datalab - Online follow-up &gt; General report</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This article focuses on the "<b>Customized exports</b>" feature.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Datalab &gt; Data export &gt; Customized exports</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In this section, you can define your own Customized Exports, build them easily, eventually modify them, and subscribe to receive them by e-mail, at your chosen frequency (monthly, weekly). </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">When you access the ‚ÄúCustomized Exports‚Äù section, you will see: </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">The list of all your <b>Customized Reports (outlined in green below)</b>, whether they are the predefined Standard Reports uploaded by Rise Up (in blue, on top of the list) or Customized Reports you have created yourself.</p></li></ul><ul><li><p class="no-margin">A <b>SORT</b> feature <b>(outlined in red below)</b>, letting you search quickly for the Report(s) you need.  </p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231095430/0a2ff29b94b39f85a38b8667/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.34.33.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=a601ce3e3be48fcdcd5366dbb8bfc5700836d2501e9f3899f6cc4a6dbefcada6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231095430/0a2ff29b94b39f85a38b8667/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.34.33.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=a601ce3e3be48fcdcd5366dbb8bfc5700836d2501e9f3899f6cc4a6dbefcada6"></a></div><h2 id="predefined-standard-reports" data-post-processed="true">Predefined Standard Reports</h2><p class="no-margin">When you access this section, you see the already existing Standard Reports.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231096131/4817bf236d8d9db94892f376/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.40.15.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=8b1fe3eef85120a32aa9dbce53df56856f95dca88efc9ad201a9dfae8dd83c46" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231096131/4817bf236d8d9db94892f376/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.40.15.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=8b1fe3eef85120a32aa9dbce53df56856f95dca88efc9ad201a9dfae8dd83c46"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Rise Up has already provided 3 Reports that meet the needs of most people : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">A Report on <b>Registrations for Physical Sessions</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A Report on <b>Validated Training Registrations</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">A Report on <b>Registered Learners</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">For each of these reports, you can perform different actions appearing on the right side of each report.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231420759/165ef4de8c6583208e2e3566/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+11.06.10.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=6be1483665c2eb11d3e1ccdd801e930e0da7eedcbf19847c52260865f1036efd" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231420759/165ef4de8c6583208e2e3566/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-29+%C3%A0+11.06.10.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=6be1483665c2eb11d3e1ccdd801e930e0da7eedcbf19847c52260865f1036efd"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">E<b>xport</b> the desired report</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">D<b>uplicate</b> a report. It makes it easier to create a new report starting from an already existing report.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Subscribe </b>to a report to receive it regularly by email, monthly or weekly.</p></li></ul><h2 id="create-a-customized-report" data-post-processed="true">Create a customized report</h2><p class="no-margin">To create a new customized Report, click on <b>Create export </b>appearing at the top right of your screen.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231100554/81f0965302c4d720d19b658a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.52.53.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=2ed932b7fe29db45ce92deb0d6dd40e2dae6d72c7dfffc9cdcfbccd46e549a05" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231100554/81f0965302c4d720d19b658a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.52.53.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=2ed932b7fe29db45ce92deb0d6dd40e2dae6d72c7dfffc9cdcfbccd46e549a05"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will go through the following different steps to define your new report (these steps are recalled on the left of your screen to allow you to view your progress in building your Report).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><b>1st Step: Theme -&gt; Choose the theme for your Report</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231101969/fcaf277ef77d8a8720eaa56b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.59.02.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4a68ddd25a6df68085ce5990bb6d833a163424b3cd6c934aff558347c113b660" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231101969/fcaf277ef77d8a8720eaa56b/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+13.59.02.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=4a68ddd25a6df68085ce5990bb6d833a163424b3cd6c934aff558347c113b660"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>2nd Step: Scope -&gt; Define the filters applied to the Report</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231103046/041d8a229630695d030da891/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+14.01.58.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=2396389e10fedb9eb870be26fdfb3cd450087594f7dff3d6a4be5b1546c83a73" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231103046/041d8a229630695d030da891/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+14.01.58.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=2396389e10fedb9eb870be26fdfb3cd450087594f7dff3d6a4be5b1546c83a73"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>3rd Step: Content -&gt; Define the data that will be included in your Report</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231103546/a49352323f64bc8147d150a2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+14.03.43.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=7f05206478e48dee0c5982fb486cfaddfb1294d8ca1ba0ff56764e2c86aeaa1b" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/231103546/a49352323f64bc8147d150a2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-07-28+%C3%A0+14.03.43.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=7f05206478e48dee0c5982fb486cfaddfb1294d8ca1ba0ff56764e2c86aeaa1b"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><b>4th Step: Preview -&gt; Preview the data that will be included in your Report in graph format</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">At the bottom of your screen, on the left, you can trigger the export by clicking on the <b>Export</b> button or directly subscribe to the Report you have just created by clicking on the <b>Subscribe to the export </b>envelope ‚úâÔ∏è.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The screens may vary depending on the customization choices made during the construction of your Customized Export. Above, we have taken the example of an Export created on the "<b>Users</b>" Theme. For Customized Reports that you have created yourself, in addition to the 3 actions available for pre-defined reports (Export, Duplicate, Subscribe), you can also :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Edit</b> the report</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Delete</b> the report</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Access a Report <b>Preview</b></p></li></ul></article>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Generate legal documents</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to generate my legal documents: attendance sheet, training agreement, etc. ? Which documents are generated automatically?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Some documents are generated automatically and others must be generated manually.</p><p class="no-margin">It is possible to <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970584">modify and personalize all of these documents</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="documents-generated-automatically" data-post-processed="true">Documents generated automatically</h2><p class="no-margin">The documents generated automatically are as follows:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Invitation to a classroom session</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Attendance certificate</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Certificate of end of training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Statement of objective</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Certificate of end of training path</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">These documents are all generated automatically without any action on your part.</p><p class="no-margin">You will find the history of the documents generated via <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Legal</b> <b>Documents</b> &gt; <b>View</b>.</p><p class="no-margin">From this page, you will be able to download them by clicking on the arrow üì• corresponding to the desired document.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233950531/3301e74af8bc9d714390f2f8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+14.26.44.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2f4316701219b29c3240d553cbbf9a91543a5f6c2cf3ca06a2f61ccf68a5b181" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233950531/3301e74af8bc9d714390f2f8/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+14.26.44.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2f4316701219b29c3240d553cbbf9a91543a5f6c2cf3ca06a2f61ccf68a5b181"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br><br></p><h2 id="generate-a-training-contract" data-post-processed="true">Generate a training contract</h2><p class="no-margin">The training contracts for classroom sessions must be generated manually.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu</b> &gt; <b>Trainings</b> &gt; <b>View</b> &gt; <b>Manage</b> <b>‚öôÔ∏è</b> &gt; <b>Manage Classroom sessions</b> &gt; <b>Generate training contract</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233970308/b645305831c547f266483ecd/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+15.20.05.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=20d1aef5d01cb1ed4a49aa7ffabefbda10d3a6f53a5506e1cd3bb8a356f076ee" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233970308/b645305831c547f266483ecd/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+15.20.05.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=20d1aef5d01cb1ed4a49aa7ffabefbda10d3a6f53a5506e1cd3bb8a356f076ee"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A modal to generate a training agreement allows you to select the classroom session for which you want the contract to be generated.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233985870/c9583f2beab319eaf6446d8c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+15.58.16.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=3abc3df2463b2799b809b24daab19709179493b13c4f8536c1293642fa951b50" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233985870/c9583f2beab319eaf6446d8c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+15.58.16.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=3abc3df2463b2799b809b24daab19709179493b13c4f8536c1293642fa951b50"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You'll need to :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">select the session(s) concerned</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">choose the learners concerned</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">then complete all the required fields.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>Submit</b>, the contract will be generated and its download will start immediately.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="generate-an-attendance-sheet" data-post-processed="true">Generate an attendance sheet</h2><p class="no-margin">You'll have to go to the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975362">Management of classroom sessions</a> page.</p><p class="no-margin">Access : <b>Side menu</b> &gt; <b>Training</b> &gt; <b>Manage classroom sessions</b> </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on <b>More options</b> (three vertical dots) for the desired session, you can then click on <b>Attendance sheet</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233991422/672d1e5e16e6143638448376/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.10.03.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f2e3ef54acf51706a70821d0cd84f81570319552294efdb169cfa85634844413" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233991422/672d1e5e16e6143638448376/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.10.03.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=f2e3ef54acf51706a70821d0cd84f81570319552294efdb169cfa85634844413"></a></div><p class="no-margin">From this page, you can : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Sign </b>the attendance sheet</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Download </b>the attendance sheet in <b>PDF</b></p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233992295/05ee7a70923e9a7b6062341e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.12.36.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=4c30daf54a7cd7406f36a6435314cfe17676ea1f84f5c4747dd004a316da2fec" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233992295/05ee7a70923e9a7b6062341e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.12.36.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=4c30daf54a7cd7406f36a6435314cfe17676ea1f84f5c4747dd004a316da2fec"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br>For more details, see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4635924">Manage the attendance sheet</a>.<br><br></p><h2 id="generate-a-training-program" data-post-processed="true">Generate a training program</h2><p class="no-margin">From the Catalog, by accessing a training you can <b>Download the training program in PDF</b> format by clicking on the dedicated button on the right side of the training page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233994978/84a13d58241b9004818b2f85/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.18.27.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=035dba6c9e76d57f152943e27820ef61462ae66d6b90fd651120b556584a8b7f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233994978/84a13d58241b9004818b2f85/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+16.18.27.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=035dba6c9e76d57f152943e27820ef61462ae66d6b90fd651120b556584a8b7f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">This program includes all the information related to the training (if these have been completed): description, duration, objectives, etc.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="generate-a-program-for-a-training-path" data-post-processed="true">Generate a program for a training path</h2><p class="no-margin">Access:<b> Side menu</b> &gt; <b>Training path</b> &gt; <b>View</b> &gt; <b>Manage</b> ‚öôÔ∏è . </p><p class="no-margin">You can then click on <b>Download path program</b> to download in PDF.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234246818/62164be4bdd0d1718a47ae7f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+10.29.50.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d1e66515d3fac2883405856e9baba64dde0d5bcce77340c1679a97616b1d8ab4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234246818/62164be4bdd0d1718a47ae7f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-07+%C3%A0+10.29.50.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=d1e66515d3fac2883405856e9baba64dde0d5bcce77340c1679a97616b1d8ab4"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/20/2020</i></p></article>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Introduction to the Community page</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How do I use the Community ? What is the objective of the Community ?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The Community page can be accessed by clicking on <b>Community</b> on the horizontal bar on top of the screen.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233101377/dbf26acaf6958f2bf7c32cb5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+09.14.24.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=d420ca5cc0eceb723c9a337993d118cc53dfe9e13716bb7f5452a6674d149639" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233101377/dbf26acaf6958f2bf7c32cb5/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+09.14.24.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=d420ca5cc0eceb723c9a337993d118cc53dfe9e13716bb7f5452a6674d149639"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The Community page contains boards allowing people linked to those spaces to interact.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The community page includes the following elements : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>The Main board</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Group boards</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training boards </b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Training path boards</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="the-main-board-" data-post-processed="true">The Main board </h2><p class="no-margin">It is made of different boards : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>General : </b>Accessible to all, it enables communication with all users, for example on new products, latest developments, the company's training policy etc.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Internal : </b>Accessible to internal users, they are the only ones that can write on it.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Partner(s) : </b>For each partner platform created, it is possible to configure a dedicated board bearing the name of this partner. It allows you to write to the users of the only partner concerned. To create a board associated with a partner, you must check the box "<b>Create a board on the Community page</b>" when creating your Partner.<br><br></p></li></ul><h2 id="group-training-and-training-paths-boards-" data-post-processed="true">Group, Training and Training paths boards </h2><p class="no-margin">Administrators as well as Community Managers have access to all Boards on the Community page. Other users (learners, group managers, creators/designers, animators) have access only to the boards that concern them.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create Group, Training and Path Boards, you must access the Group, Training or Training Path creation page concerned. When creating each of these elements, you can check "Create a board on the Community page ", and thus create a dedicated board.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">For more details please see "<a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4111263">how to create a board and a discussion in the community page</a>".</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="discussions-within-the-community-page" data-post-processed="true">Discussions within the Community page</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234015835/5abc45cd8ab930b141d70ba2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+17.08.59.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=702c6534021c967103e818e5da16bd436247bebbdca81bca0332c2257eceab55" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/234015835/5abc45cd8ab930b141d70ba2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+17.08.59.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=702c6534021c967103e818e5da16bd436247bebbdca81bca0332c2257eceab55"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Within each Board, it is possible to initiate discussions by creating specific spaces. Only administrators and Community Managers can create a new discussion inside a Board. All users concerned by the board can participate in the Discussion created.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="user-notification" data-post-processed="true">User notification</h2><p class="no-margin">When new messages are posted on the community, learners are notified by an icon indicating the number of unread available messages in their interface.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="notification-on-the-vertical-banner" data-post-processed="true">Notification on the vertical banner</h3><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269704067/c4fab0f3c1515ddaf0516d18/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=8f3529f51e946432cb97ed19f3cc36225b272f025f483461256b0140a77a3700" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/269704067/c4fab0f3c1515ddaf0516d18/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=8f3529f51e946432cb97ed19f3cc36225b272f025f483461256b0140a77a3700"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><h3 id="notification-in-community-dashboards" data-post-processed="true">Notification in Community dashboards</h3><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263233285/e053fcfd998bfc9194573c42/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=f061e3cc86c180c5d89b64e61f1f65708bda2cf3975fcb497e97338e556750c5" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/263233285/e053fcfd998bfc9194573c42/image.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=f061e3cc86c180c5d89b64e61f1f65708bda2cf3975fcb497e97338e556750c5"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In addition, by default, if new messages are pending reading for the user, a daily email summarizing all the unread messages is sent.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/24/2020</i></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Accessing the Rise Up Mobile app</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How do I download the Rise Up Mobile app to access my trainings on mobile?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Your Rise Up platform becomes easier to access for you and your <b>mobile</b> learners, through the <b>Rise Up Mobile Learning app</b>, available on Google Play and App Store.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233118364/8ef7fe167e303e0c6ec0bc4c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+11.25.06.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=0af2aa883b0f5e137e8ab33896b0124e7bdce1580d2c6eef0d267956896fbeab" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233118364/8ef7fe167e303e0c6ec0bc4c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-04+%C3%A0+11.25.06.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=0af2aa883b0f5e137e8ab33896b0124e7bdce1580d2c6eef0d267956896fbeab"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="download-the-app" data-post-processed="true">Download the app</h2><p class="no-margin">To download the Rise Up app, simply go on the Google or App store, depending on your device, search for the Rise Up app, and click on Install / Download.</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squarance.riseup&amp;hl=fr" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Download on Google play</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://apps.apple.com/fr/app/rise-up-mobile-learning/id1449266317" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Download on the App Store</a></p></li></ul><h2 id="sign-in-to-the-rise-up-app" data-post-processed="true">Sign in to the Rise Up app</h2><p class="no-margin">Once downloaded, all you need to do is enter your login details to connect to your Rise Up platform and access your Training paths, the Community page, and your Account. You are automatically identified and can access your dedicated space.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242890163/da3806d8f53af34e6fe90028/IMG_B9E7832C8CAE-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=f0090d2a4fc539cb1fac9bf9a8abb0a342e0f38927657954ed7f9db369483d16" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242890163/da3806d8f53af34e6fe90028/IMG_B9E7832C8CAE-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=f0090d2a4fc539cb1fac9bf9a8abb0a342e0f38927657954ed7f9db369483d16"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will be asked to enter:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">the URL link of your Rise Up platform (you will not be asked for this information if you have a white label app - see "<i>Your dedicated app</i>" section of this article)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">your login</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">your password</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">As a simpler alternative to logging in with your identifiers, you will be offered to log in by scanning a QR Code. You just have to click on "<b>Scan a QR code</b>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To find this QR Code on your platform, connect to your platform on your PC, go to "My Account" and then in the "Security" section.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242891718/db0b710e0997626d1d65f4c7/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-04+%C3%A0+14.07.34.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=5e49a40f46874b1795674f25e757085da8d4155f7c98c2e1c4fc52c2cd707de6" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242891718/db0b710e0997626d1d65f4c7/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-04+%C3%A0+14.07.34.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=5e49a40f46874b1795674f25e757085da8d4155f7c98c2e1c4fc52c2cd707de6"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="your-dedicated-app" data-post-processed="true">Your dedicated app</h2><p class="no-margin">To further personalize your mobile space, it is possible to create an app dedicated to your white label platform. This is developed by our Technical team and will later be added to the various stores. You can therefore customize : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">the logo</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">description</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">visuals </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">and even more !</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Do not hesitate to contact your dedicated sales representative to request a dedicated app.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i> </i></p><p class="no-margin"><i> Last updated on 08/04/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creating a landing page</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to share a training to people outside your organization and invite them to register for a training?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">Rise-up gives you the possibility of creating a landing page for your training: you will be able to create a landing page, presenting the training, allowing you to distribute it, promote it and invite the targeted audience to register for the training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will be able to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Share a training program with users who do not have an account on your Rise Up platform.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Invite them to register for the training concerned and thereby create an account on your platform.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">This page is therefore intended to be distributed to prospects, customers, or partners who do not have an account on your Rise Up platform.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="creating-a-landing-page--dedicated-page" data-post-processed="true">Creating a landing page / dedicated page</h2><p class="no-margin">First, create the training you want to make accessible through a landing page (complete its description and training content).</p><p class="no-margin">To learn more about creating a course, see the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974013">Create a training</a> article.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Training configuration section</a>, check the <b>Dedicated (/Landing) page </b>box.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">If you want learners to be able to register for training from this dedicated page, also check the <b>Allow registrations</b> box in this same <b>Configuration</b> section.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257981675/934685aade0b658f67aadb99/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=a1f2791924a1f9b7a1c64b28167e73ce6e307fdf4316acd5d48ef7d95d5821de" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257981675/934685aade0b658f67aadb99/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=a1f2791924a1f9b7a1c64b28167e73ce6e307fdf4316acd5d48ef7d95d5821de"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Be sure to check the "<b>Visible</b>", "<b>Dedicated page</b>" and "<b>Allow registrations</b>" options to ensure that your training runs smoothly.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To share this landing page, retrieve the corresponding URL by accessing the list of your Trainings, then click on <b>More options</b> (3 vertical dots) on the training concerned, and finally click on the <b>URL of the dedicated page </b>to access the URL and copy / paste it (this link is accessible for administrators &amp; designers).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257983268/b8382af86722fbef843681fa/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=618bf3ff06d5a60bfadd949e19b2d63b363453b8e860b593c2c7328be922fc0e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257983268/b8382af86722fbef843681fa/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=618bf3ff06d5a60bfadd949e19b2d63b363453b8e860b593c2c7328be922fc0e"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">A pop-up window displaying the URL of the page appears.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257983772/5b35b4e39e1db8064fc37faa/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=3a1306441105cb028ae0a5777a395e08e839401715f12a1431009ce41be88a8f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257983772/5b35b4e39e1db8064fc37faa/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=3a1306441105cb028ae0a5777a395e08e839401715f12a1431009ce41be88a8f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Copy and paste this URL to share it to your targeted audience. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Users will be able to access the training presentation page in order to discover its content and, depending on your parameters, will be able to register to the training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">A dedicated page displays the following information:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Training title</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Description of the training (you can add images, videos, etc.) into the description text.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Objectives</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Training program (details of modules included in the training)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Information related to training (designer, duration, etc.)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/244300749/c100e4d13e330249f9709ae0/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=19227c5cb56bcc330fc2d3ef3828dad0b5c7d3001a96c2e83d13592dd946edbc" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/244300749/c100e4d13e330249f9709ae0/image.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=19227c5cb56bcc330fc2d3ef3828dad0b5c7d3001a96c2e83d13592dd946edbc"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Note that the button inviting the user to register / access the training will be different depending on the settings of your platform and the configuration of the training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 10/12/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Create boards and discussions on the community page</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/04/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">You can : </p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Board for a partner</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Board for a Group</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Board for a Training</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a Board for a Training Path </p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Create a discussion or more in a board </p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="create-a-board-for-a-partner-" data-post-processed="true">Create a Board for a partner </h2><p class="no-margin">To create a board associated to a partner, you must check the box "<b>Create a board on the Community page</b>" when creating your Partner.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233488060/3db59b1db07a882afccc3a5c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+10.37.26.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=fc91e69338cb93617c8b23967a524c6276e243d7ed6007c170e4a90d5cf65697" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233488060/3db59b1db07a882afccc3a5c/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-05+%C3%A0+10.37.26.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=fc91e69338cb93617c8b23967a524c6276e243d7ed6007c170e4a90d5cf65697"></a></div><p class="no-margin">All users linked to this Partner will have access to the relevant board on the Community page.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By default, only Administrators have the possibility to write messages on this board, but it is possible to enable this possibility for other users.</p><p class="no-margin"><br> </p><h2 id="create-a-board-for-a-group" data-post-processed="true">Create a Board for a Group</h2><p class="no-margin">To create a board associated with a group, you must check the box "<b>Create a board on the Community page</b>" when creating your Group.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">All users linked to this Group will have access to the relevant space in the Community.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Group managers, administrators, community managers and partner administrators can add discussions, delete a discussion and moderate messages if needed, on this board. Learners can only write a message inside a discussion.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="create-a-board-for-a-training" data-post-processed="true">Create a Board for a Training</h2><p class="no-margin">To create a board associated with a training course, you must check the box "<b>Create a board on the Community page</b>" when creating your Training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">All users registered for this training and / or facilitators-designers/creators of this training will have access to the relevant space in the Community.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Designers/creators, moderators, administrators, community managers and partner administrators can add discussions, delete a discussion, moderate the messages, if needed, on this board. Learners can only write a message inside a discussion.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="create-a-board-for-a-training-path" data-post-processed="true">Create a Board for a Training Path</h2><p class="no-margin">To create a board associated with a training path, you must check the box "<b>Create a board on the Community page</b>" when creating your training path.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">All users registered for this training path will have access to the relevant space in the Community.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Creators/designers, moderators, administrators, community managers and partner administrators can add discussions, delete a discussion, moderate messages, if needed, on this board. Learners can only write a message inside a discussion.</p><p class="no-margin"><br> </p><h2 id="create-a-discussion" data-post-processed="true">Create a discussion</h2><p class="no-margin">Administrators and Community Managers can create discussions within the various existing Boards.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create a discussion, open the relevant board and click on <b>Add a new talk</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233894091/0a6bda74934c459368746916/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.16.53.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=12a9471109ca7d05cd50b2792cf83c2878342d1ba71372604717f1782ef6106e" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/233894091/0a6bda74934c459368746916/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-06+%C3%A0+11.16.53.png?expires=1620407308&amp;signature=12a9471109ca7d05cd50b2792cf83c2878342d1ba71372604717f1782ef6106e"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can create as many as you want.</p><p class="no-margin">All users who have access to the Board to which the discussion is attached will also have access to the discussion.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creation of an e-learning module &gt; Exam</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/12/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235658094/b4769e007475dabb19a389ca/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.01.04.png?expires=1619906187&amp;signature=bb05a7393cb9ba3a91bf8d99fa2166e8921e25bf8de08db7bb65792b69194bf3" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235658094/b4769e007475dabb19a389ca/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.01.04.png?expires=1619906187&amp;signature=bb05a7393cb9ba3a91bf8d99fa2166e8921e25bf8de08db7bb65792b69194bf3"></a></div><p class="no-margin">An exam is similar to some types of quizzes, but unlike a quiz, <b>you cannot make multiple attempts</b>. Once the exam has been validated, the learner cannot come back to it to try to improve his result (appart from when an Administrator / Designer reopen an exam - see <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975364">Correct learner's exams</a>).</p><p class="no-margin">In addition, the open question makes it possible to integrate a correction done by another user of the platform (see below).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">üí° The difference between the exam and the quiz is therefore that the exam does not allow the learner to make several attempts, and that a corrector must manually correct the open question.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The exam is generally created at the end of the training, in order to test the knowledge acquired by the learner.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">An exam can be made up of 3 types of questions :</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">True or false</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Multiple choice</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Open question</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">For the questions "True or False", and "Multiple Choice", the modalities are identical to those of the<a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975290"> Quiz stage</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="open-question" data-post-processed="true">Open question</h2><p class="no-margin">The Open Question will require a correction from another user, who must be selected in the "Corrector" field.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235626387/d3a39d3dee269416fc134f1d/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+12.11.56.png?expires=1619906187&amp;signature=b1b96d55d5e990c09602c5b2227e5bfe619597c57f10ebd06ccc02abd0d33805" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235626387/d3a39d3dee269416fc134f1d/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+12.11.56.png?expires=1619906187&amp;signature=b1b96d55d5e990c09602c5b2227e5bfe619597c57f10ebd06ccc02abd0d33805"></a></div><p class="no-margin">He must be selected among the <b>Creators/Designers</b> of the training. By default, if the field is left empty, all designers will be notified of the corrections to be made.</p><p class="no-margin">A learner can answer an open question by: text, video, or uploading a file (word, ppt, excel, pdf ...).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">For more information on how to mark an exam, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975364">Correcting learner exams.</a></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Unlike a quiz, until an exam is corrected, the training is considered unfinished by the learner. It will be indicated as <b>in progress üïì</b> (see screenshot below).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235653025/f11c93c75bb37cdf68215fd9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.43.12.png?expires=1619906187&amp;signature=3be2013fbc903d9618d3177f9c9bf06658643c1d0a3333f186ba35fe86fd6ec2" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235653025/f11c93c75bb37cdf68215fd9/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.43.12.png?expires=1619906187&amp;signature=3be2013fbc903d9618d3177f9c9bf06658643c1d0a3333f186ba35fe86fd6ec2"></a></div><p class="no-margin">As soon as the exam has been corrected, the learner will be notified.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">As for the quiz step, it is possible to modify the coefficients in order to weight the answers. For more information see the <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3975290">article dedicated to the Quiz stage.</a></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creation of an e-learning module &gt; Webcast</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/12/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235658497/5a2ed8ec6f359cb64ba27e19/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.55.23.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=deae76e4006e0a3f7b1ed0f5bb81db87a56c4c1bb1f9c6a0d83045320ce0dac1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235658497/5a2ed8ec6f359cb64ba27e19/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.55.23.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=deae76e4006e0a3f7b1ed0f5bb81db87a56c4c1bb1f9c6a0d83045320ce0dac1"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">There's no need to record yourself via another tool and then integrate it into Rise Up,. Webcast allows you to film yourself and record yourself vocally directly on the platform.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The webcast will allow you, for example, to make a video presenting the training, in which case it will be placed in the first step.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Click on <b>Start recording</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235660331/5710664bd5affaca25fd3dc2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.06.19.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ef0aa4d30ce5763733ad2761ca841cb9174fe5a3cac6c2c86fa6dad8c7b50611" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235660331/5710664bd5affaca25fd3dc2/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.06.19.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=ef0aa4d30ce5763733ad2761ca841cb9174fe5a3cac6c2c86fa6dad8c7b50611"></a></div><p class="no-margin">A window allowing you to start recording will appear. On first use, a window may open on your browser asking you to allow the tool to access your webcam and your microphone.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235662802/5c5f2f3bdbc6d9636ed30971/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.15.12.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=dff311105989a39cd3afbb6e5b8f67a9da7c80afa2bcc956f909db0ccb308512" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235662802/5c5f2f3bdbc6d9636ed30971/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.15.12.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=dff311105989a39cd3afbb6e5b8f67a9da7c80afa2bcc956f909db0ccb308512"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You can run:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">video recording in webcam / video section üé•</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">audio recording in the microphone / audio section üé§</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">To start recording, click on the <b>blue button</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235663916/ace791efa360abda11dc8fac/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.17.46.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=7da12b38e44c2506ac81c52b58f7f003f9c2cfceb388ddc854f6802c3b7c6236" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235663916/ace791efa360abda11dc8fac/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+14.17.46.png?expires=1620407307&amp;signature=7da12b38e44c2506ac81c52b58f7f003f9c2cfceb388ddc854f6802c3b7c6236"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Creation of an e-learning module &gt; Document</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            Last updated on 08/12/2020
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235657717/70d824168dc3a93b4be5418f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.59.30.png?expires=1619961342&amp;signature=bf8e3c28309ff73fd98c84ccaee903356edc5e2c23b416bd4a967117278e6c12" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/235657717/70d824168dc3a93b4be5418f/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-08-12+%C3%A0+13.59.30.png?expires=1619961342&amp;signature=bf8e3c28309ff73fd98c84ccaee903356edc5e2c23b416bd4a967117278e6c12"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">By creating a "<b>Document</b>" step, you can upload a document to the platform which can be seen by your learners when they access this step.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This document can have several formats (word, excel, powerpoint, pdf, etc.).</p><p class="no-margin">Find the complete list of formats accepted in the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/1088682">Dimensions and formats accepted by Rise Up</a>. </p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You have the possibility to configure the following two points:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Allow learners to download the document. A download button will then be available for them</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Allow learners to annotate the document. In this case, the annotations will be visible to all users, to create a collaborative document. These annotations are left by learners using their mouse directly on the document, so this feature should be used sparingly if you don't want learners to leave a lot of annotations.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">It is also possible to accompany the document with an explanatory <b>video or audio recording.</b></p><p class="no-margin">This video can be imported from your computer, but it is also possible to directly record video or audio through your webcam and / or microphone.</p><p class="no-margin">The tool is the same one used for creating a <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4274015">Webcast stage</a>.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

      <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">
        <a href="/en/collections/2376149-rise-up-mobile-learning">Rise Up Mobile Learning</a>
