  <div class="link__arrow o__ltr">Presentation of Rise Up Mobile app</div>
</div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Presentation of Rise Up Mobile app</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            What features are available on the mobile app? How to access the catalog on the app?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4405384/square_128/DSC09723_%281%29-1603897479.jpg?1603897479" alt="Kevin Legros avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Kevin Legros</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">To download and log into the Rise Up Mobile app on your phone, see the dedicated article "<a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4043291">Accessing the Rise Up Mobile App</a>".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The Rise Up Mobile app consists of 5 different sections accessible from the horizontal menu located at the bottom of your app.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242813534/ae77063928a31b0c61fa298e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-04+%C3%A0+10.18.56.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=55d41ea740bb3aee1d18f91296fe8ab5e904ac82501249735e46e2d4df41f9fe" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242813534/ae77063928a31b0c61fa298e/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-04+%C3%A0+10.18.56.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=55d41ea740bb3aee1d18f91296fe8ab5e904ac82501249735e46e2d4df41f9fe"></a></div><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Home (Dashboard)</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Community</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Learning sprint</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Catalog</b></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>My account</b></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">The application allows learners to access their account and therefore their training directly on their mobile.</p><p class="no-margin">‚ö†Ô∏è Administrator functions (user management, training creation, etc.) are not available in the mobile application.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="home-dashboard" data-post-processed="true">Home (dashboard)</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242817040/a7dad09cc3fd7d1e8d5c1784/IMG_DE67D276E629-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=a9b6cb50e7e3425798d1bb64a3aede149e5208502cdad5e5e3bc031db685f774" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242817040/a7dad09cc3fd7d1e8d5c1784/IMG_DE67D276E629-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=a9b6cb50e7e3425798d1bb64a3aede149e5208502cdad5e5e3bc031db685f774"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">On your dashboard, you will find:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">News from your Company. To learn more about how to configure these news, see the article "<a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3966535">Customizing the platform</a>", section "News".</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The trainings you have registered for.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">If you are registered for classroom sessions, your upcoming sessions will also appear on your dashboard.</p></li></ul><h2 id="community" data-post-processed="true">Community</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242818115/5d4c1b3eeb45cb5b13e11b67/IMG_FA7F3766D624-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=fe2003899492cd0f99f5c4cd00e7509775cb2414bbeeebe6eda1ece5e6eaaca4" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242818115/5d4c1b3eeb45cb5b13e11b67/IMG_FA7F3766D624-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=fe2003899492cd0f99f5c4cd00e7509775cb2414bbeeebe6eda1ece5e6eaaca4"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Your Community space allows you to access your exchange spaces, see the latest messages posted and also write messages.</p><p class="no-margin">By clicking on the side menu at the top left, you will access the various discussion boards.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="learning-sprint" data-post-processed="true">Learning sprint</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242820377/8cb7cd92d112198507bb2525/IMG_5094.PNG?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=c06d8156765ed165cc97571cfa4e2b6f1b5cd11d388d7783d34c5ba86094fd86" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242820377/8cb7cd92d112198507bb2525/IMG_5094.PNG?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=c06d8156765ed165cc97571cfa4e2b6f1b5cd11d388d7783d34c5ba86094fd86"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The Sprint section allows the learner to initiate "Learning Sprints", curated revision programs.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">First, the learner has to enter the time he wishes to dedicate to his learning Sprint (5, 10 or 15 minutes). And then the app will create for him, based on the duration selected, a curated revision program. The content will be selected randomly among the trainings that he has already completed.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Once he has selected what he wants to revise, he just has to click on "<b>Let's go</b>!" to launch his learning sprint.</p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242821851/b0d43d0d9982ac0855a0520a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-04+%C3%A0+10.45.26.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=9d363718790b3b522cf0b0bb258381d0a1940fcb4fb700fd3d386d757ff955a1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242821851/b0d43d0d9982ac0855a0520a/Capture+d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran+2020-09-04+%C3%A0+10.45.26.png?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=9d363718790b3b522cf0b0bb258381d0a1940fcb4fb700fd3d386d757ff955a1"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="catalog" data-post-processed="true">Catalog</h2><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242822213/c72fbf85102274f4c9cdaf45/IMG_5096.PNG?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=6b19fd63ae83f3d01b29d9401af38e7c1228b1f5b35a66f11a86216f34376d5f" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242822213/c72fbf85102274f4c9cdaf45/IMG_5096.PNG?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=6b19fd63ae83f3d01b29d9401af38e7c1228b1f5b35a66f11a86216f34376d5f"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The Catalog section provides access to all the trainings available to the learner within the training catalog of his company. Depending on the settings selected, the learner can view the description of the training courses, and register directly.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è The learner does not have access to the Resource Library on the Mobile app.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="my-account" data-post-processed="true">My account</h2><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242822949/b56440ca71c2c8929dfd7154/IMG_7FDF6B2E1B38-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=83de9c4f8079b7d3573917f0bbc370191b9bb4ac4e62458839e6a71b35bbf0a0" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/242822949/b56440ca71c2c8929dfd7154/IMG_7FDF6B2E1B38-1.jpeg?expires=1620407310&amp;signature=83de9c4f8079b7d3573917f0bbc370191b9bb4ac4e62458839e6a71b35bbf0a0"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In the <b>My account</b> section, learners can access their learning statistics and modify their settings (modify their photo, language, etc.).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 11/24/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">To access certificate management, you must first:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3970601">Create certificate</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Attach it to a course (see Section "Associating a certificate to the course" of the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">Create a training &gt; Configuration</a>)</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Then to access certificate tracking: <b>Side menu &gt; Certificates section &gt; View.</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">And click on <b>Manage </b>‚öôÔ∏è for the desired certificate</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/256452101/3681277017507711ea62fa61/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=40e5bd6a472eb80ffe3fc054ebd415f2335dbd29402b80969ec1129d2aa9ad8f" class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You will access the list of learners who have obtained the selected certificate as well as all the corresponding information (date obtained, expiration date etc.).</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">And you will be able to follow validated certificates, and expired ones (for which it is necessary to carry out a renewal, if concerned).</p><p   <div class="paper paper__large">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Activate learner levels</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How do I activate levels for my learners? How to activate the gamification feature on the platform?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The levels aim to award success points to your learners, in order to stimulate your teams and keep track of their progress.<br><br></p><h2 id="activate-levels" data-post-processed="true">Activate levels</h2><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Settings ‚öôÔ∏è &gt; Objectives section</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Click on the "Activate gamification linked to levels and pointss" checkbox to activate the feature associated with levels.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257097824/3335ab75e393eb85f4121bda/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=385e1a808c38c94e3fde7a0a168637191f97f29bc3f33678a1baaf4a3331112a" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257097824/3335ab75e393eb85f4121bda/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=385e1a808c38c94e3fde7a0a168637191f97f29bc3f33678a1baaf4a3331112a"></a></div><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è To activate Levels, you must first activate the "<b>Objectives</b>" functionality.</p><p class="no-margin">To learn more about objectives, see the article <a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3971695">Activate objectives for learners</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Once the feature is activated, you will need to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/4549701">Set the levels of your learners</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/en/articles/4549707">Assign success points to your objectives</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">When your learners achieve objectives for which success points have been set, they will automatically earn these success points, and, by accumulating them, will be able to increase their level on the platform.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 19/10/2020.</i></p></article>
    </div>

      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Set the levels of your learners</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to create levels for your learners? How to configure the levels created and allow your learners to level up?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">The Levels aim to award success points to your learners, in order to stimulate your teams and keep track of their progress.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create and configure the levels available for your learners, go to the <b>Side Menu &gt; Objectives &gt; Levels.</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257123560/c09e4186d638b21dedac64eb/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=90a80ac8ed9d9d3c072d9ce8c06081b0dad4580ca6194d05c970ac373f92cd58" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257123560/c09e4186d638b21dedac64eb/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=90a80ac8ed9d9d3c072d9ce8c06081b0dad4580ca6194d05c970ac373f92cd58"></a></div><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="base-level-by-default" data-post-processed="true">Base level (by default)</h2><p class="no-margin">Note that a level 0 is created by default. It corresponds to the basic level of your learners who have no success point. It is not possible for you to modify the number of success points linked to this basic objective. They will always remain at zero. And you won't be able to delete it either.</p><p class="no-margin">However, you can change its name.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">All your new learners will therefore be assigned this basic level.</p><p class="no-margin">This is the first to appear in the list of levels.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><br> </p><h2 id="create-learner-levels" data-post-processed="true">Create learner levels</h2><p class="no-margin">Click <b>Create Level </b>on the right side of the screen to create a new level.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257125694/bb490886fae00aacd5cb3d5e/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=ac6cad4121191485f0adae3e93c350a7631ee72c857cd3725af9f53193cf87d9" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257125694/bb490886fae00aacd5cb3d5e/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=ac6cad4121191485f0adae3e93c350a7631ee72c857cd3725af9f53193cf87d9"></a></div><p class="no-margin">For each level created, you can indicate:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Level name (required)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Description (optional)</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Success points (required)</p></li></ul><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257125955/c566e6b7669eee00315fb2eb/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=ca3f0b865ae8ee76ed0377d3d9e834f0977c31246c0d89d6fdffad7353f58ba1" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257125955/c566e6b7669eee00315fb2eb/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=ca3f0b865ae8ee76ed0377d3d9e834f0977c31246c0d89d6fdffad7353f58ba1"></a></div><p class="no-margin">Depending on the success points entered for each level, the learner will move on to the next level once he has earned the expected number of success points.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="assign-success-points-to-objectives-to-advance-my-learners-in-level" data-post-processed="true">Assign success points to objectives to advance my learners in level</h2><p class="no-margin">In order to allow learners to earn success points, you will need to assign success points to the objectives you created on the platform.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To learn more, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4549707">Assign success points to your objectives</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="access-to-my-level-as-a-learner" data-post-processed="true">Access to my level as a learner</h2><p class="no-margin">The learner visualizes his level on the left of his dashboard as well as in the <b>My level </b>section appearing in the horizontal bar at the top of the screen.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257127965/4343c4798bbe68130cdb9fda/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b2afac1aa123209847f0db514f6c20462f8324a47a950d60047daec85bec66be" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257127965/4343c4798bbe68130cdb9fda/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=b2afac1aa123209847f0db514f6c20462f8324a47a950d60047daec85bec66be"></a></div><p class="no-margin">The learner also visualizes the number of success points he must obtain in order to move to the next level.<br></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 10/19/2020.</i></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Assign success points to your objectives</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How do you set up your objectives in order to award success points to your learners?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">As part of the setting of the Levels of your learners, you must first:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4549492">Activate learner levels</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="http://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/4549701">Set the levels of your learners</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Next, in order for your learners to start earning achievement points, you need to assign achievement points to goals.</p><p class="no-margin">To learn more about the goals, see:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973714">Creating objectivese</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973721">Register users for an objective</a></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973718">Viewing Objectives</a></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">When creating an objective, you will be prompted to set a number of achievement points.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257158639/e31c30e5f2d2f685bb580035/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1bd115e28d35ee34b38b4c7a99984ee5af3ce8d552d28883cdcf0e05c84a06ce" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257158639/e31c30e5f2d2f685bb580035/image.png?expires=1620407306&amp;signature=1bd115e28d35ee34b38b4c7a99984ee5af3ce8d552d28883cdcf0e05c84a06ce"></a></div><p class="no-margin">When a learner completes an objective he is registered to, he will earn the associated achievement points. By accumulating a sufficient number of success points, he will reach the next level.</p></article>
    </div>
  </div>
      <div class="intercom-reaction-picker" dir="ltr">
    <div class="intercom-reaction-prompt">Did this answer your question?</div>

      <button class="intercom-reaction" data-reaction-text="disappointed" tabindex="0" aria-label="Disappointed Reaction">

    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Settings - Roles</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to configure the features available for the different user roles?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">To access the <b>Roles </b>settings, click on "Settings" then "Roles".</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">This settings section is used to configure the features available to users with the <b>Designer </b>role or the <b>Group Manager</b> attribute.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To learn more about the different roles available on the platform, see the article <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3973902">Presentation of different users</a>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257173500/cb12469a60e8bb1b8d17aa93/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=42dd45cff1984a227cfa9eff0bebfaaf2617c5e8e8081bfc921c666fcff26420" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/257173500/cb12469a60e8bb1b8d17aa93/image.png?expires=1620407305&amp;signature=42dd45cff1984a227cfa9eff0bebfaaf2617c5e8e8081bfc921c666fcff26420"></a></div><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">For the <b>Designers</b>, it is possible to set up whether they have extended rights to all the trainings of the platform or only to the trainings for which they are designated as Designers.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">The settings can be made on:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Training &gt; access to all training courses or only those for which he is designated as the designer.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Training path &gt; access to all training path or only those for which he is designated as the designer.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">The import library &gt; access to all contents available in the import library or only those of the training courses for which he is designated as the designer.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">For <b>Group Managers</b>, it is possible to give them the rights to create and modify user accounts or to grant them limited rights to modify user accounts that are members of groups for which they are Group Managers.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Last updated on 10/19/2020</i></p></article>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="paper paper__large">
  <div class="content content__narrow">
    <div class="article intercom-force-break">
      <div class="article__meta" dir="ltr">
          <h1 class="t__h1">Set up live / delayed evaluations</h1>
          <div class="article__desc">
            How to create a live / delayed evaluation? How to modify the evaluation templates?
          </div>
          <div class="avatar">
  <div class="avatar__photo o__ltr">
      <img src="https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/4004378/square_128/photo_profil-1587972480.png?1587972480" alt="Claire Philippe avatar" class="avatar__image">

  </div>
  <div class="avatar__info">
    <div>
      Written by <span class="c__darker"> Claire Philippe</span>
        <br> Updated over a week ago
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
      <article dir="ltr"><p class="no-margin">A training evaluation allows you to get feedback from your learners on your training by submitting a feedback questionnaire. Once created, these assessments can be linked to training.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">Access: <b>Side Menu &gt; Evaluations</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260671596/686d4c2c9ff4f13a611c361a/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=5ae0673ebe1c30655034b2bd488f372c6255db4f73208e3a3f301cfdde415111" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260671596/686d4c2c9ff4f13a611c361a/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=5ae0673ebe1c30655034b2bd488f372c6255db4f73208e3a3f301cfdde415111"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In order to use the live / delayed evaluation feature, you will need to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">Create one or more evaluation models</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">Link your evaluation templates to your training</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Once these settings have been made, the live / delayed evaluation will be sent automatically when your learners complete the training course for which you have configured evaluations.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="create-an-assessment-template" data-post-processed="true">Create an assessment template</h2><p class="no-margin">Click on the <b>Manage templates </b>section. </p><p class="no-margin"><b>Access: Side menu &gt; Evaluations &gt; Manage models</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">To create a new evaluation, click on <b>Create an evaluation</b>.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260708163/92cb1cb8e5db3162850c4f50/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=b48b8d8a9bd75de48195cb29e0d98ce316be6e97a184e8f40c4a925323019abe" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260708163/92cb1cb8e5db3162850c4f50/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=b48b8d8a9bd75de48195cb29e0d98ce316be6e97a184e8f40c4a925323019abe"></a></div><p class="no-margin">You will then be able to configure your new evaluation : create a title, indicate the perimeter to which the assessment is attached, and create the questions for your evaluation.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260708685/bf6dc7caa09b52ded53d338a/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=0fc7eb0f61072ff44ea02d0f2d963fffe47a3d0cf7702aa8dd86f7858ea01860" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260708685/bf6dc7caa09b52ded53d338a/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=0fc7eb0f61072ff44ea02d0f2d963fffe47a3d0cf7702aa8dd86f7858ea01860"></a></div><p class="no-margin">There are 3 types of questions:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Evaluation</b>: Asks the learner to leave a rating from 1 to 10.<br><i>Example: Rate the training from 1 to 10.</i></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Survey</b>: Asks the learner to select an answer to a question among several available choices.<br><i>Example: What did you think of the training? </i><br>                         <i>- Not very useful </i><br>                         <i>- Rather useful </i><br>                         <i>- Very useful</i></p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Open question</b>: the learner will be able to leave a free comment <br><i>Example: How can we improve the training?</i></p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">Once you created all your questions, click on <b>Save </b>to create your evaluation. Your template will be added to the list of available evaluation templates.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">You can create as many evaluation templates as you want and thus customize the questions asked the learners according to the training carried out.</p><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="manage-your-reviews" data-post-processed="true">Manage your reviews</h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Access: Side Menu &gt; Evaluations &gt; Manage templates</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260710357/7135202e61f1a28f0a42aa33/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2f926660824ea962068f9e90aaf5accd38568b269f65d13bc2f7106b91f1ae2c" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260710357/7135202e61f1a28f0a42aa33/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=2f926660824ea962068f9e90aaf5accd38568b269f65d13bc2f7106b91f1ae2c"></a></div><p class="no-margin">In the <b>Manage Templates </b>section, you can also:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">‚úèÔ∏è Edit your templates</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">üìù Duplicate an evaluation template</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">‚ÑπÔ∏è See the training courses to which the evaluation is attached</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">üóëÔ∏è Delete the evaluation template</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"><br></p><h2 id="add-an-evaluation-to-a-training" data-post-processed="true">Add an evaluation to a training</h2><p class="no-margin">When <a href="https://help.riseup.ai/fr/articles/3974276">configuring the training</a>, it will be possible to select the evaluation templates created so that they are associated with the training and thus automatically sent to the learner once his training is completed.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260711390/27d1d97c2ff37927b0e0eb8b/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1687ef10d926b5d1ce3d74fd9181155dfd3d9b9fa9a85d29b0983bc3ea719f84" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260711390/27d1d97c2ff37927b0e0eb8b/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=1687ef10d926b5d1ce3d74fd9181155dfd3d9b9fa9a85d29b0983bc3ea719f84"></a></div><p class="no-margin">There are 2 types of assessments:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Live evaluation</b>: The live evaluation is directly generated once the learner has completed his training.</p></li><li><p class="no-margin"><b>Delayed evaluation</b>: For the delayed evaluation, it is possible to define a number of days after which the assessment will be generated and sent to the learner.</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><h2 id="access-the-assessments-completed-by-your-learners" data-post-processed="true">Access the assessments completed by your learners</h2><p class="no-margin"><b>Access: Side Menu &gt; Evaluations &gt; View</b></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin">In this section, you view all the evaluations completed by your learners on your training courses.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><div class="intercom-container"><a href="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260713040/f991522580c4a2f2204190b5/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=cb9472876de2ca79fce093dd2ae3b8dce360dd3f3fd605abe5b13ec60afde1cf" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img src="https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/260713040/f991522580c4a2f2204190b5/image.png?expires=1620407309&amp;signature=cb9472876de2ca79fce093dd2ae3b8dce360dd3f3fd605abe5b13ec60afde1cf"></a></div><p class="no-margin">By clicking on the action icons at the end of each line you will be able to:</p><ul><li><p class="no-margin">üë§ Access the results of the evaluation completed by the learner concerned</p></li><li><p class="no-margin">üìì Access the average results for the training concerned</p></li></ul><p class="no-margin">It is also possible to download the results in Excel format by clicking on the <b>Excel Export </b>button.</p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"></p><p class="no-margin"><i>Date of last update on 10/29/2020</i></p></article>
